Lead your Daps to safety through an eerily beautiful world, fighting off threats, solving puzzles, and avoiding the infection that twists your companions into something alien and terrifying…

Name: Colin McRae Rally
Summary: Colin McRae Rally, in questa edizione per PC e Mac, contiene le auto e i tracciati del gioco per dispositivi mobili più venduto dello scorso anno, con TRENTA sensazionali tappe di rally in tre ambienti presi direttamente dal classico per PlayStation, Colin McRae 2.0.

Name: My Maid Girlfriend
Summary: You are the protagonist! You take on the role of the protagonist and experience romancing with adorable maids!

Name: Love Flute
Summary: Play the piano, play the flute, and enjoy a ghost story as you use the profits from your street performances to buy new instruments and furniture! Let's shoot for fame and fortune!

Name: Trine Enchanted Edition
Summary: Three Heroes make their way through dangers untold in a fairytale world of great castles and strange machinery, featuring physics-based puzzles, beautiful sights and online co-op.

Name: Nancy Drew: Curse of Blackmoor Manor
Summary: Delve into Dark Legends Lurking in the Shadow of an Old English Mansion!

Name: Secret Files: Tunguska
Summary: Unravel one of the greatest mysteries of our time! On the 30th June 1908 an explosion with the combined energy of 2000 Hiroshima bombs rocked the region of Tunguska in Central Siberia and felled over 6,000 square km of trees. The explosion could be heard from as far as 1,000km away.

Name: The Devourer: Hunted Souls
Summary: Play as a paranormal investigator in our hybrid between first person survival and psychological horror story game. Investigate a haunted forest with up to 5 players CO-OP, try to lift the curse, experience a tragic story and take decisions together. Will you survive or will you lose your soul?

Name: Ys Origin
Summary: The perfect mix of action, exploration and story with screen-filling bosses, unique platforming elements, and innovative puzzles.

Name: Cargo Company
Summary: Cargo Company is a transport simulation tycoon game where you make money by transporting passengers, wood, steel, goods, cars, tanks and more - using trains, trucks, busses, and even rockets between planets.

Name: Kyle is Famous
Summary: Kyle tries to prepare for his most important interview yet. Choose his path through over 100 endings and accept the consequences in this comedic adventure.

Name: No One Lives in Heaven
Summary: What happens to the inhabitants of a game world after you have finished it? In the story-driven, 40-hour role-playing game No one lives in heaven, you will encounter over 200 unique NPCs with over 300 quests that can be solved in various ways. Philosophical and crazy.

Name: The Revenge of Sophia Red
Summary: The Revenge Of Sophia Red is a first-person psychological horror adventure with puzzle elements. It's about the life of the book author Sophia Red. Love can turn into hate and make people blind. Revenge has become the only meaning in Sophia's life. This is her story.

Name: The Horror of Salazar House
Summary: Will you solve the mystery of the Salazar manor or will you become another permanent inhabitant? An Italian horror inspired adventure game!

Name: HELLSEED
Summary: Be careful and don't panic, someone will try to catch you and take you to hell...

Name: The Raven Remastered
Summary: 'The Raven - Legacy of a Master Thief' is a thrilling crime adventure in three chapters from the creators of 'The Book of Unwritten Tales'. Full of twists and turns, it immerses you in both sides of the story, combining thrill-of-the-chase whodunit with the risk and reward of a heist story. Paris, 1960.

Name: Siren Head: The Siren's Forest
Summary: In this indie horror game, you must escape the Siren’s Forest! Use multiple means of transportation to aid your escape. Unearth what truly happened in the forest by interacting with certain objects that could provide you with the answers you need. But be careful… There’s something out there!

Name: Mushihimesama
Summary: Battle huge "Koju" bugs in CAVE's beautiful fantasy shooter, Mushihimesama. Experience the thrill of bullet hell from the masters of the genre as you evade visually stunning shot patterns with thousands of bullets.

Name: I'm on Observation Duty 5
Summary: A spot the difference -type of puzzle horror game about monitoring live surveillance camera footage and spotting anomalies. Anomalies range from furniture movement to intruders. Fix anomalies by filing reports. You will need sharp eyes and good memory. The goal is to survive the entire night.

Name: Death Rally
Summary: Load your guns, start your engines...THE CLASSIC IS BACK! Brought to you from Remedy, renowned developers of Max Payne and Alan Wake, Remedy's Death Rally classic top down racer is back, stronger and more vicious than ever.

Name: Supreme Commander: Forged Alliance
Summary: For a thousand years, three opposing forces have waged war for what they believe is true. There can be no room for compromise: their way is the only way. Dubbed The Infinite War, this devastating conflict has taken its toll on a once-peaceful galaxy and has only served to deepen the hatred between the factions.

Name: Abomi Nation
Summary: Abomi Nation is a roguelike monster-taming RPG. Every playthrough will create a new version of Abomi Nation and provide a unique world with different Abomis for you to find. Explore your universe, watch your Abomis bond, and battle it out as your adventure unfolds in a way totally unique to you!

Name: Pathway
Summary: Esplora luoghi strani e sconosciuti con Pathway, un'avventura strategica ambientata nel deserto negli anni '30. Svela misteri occulti dimenticati, saccheggia antiche tombe e supera in astuzia i nemici in combattimenti in squadra a turni!

Name: Farewell North
Summary: Restore color to the desolate islands of Farewell North, an open world journey where you play as a collie traveling with his owner. Explore land and sea, uncover hidden paths, evade monsters, and free wildlife to bring color back to the world while revealing an emotional story about saying farewell.

Name: White Day VR: The Courage Test
Summary: The Notorious cult-classic Korean horror White Day returns with a unique VR experience! Step into the eerie darkness of classroom 1-1 and earn your place in the Occult Club by braving the horrors within. Will you survive the courage test?

Name: Coffee Talk: Episode 2 - Hibiscus & Butterfly
Summary: Dust off your coffee machine and prepare your warmest smile to meet your customers again in the second episode of the much loved coffee brewing and heart-to-heart talking simulator; Coffee Talk Episode 2: Hibiscus & Butterfly.

Name: Sedomairi
Summary: SEDOMAIRI is a first-person action horror game in which you wander through a randomly generated world that looks like an old Japanese house. Use the radio that can detect the distance and direction of the enemy to escape from the enemy, catch all the straw figures, and escape from the Sedo.

Name: Death's Gambit: Afterlife
Summary: Death's Gambit è un impegnativo platformer d'azione 2D con marcati elementi GDR. Nei panni di un emissario al servizio della Morte, svela il mistero di Siradon e scopre il vero prezzo dell'immortalità.

Name: Just Cause
Summary: https://store.steampowered.com/app/680420/OUTRIDERS/Your world...Your rules! In Just Cause, you are a Latin field operative and specialist in regime change backed by top secret US government agency who will overthrow the corrupt government of San Esperito.

Name: 1, 2 BLAME!
Summary: Online multiplayer game where deception and truth will suit up. Solve the clues, equip and use items, debate who’s the shadiest player and unmask the Killer!

Name: Star Trek: Infinite
Summary: Star Trek: Infinite è un'esperienza in cui giocare la tua storia di Star Trek come leader di una delle quattro principali fazioni dei quadranti Alfa e Beta. Segui la storia appositamente creata o traccia la tua rotta in questo grand strategy di Star Trek.

Name: Galactic Civilizations IV: Supernova
Summary: Prendi il comando di una civiltà che ha appena raggiunto viaggi più veloci della luce in Galactic Civilizations IV, l'ultimo titolo della premiata serie di giochi di strategia spaziale 4X. Esplora la galassia, colonizza mondi, plasmo culture, fai alleanze, combatti guerre e avanza tecnologie.

Name: Team Fortress 2
Summary: Nine distinct classes provide a broad range of tactical abilities and personalities. Constantly updated with new game modes, maps, equipment and, most importantly, hats!

Name: Grimcastle: Battle Tales
Summary: Grim Town: Battle Tales is a card game with RPG elements in a dark fantasy world, where demons and people live side by side. Lead your character to victory fighting on the streets of Grim Town as well as at the card table.

Name: Reshaping Mars
Summary: 「Reshaping Mars」is a colony simulation game on Mars, you will start by gathering resources, storing food, accepting immigrants, and building a better colony together. Develop powerful technologies for Mars Reshaping, make Mars great agai..sorry, just great. Don't forget to make the residents happy.

Name: Six Days in Fallujah
Summary: Six Days in Fallujah è uno sparatutto tattico in prima persona, sviluppato con l'aiuto di oltre 100 marines e soldati che hanno combattuto nella seconda battaglia di Fallujah.

Name: Escape 2088
Summary: Escape2088 è un gioco di escape room di vecchia scuola ambientato in un mondo futuristico e cyberpunk.

Name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Turbocharged
Summary: Le auto più pazze del mondo sono tornate per portare il divertimento a livelli mai visti! Guida oltre 130 veicoli ancora più vari e con nuove abilità. Costruisci le tue piste in nuovi splendidi ambienti, con diverse modalità di gioco per divertirti online e offline.

Name: Movierooms
Summary: Diventa il manager del tuo cinema in questo nuovo entusiasmante Tycoon! Attraversando la storia del cinema, esplora i vari aspetti della gestione della tua sala cinematografica. Gestisci la selezione e le proiezioni dei film, il personale, le sale e molto altro ancora!

Name: Behind the Frame
Summary: Guida le pennellate e risolvi i rompicapi per aiutare un’aspirante artista a completare il suo capolavoro, tra lo sguardo burbero del vicino e il suo pestifero gatto. Mentre componi il dipinto, scopri un’emozionante storia di possibilità e talento, svelata in momenti slegati e tuttavia familiari.

Name: Vade Retro: Exorcist
Summary: Vade Retro is a PvP exorcism game up to 4 player. Play as Demon and make your opponents go through hell, or join the exorcist team by choosing a specialty to save victims from the devil's grip in this action-packed experience.

Name: VR Table Sports
Summary: Three table sports simulator in one game! Play Foosball, Ping pong and Air hockey with your friends and other people from around the world. Meet them in different places with various avatars and have fun together :)

Name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II
Summary: Call of Duty®: Modern Warfare® II catapulta i giocatori in uno scontro globale senza precedenti con il ritorno degli iconici Operatori della Task Force 141.

Name: Tasty Planet
Summary: Control a tiny ball of grey goo with the ability to eat anything smaller than itself. The more it eats, the bigger it gets! Soon you'll be able to eat the entire planet!

Name: Garbage
Summary: Experience the struggle which a homeless man goes through in a humorous manner. Primitive elements of contemporary life that we take for granted, such as staying warm, well-nourished, and hygienic, will become an issue.

Name: Tale of Wuxia: The Pre-Sequel
Summary: Tale of Wuxia: The Pre-Sequel, the authentic sequel of Tale of Wuxia which surpasses the latter it in every way, is a CRPG developed by Fenghuang Game and Heluo Studio. This U3D-based game includes better story, funnier events and enhanced gameplay.

Name: Jurassic World Evolution 2
Summary: Jurassic World Evolution 2 è l'attesissimo sequel dell'acclamato Jurassic World Evolution. Ha inizio una nuova, avveniristica era per la serie inaugurata dal rivoluzionario simulatore gestionale immersivo sviluppato nel 2018 da Frontier.

Name: Killer7
Summary: Sneak into a world of underground assassins as Harman Smith, a man who manifests 7 deadly personalities, the killer7. Take control of this distinct murderers' row as they hunt down the sinister Kun Lan to thwart his plan of world dominance.

Name: Cursed
Summary: A horrific retro point and click adventure with combat

Name: Creepy Tale 2
Summary: Experience the creepy tension of a brothers Grimm fairy tale in this puzzle adventure game. Follow the young and brave Lars as he embarks on a dangerous journey to save his sisters mind from the clutches of a mysterious evil.

Name: MakerKing
Summary: Become a King (or Queen) at making levels! Join a community designed around level creation and online play. The level editor is simple to use and lets you create anything, even living creatures!

Name: Funeral
Summary: Funeral is a first-person horror game that creates a terrifying atmosphere and powerful tension. Solve mild puzzles, explore different worlds, and escape from the demon's trap.

Name: Wild Hearts
Summary: Affronta le bestie più feroci con il potere della tecnologia antica. In WILD HEARTS™, il nuovo titolo che reinterpreta il genere dei giochi di caccia, userai antichi congegni per sconfiggere enormi belve che incarnano lo spirito della natura. Vai a caccia in solitaria oppure gioca con gli amici.

Name: Jett Rider
Summary: Jett Rider is an arcade shooter packed with action, exploration, RPG elements, tons of humor and awesome bosses. Explore, fight, gain experience, purchase weapons in this exciting adventure.

Name: Mosaics Galore
Summary: Save the magical pets from imprisonment! Travel through the most enchanting scenes of a fantasy kingdom.

Name: Dracula: Resurrection
Summary: A fright-filled Adventure that transpires in the heart of Transylvania. London 1904. Seven years after the slaying of Dracula, you play as Jonathan Harker, (the protagonist from Bram Stoker's original novel) and soon discover your wife, Mina has fled London for the Count's castle in Transylvania. Has Mina fallen prey to vampires?

Name: Haven Park
Summary: Vesti i panni del piccolo Flint, che sta facendo del suo meglio per dare nuovo slancio al parco di sua nonna e renderlo il posto perfetto per i campeggiatori. Impara a conoscere i desideri dei campeggiatori e costruisci tutto ciò che desiderano: così attrarrai altri strambi personaggi.

Name: Martha is dead
Summary: Martha Is Dead è un oscuro thriller psicologico in prima persona ambientato nell'Italia del 1944 che confonde i confini tra la realtà, la superstizione e la tragedia della guerra.

Name: Vault of the Void
Summary: A roguelite card game where you craft your deck, swapping in and out cards as you progress, perfecting the ultimate combos. Upgrade & customize your cards with Void Stones, infusing them with new abilities to help defeat the insidious minions that stand between you and The Void.

Name: The Entertainment
Summary: KENTUCKY ROUTE ZERO è un'avventura intrisa di realismo magico a proposito di un'autostrada segreta che attraversa le grotte sotterranee del Kentucky e delle misteriose figure che la percorrono.

Name: Artifact
Summary: Artifact ora è composto da due giochi: Artifact Classic, la versione originale del gioco di carte collezionabili di Dota 2, e Artifact Foundry, un'edizione speciale com un gameplay rinnovato, nuove carte, nuovi contenuti per giocatore singolo e un'esperienza globale nuova.

Name: Killer Instinct
Summary: Una delle saghe più celebri dei picchiaduro torna sul ring con una grafica rinnovata, un'azione di gioco incessante e uno straordinario cast di protagonisti, oltre a musiche interattive e le immancabili ANTIC-C-COMBO!

Name: L.A. Noire
Summary: L.A. Noire è un thriller denso di criminalità e violenza che mescola un'azione mozzafiato con un minuzioso lavoro d'indagine per fornire un'inedita esperienza di gioco. L'edizione completa di L.A. Noire include il gioco originale completo e tutti i suoi contenuti aggiuntivi.

Name: Livestream: Escape from Hotel Izanami
Summary: In this side-scrolling action-adventure game, you'll need to scour the inside of an abandoned hotel, looking for clues to solve the mystery of the hotel and ensure your escape from a mysterious, murderous mascot intent to kill.

Name: EverQuest II
Summary: EverQuest® II is the epitome of massively multiplayer gaming - the ultimate blend of deep features, heritage, and community.

Name: Lost: Via Domus
Summary: Ti svegli al sole cocente, le urla degli altri passeggeri, il relitto del volo Oceanic 815. E senza ricordare cosa sia successo. Dovrai combattere per la tua sopravvivenza esplorando l'isola, scorprendone i segreti oscuri, e ricucendo i frammenti del tuo passato furtivo. Se sarai fortunato, riuscirai a trovare un modo per tornare a casa..

Name: Kygo 'Carry Me' VR Experience
Summary: Join superstar electronic musician Kygo in this incredible virtual reality experience inspired by the hit song “Carry Me.

Name: Pest Control
Summary: Get ready to experience a game that hearkens back to the 8-bit classics found in arcades! Play as a persistent mushroom farmer who must avoid endless waves of giant alien bugs while collecting his crops. This farmer comes equipped with power-ups to destroy the bugs and bombs to clear the screen!

Name: Sonic the Hedgehog: Spinball
Summary: Il Dr. Eggman (AKA Dr. Robotnik) ha ricominciato a trasformare gli animali di Mobius in robot, usando il suo marchingegno infernale, il Veg-O-Fortress. Soltanto Sonic è in grado di oltrepassare il Sistema di Difesa del Flipper per liberare gli animali, recuperare gli Smeraldi del Chaos e porre fine ai diabolici piani del Dr. Eggman.

Name: F1 22
Summary: Entra nella nuova era della Formula 1® in EA SPORTS™ F1® 22, il videogioco ufficiale del FIA Formula One World Championship™ 2022.

Name: Para Eyes
Summary: Para Eyes is a spot the difference horror game. Flip through security cameras and find anomalies. But be careful not to go insane.

Name: Ocean Pressure
Summary: Ocean Pressure is a singleplayer game where you as an old scientist piloting your handmade submarine in the bottom of the ocean. Your mission is explore the ocean and collect required data with help of your submarine.

Name: Flowers Blooming at the End of Summer
Summary: 여름방학을 며칠 앞둔 어느날 갑작스레 내 앞에 나타난 한 소녀. 자신을 유령이라 밝힌 소녀는 난데없이 내게 자신을 없애달라는 부탁을 건넨다. 자신의 눈에 보인다는 죽음의 색을 통해 나는 유령 소녀의 과거를 추적하기 시작하지만, 어째 소녀는 점점 죽음에 가까워지기보다는 나의 일상에 녹아들기 시작하는데...

Name: Curse of Anabelle
Summary: Curse of Anabelle è un gioco rompicapo dal forte comparto narrativo con elementi horror e di avventura, giocabile in prima persona. La storia si basa su leggende e miti realmente esistenti.

Name: Demon's Residence
Summary: You've been called in to value the residence before it gets put in sale. Explore & Unsolve the mysteries of the Residence while being watched from many angles. Sometimes it's better to stay quiet..

Name: Call of Cthulhu: Dark Corners of The Earth
Summary: Call of Cthulhu: Dark Corners of the Earth is a first-person horror game that combines intense action and adventure elements.

Name: Escape Memoirs: Questionable Side Stories
Summary: 'Escape Memoirs: Questionable Side Stories' is a humorous co-operative escape room game where you are a henchman who has to make his way through variety of puzzles to make it to a job interview on time. Can you solve all of the puzzles that stand in the way of your employment?

Name: StafferCase: A Psychotic Mystery Adventure
Summary: [Staffer Case] is a new kind of reasoning game that deals with documents related to murder and finds a contradiction between them. The stage was in the 1960s, when 10 percent of the city's population was in a virtual London with superpowers.

Name: Fragile
Summary: Get pulled into the nightmares of reality as you play as an abducted girl from the ger district of Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia. Uncover a secret organization that deals in human trafficking and other horrendous activities. Try to escape from the scariest place on earth!

Name: Hot Wheels Unleashed
Summary: Colleziona i migliori veicoli dell'universo Hot Wheels™, costruisci tracciati spettacolari e lanciati in gare mozzafiato.

Name: The Vale
Summary: CLOSE YOUR EYES. BECOME A WARRIOR: Feel your enemy’s rasping breath; a foot shifts on swampy ground; the crack of steel on wooden shield. The Vale is an audio based action adventure that sets out to breathe new life into medieval combat and fantasy narrative.

Name: MotoGP 23
Summary: Dai gas, sorpassa i tuoi avversari e taglia il traguardo: vivi il sogno di essere il prossimo campione con il nuovo MotoGP™23, più soprendente e sfidante che mai!

Name: Myst III: Exile
Summary: The story of Myst continues... Return to this strange and wondrous universe, where books become portals into worlds, and where the lessons of the past may yet hold meaning for today...

Name: Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic
Summary: It is four thousand years before the Galactic Empire and hundreds of Jedi Knights have fallen in battle against the ruthless Sith. You are the last hope of the Jedi Order. Can you master the awesome power of the Force on your quest to save the Republic? Or will you fall to the lure of the dark side?

Name: Bish Bash Bots
Summary: Bish Bash Bots fonde in maniera unica la strategia dei tower defense e l'azione fisica dei picchiaduro. Unisci le forze in cooperativa locale/online o gioca in solitaria per salvare il mondo costruendo torri migliorabili, sbloccando nuovi oggetti e colpendo i bot con martelli giganti.

Name: GOHOME
Summary: This is a third-person horror game set in a residential area in 2000s Japan. It's the complete version of the free horror game GOHOME, which was released in 2019 and caused a boom. The map has been doubled, and six more ghosts, including hidden characters, have been added to the game.

Name: Lights Camera Slaughter
Summary: Molti che entrano a Greenfield non tornano mai più. Il detective Miles è un investigatore privato alla ricerca di risposte su questa strana città isolata, ma presto capisce che non tutto è come sembra.

Name: Factory Manager Simulator
Summary: Start Your Journey With Your Uncle's Empty Factory and pickup Truck And Create Your Own Designed Factory

Name: Elemental Raiders
Summary: Assemble your team of Heroes, choose from hundreds of spells and unleash them to defeat your opponents! Elemental Raiders is a fast-paced, strategic hero battler that will challenge your tactical prowess. Join the fight & save Runaria!

Name: Save the Date
Summary: Time is broken, and only the Union's finest Temporal Mechanic can save it. Once he clocks in to work, that is. In this deep space precision platformer's Prologue Episode, manipulate time to overcome deadly obstacles in a race against the clock to reach the Mayan Temple and Save the Date.

Name: PROJECT: PLAYTIME
Summary: PROJECT: PLAYTIME è un horror multigiocatore free-to-play, in cui 6 giocatori devono costruire un giocattolo gigante e sopravvivere a un terrificante mostro nella fabbrica di giocattoli. Questo mostro è controllato da un settimo giocatore e il suo unico obiettivo è trovare e uccidere tutti.

Name: My Little Universe
Summary: Su una sterile luna con solo degli attrezzi, una nave senza carburante e il potere celestiale della creazione, dovrai ricreare ciò che è andato perduto e diventare l'eroe del tuo piccolo universo! Non dimenticare di invitare fino a 3 amici per divertirvi in modalità cooperativa a schermo condiviso!

Name: Carrier Command 2
Summary: Carrier Command 2 is the real-time strategy game that puts you in command of a futuristic carrier capable of deploying a vast array of aircraft and amphibious units. Compete against AI or human players and hop into every single vehicle to take matters into your own hands!

Name: The Witness
Summary: Ti svegli, solo, su un'isola misteriosa e costellata di enigmi impegnativi e sorprendenti.

Name: Sonic Frontiers
Summary: Experience Sonic like never before!

Name: Buddy Simulator 1984
Summary: Thanks to next generation AI technology, BUDDY SIMULATOR 1984 simulates the experience of hanging out with a best buddy! Your buddy learns from you, constantly adapting to your interests and personality. But most importantly, your buddy can play games with you!

Name: Starship Troopers: Extermination
Summary: Starship Troopers: Extermination is a 16 player co-op FPS that puts you on the far-off front lines of an all-out battle against the Bugs! Squad up, grab your rifle, and do your part as an elite Deep Space Vanguard Trooper set to take back planets claimed by the Arachnid threat!

Name: Company of Heroes
Summary: Profonda esperienza di gioco sulla Seconda Guerra Mondiale, Company of Heroes rinnova gli strategici presentando il sacrificio dei soldati, ambienti distrutti dalla guerra e campi di battaglia dinamici.

Name: Melodramatica
Summary: A charming management game set in an old Victorian Threatre. You are put in charge of a troupe of actors, it's your job to make sure your actors and the stage are ready to put on a perfect show! Train your actors, resolve their conflicts, dress up your troupe and set the stage for the final play!

Name: Demonic Episode
Summary: In this 4 player first person online co-op horror game, play as a group of content creators who are on a mission to banish a demon back to hell. The advanced, randomized game mechanics offer you and your friends a high replay value.

Name: Animal Doctor
Summary: Avvera i tuoi sogni con Animal Doctor! Ti piacerebbe dedicarti alla cura degli animali? Con Animal Doctor, cuccioli e amici pelosi saranno sempre accanto a te.

Name: Nancy Drew: Ghost Dogs of Moon Lake
Summary: Hunt for Clues on the Trail of a Pack of Phantom Hounds!

Name: Lodventure
Summary: Avventuratevi in un'avventura di sopravvivenza per 1-4 giocatori in un mondo aperto, alla ricerca di una leggenda chiamata Pietra di Lod. Costruite la vostra casa, piantate i vostri raccolti, preparate pozioni e scoprite potenti abilità. Avventuratevi in pericolosi dungeon e affrontate boss unici.

Name: Bloons TD Battles 2
Summary: Il gioco in stile tower defense che tutti aspettavano

Name: Hauma: A Detective Noir Story
Summary: Hauma is a deduction visual novel set in Munich. Discover a conspiracy amongst the upper echelons of society alongside former detective Judith, while visiting real locations in a comic-inspired look.

Name: Lama Azavtani
Summary: In the game, we can experience that in the moderate violent combat, the survival days will increase while breaking through the barrier, and different days and states will usher in different plot trends. Lama Azavtani tells the story of survivors fighting for survival after the end of the day.

Name: Soldiers of Fortune
Summary: Prepare for the dark world of The Chaos Engine, a steampunk Victorian age in which one or two players must fight the hostile creations of the Chaos Engine across four dynamic landscapes and take part in the ultimate battle.Choose from six hard-nailed mercenaries each with their own unique weapons and skills.

Name: Marvel Snap
Summary: MARVEL SNAP è un frenetico gioco di carte collezionabili che ha rivoluzionato il genere grazie alle sue meccaniche innovative, vincitore di numerosi premi come il "Miglior gioco di strategia" e il "Miglior gioco mobile dell'anno". Unisciti a milioni di giocatori in tutto il mondo.

Name: Skydrift Infinity
Summary: Get closer than ever before to the world of adrenaline pumping sky-racing where flyboys can test and master their flying and combat skills against the deadliest opponents! Admire amazingly detailed terrains. Unlock state-of-the-art planes and personalize them with unique racing skins.

Name: The Legend of Heroes: Hajimari no Kiseki
Summary: The empires of Zemuria have narrowly managed to escape the Great Twilight, a curse that threatened to end the world, thanks to the valiant efforts of those known as heroes. This has resulted in a ripple effect of events that hurtles the series toward its thrilling conclusion.

Name: Song of Iron
Summary: Behind you lies a trail of broken helms, shattered shields. You hold the axe of a fallen foe. Worn and dented, it will suit it's purpose. What lies ahead is still a mystery. Your goal is not

Name: FIFA 23
Summary: The World's Game scende in campo in FIFA 23, con la tecnologia HyperMotion2, la FIFA World Cup™ maschile e femminile, le squadre di club femminili, le funzionalità Cross-Play** e altro ancora.

Name: F1 23
Summary: Tieni il piede lontano dal freno in EA SPORTS™ F1® 23, il videogioco ufficiale del 2023 FIA Formula One World Championship™. Il nuovo capitolo dell'appassionante modalità narrativa "Braking Point" è pieno zeppo di accese rivalità e corse a folle velocità.

Name: Sonic Adventure 2
Summary: Due avventure diverse con gli eroi classici e il ritorno dei nemici storici, nella lotta per il destino del mondo.

Name: TOEM
Summary: Parti per una fantastica missione e usa il tuo occhio fotografico per scoprire i misteri del magico TOEM in questo gioco d'avventura disegnato a mano. Parla con personaggi bizzarri, risolvi i loro problemi scattando foto impeccabili e attraversa un paesaggio rilassante!

Name: Street Fighter V: Arcade Edition
Summary: Vivi l'emozione di un combattimento testa a testa in Street Fighter® V! Scegli tra 16 personaggi iconici e poi lotta contro gli amici online e offline grazie a un'ampia varietà di opzioni di combattimento.

Name: Sloth Quest
Summary: Control the true king of the jungle as you navigate treacherous vines, battle predators, scale trees and travel to the great beyond. Can you master the precise timing honed by all sloths in the jungle?

Name: Capcom Arcade Stadium
Summary: Rivivi i classici Capcom! 1943 - The Battle of Midway - Logo Wallpaper disponibile per il download gratuito!

Name: Find Love or Die Trying
Summary: Welcome to the only killer dating show where ending up single means ending up dead! Date or die, it's up to your choices!

Name: Against the Storm
Summary: Roguelite city builder set in a fantasy world where it never stops raining. As the Queen’s viceroy, you’re tasked with building and managing new settlements inhabited by intelligent beavers, lizards, and humans.

Name: Tavern Master
Summary: Tavern Master è tutto sulla gestione della vostra taverna medievale. Si inizia con una stanza molto piccola, un paio di panche e tavoli e si costruisce la strada fino a una grande taverna di successo con una cucina, camere per gli ospiti, un gruppo di personale fedele e molto altro!

Name: Crab Champions
Summary: Claw your way across exotic islands combining fluid movement with fast paced combat to become a Crab Champion in this third person shooter with roguelike elements.

Name: FatalZone
Summary: FatalZone is an auto shooter with roguelike and RPG elements set in a savage world of zombies. Exterminate zombie hordes, collect resources, upgrade your camp, and level up mercenaries. Humanity must survive at any cost!

Name: Heroes of Might and Magic V
Summary: Assisti alla magnifica evoluzione del classico che ha cambiato completamente il genere strategico mentre diventa un fenomeno, fondendo il profondo genere fantasy con visuali e giocabilità di nuova generazione.Nel celebre universo di Might & Magic, orde di demoni spargono il caos su tutta la terra in un'assalto inarrestabile.

Name: Forza Horizon 5
Summary: La tua Avventura Horizon definitiva ti aspetta! Esplora i vivaci paesaggi open world del Messico in continua evoluzione. Divertimento al volante illimitato con centinaia tra le migliori auto del mondo. Inizia subito la tua Avventura Horizon e aggiungila alla tua lista dei desideri!

Name: Return to Castle Wolfenstein
Summary: World War II rages and nations fall. SS head Himmler has Hitler's full backing to twist science and the occult into an army capable of annihilating the Allies once and for all. Battling alone, you're on an intense mission to pierce the black heart of the Third Reich and stop Himmler -- or die trying.

Name: Nancy Drew: Treasure in the Royal Tower
Summary: Follow Ancient Clues to Find Marie Antoinette’s Legendary Secret!

Name: Space Hulk: Deathwing - Enhanced Edition
Summary: Space Hulk - Deathwing è uno shooter in prima persona basato sul classico gioco da tavolo Space Hulk di Games Workshop e ambientato nell’universo di Warhammer 40.000.

Name: CooKing
Summary: 8 menus are included in the game, each of which will accommodate 10-12 dishes, accompanied by at least 200 ingredients. All menus take place in the cuisine of different nations. We will turn around e.g. American, French, Hungarian, Italian lands of flavors.

Name: DC Dual Force
Summary: Experience epic-level combat strategy with your favorite super hero or super-villain in DC Dual Force! Team them up with a classic partner – or an unusual ally – to win the day, surrounded by an army of Recruits and in-game Actions you’ve assembled, maximizing your favorite hero’s unique abilities.

Name: WannaMine
Summary: WannaMine - In this game you have to control the virus so he could get around the firewall of computer "firewall" and get directly to the CPU! A winding path makes the game fun and not easy.

Name: Victory Heat Rally
Summary: An intense, retro arcade-style racer that embodies the spirit of classic 90's racing games. Experience high-speed action, vibrant retro aesthetics, and non-stop drifting thrills as you challenge friends-turned-rivals. Get ready for an exhilarating ride!

Name: Oddworld: Abe's Exoddus
Summary: Abe's peaceful retirement was shattered when visited by a vision from the Mudokon Spirit Guides. Abe™ learned the Magog Cartel was mining Necrum, the sacred Mudokon city of the dead, to collect bones to make super-addictive SoulStorm Brew.

Name: Warhammer: Chaosbane
Summary: Affronta le orde del Caos in un mondo devastato dalla guerra e dominato dalla magia. Da solo o con un massimo di 4 giocatori in co-op locale o online, scegli un eroe tra 5 classi di personaggi e preparati a battaglie epiche sfruttando alcuni dei manufatti più potenti del Vecchio Mondo.

Name: Lost Egg 2: Be together
Summary: That fragile but brave egg has come back with new powers. A hard action adventure game about the fragility, bravery, and sometimes friendship of raw eggs. Aim for the frying pan at the end of rolling through various stages with sad and touching melody.

Name: LOST EGG
Summary: The first of low-price series of Kimidorisoft! A hard action adventure game depicting raw egg ecstasy and bravery.Aim for a frying pan that rolls past various stages with awkward music.

Name: Brewpub Simulator
Summary: Lascia il lavoro, apri un bar! Produci birra lager, stout e IPA, servi i clienti nella tua birreria. Arredala, crea le tue marche di birra ed espanditi fino a diventare il miglior locale in città. Il tutto in un rilassante simulatore che valorizza la tua creatività e la tua passione per la birra.

Name: Stronghold
Summary: Tassate, torturate o curate i vostri contadini! Riabilitare i criminali o condannarli? Decidete mentre giostrate ad un sontuoso banchetto, il tutto sotto l’assedio da parte del guerrafondaio Lord Barclay.

Name: ORX
Summary: ORX è una rivisitazione del noto genere “tower defense”, che unisce le meccaniche dei giochi da tavolo e di deckbuilding per creare un’esperienza davvero unica. Costruisci il tuo castello, espandi il tuo dominio e preparati a respingere orde di assalitori dalla pelle verde!

Name: Trombone Champ
Summary: Honk, blow, & toot your way through over 45 songs, collect all 50 unique Tromboner Cards, and uncover the mysteries of the Trombiverse. Do you have what it takes to become the true Trombone Champ?

Name: Valor & Victory
Summary: Valor & Victory is a fast-playing, easy to learn World War II squad-level game system. Based on the original Valor & Victory board game, the digital edition provides you with an accessible and deep challenge, developed for classic tabletop game lovers.

Name: My Garage
Summary: MY GARAGE is a car simulation game with main focus being simulating real car repair, maintenance and physics.

Name: Recontact London: Cyber Puzzle
Summary: Come un cyber-ispettore

Name: Symphony of War: The Nephilim Saga
Summary: Entra a Tahnra, una terra devastata dalla guerra. Tu, appena diplomato e di umili origini, dovrai guidare un grande esercito contro un temibile avversario. Raduna gli eroi, crea alleanze e vinci le battaglie a turni. Utilizza qualsiasi tattica per riportare la pace nel paese!

Name: Retro Machina
Summary: Retro Machina è un gioco d’azione esplorativo per singolo giocatore ambientato in un universo retrofuturistico. Assumi il controllo di un robottino, risolvi intricati enigmi e scopri i misteri di un mondo remoto e dimenticato.

Name: Airplane Mode
Summary: “Airplane Mode” offre tutte le emozioni di un volo di linea di sei ore. In tempo reale. In classe economica. Per fortuna hai un posto finestrino. Allaccia la cintura.

Name: AirportSim
Summary: AirportSim è un simulatore avanzato grazie al quale potrai giocare i ruoli di diversi membri del personale di terra dell’aeroporto. Grafica e operazioni realistiche, veicoli con licenza, aeroporti reali e condizioni meteorologiche in tempo reale creeranno un’avventura indimenticabile.

Name: Garlic
Summary: You are Garlic, an onion-headed boy and you want to climb the Sacred Tower to meet the Cyber Goddess to seduce her...

Name: Nancy Drew: Secret of the Scarlet Hand
Summary: Expose Buried Secrets and Catch a Thief Red-handed!

Name: Causality
Summary: Causality is a survival horror game. You must rescue 3 students trapped in a school full of mysterious psychic phenomena, and uncover the secrets behind therein. The real story behind the school, and the causal relationship of the events, is all in your hands.

Name: The Last Blade 2
Summary: This widely revered NEOGEO masterpiece is finally available on STEAM! Not only a perfect port of the original game, the STEAM version of THE LAST BLADE 2 will allow players from across the globe to fight against each other online / locally in epic battles in online Multiplayer Mode.

Name: Tomb Raider III: Adventures of Lara Croft
Summary: Thousands of years ago a meteor crashed into Antarctica and the shockwaves of its impact are being felt in the modern age. Lara Croft will follow clues leading to a deadly secret, boldly leaping chasms and blasting monsters that no one has leaped or blasted before. This time she faces a mystery that's from way out of this world.

Name: News Agency Simulator
Summary: Manage a news agency and present the news. View the sociological consequences of your actions. Buy sensational news from special sources. Observe the political trend of your channel. When doing all this, be sure to check the channel rating and budget.

Name: Ys: The Ark of Napishtim
Summary: Adventurer Adol Christin has washed ashore in yet another mysterious, isolated new land, inhabited by a people who sport long ears and bushy tails...and are none too fond of humans. Experience the very first 3D Ys game as never before, with a whole new gameplay mode unique to this release!

Name: Cold Fear
Summary: In a ferocious Arctic storm, distress signals are sent from a mysterious Russian whaler. As leading Coast Guard veteran Tom Hansen, you board to investigate  and discover unthinkable horrors lurking beneath the ship's bloodstained decks.

Name: Deathly Stillness
Summary: This is a boring third-person zombie game with no plot，Complete the quest to kill all the zombies. This game is a teaching case game of bilibili Chen Jiacheng, not an officially released game

Name: Chicken Little
Summary: Based on Walt Disney’s feature 3D animation film Chicken Little, Chicken Little the action-packed video game catapults you into the hair-raising adventures of the movie and beyond.

Name: WizardPunk
Summary: WizardPunk is a precise 3D-Fighter with roguelite elements. Adventure mode provides an RPG-like experience, with stat growth and guild specialization. Versus mode provides a more classic 1v1 fighting experience.

Name: VR Sports
Summary: Finally, the definitive sports experience in VR. You can now use controllers to play 8 of your favorite sports with the VR! A brand new yet realistic way of playing sports.

Name: Frontlines: Fuel of War
Summary: Frontlines™: Fuel of War™ is an open-world First Person Shooter set on the frontlines of tomorrow. In a world ravaged by a global energy crisis, environmental decay, and economic depression, players assume the role of an elite soldier in the Western Coalition Army on an epic crusade against the Red Star Alliance to control the last of...

Name: The 7th Guest: 25th Anniversary Edition
Summary: Henry Stauf's mansion has been abandoned for as long as anyone dare remember. Stauf was a master toy maker, a maker of amazing puzzles and this strange house was his greatest creation. Now the mansion stands empty, rotting ever since the children started dying, ever since the six guests came.

Name: Fight Party
Summary: Fight Party is a splitscreen/online multiplayer fighting game that allows combos, weapons and throwable hazards to defeat your enemies. Be the last one standing in the maps to offer, each having their unique theme and style that allows for different strategies and fights to occur.

Name: Insaniquarium
Summary: The craziest aquarium game ever! Tend to your fish, keep them happy and they'll reward you with coins and jewels. Buy tank upgrades or egg parts which hatch different in-tank pets. These pets can help you feed your fish, collect coins, or even protect against the aliens that will invade your tank.

Name: Cooking Companions
Summary: Solve the mystery deep in the woods of the Tatras Mountains. Will you butter someone up first? Or will you wind up on the chopping block?

Name: Blast Brigade vs. the Evil Legion of Dr. Cread
Summary: Blast Brigade è un coloratissimo gioco di avventura e azione in 2D che unisce le caratteristiche dei platformer più intensi con l'esplorazione dei metroidvania. Raduna una squadra di superspie e apriti un varco attraverso un'isola paradisiaca corrotta per sconfiggere il malvagio dottor Cread.

Name: The Darkside Detective: A Fumble in the Dark
Summary: Purifica la stanza con la salvia e metti in valigia la tua tavola ouija da viaggio: è ora di tornare a Twin Lakes, la 34ª città più infestata d’America. Segui il detective McQueen in sei casi da brivido, in cui rischierà la vita e le sue membra pixellate per risolvere i macabri misteri della città.

Name: BattleDead
Summary: District 11 is known for being completely shut down to the outside world, with the level of infection relatively high. The last team that went in weren't sure if the people there were alive or dead. For the world to get back to any normality, you must clean up the district.

Name: Old Coin Pusher Friends
Summary: This is an online cooperative coin pusher game set in the Old japan that can be enjoyed by one or all. Collect Japanese koban and try to win the jackpot! In addition, by collecting prizes, new content is released and coins are easily increased. Online multiplayer for up to five players possible.

Name: From Space
Summary: From Space è uno sparatutto giocabile in solitaria o in modalità cooperativa per squadre fino a quattro giocatori. Libera la Terra da un'infestazione aliena e utilizza armi all'avanguardia in un mondo post apocalittico dalla grafica stilizzata. L'apocalisse non è mai stata così divertente!

Name: Critadel
Summary: Critadel is a futuristic platform/shooter/roguelike with three playable characters, hundreds of branching paths and over 100,000 unique weapon configurations!

Name: Hentaisland: Lost Pantsu
Summary: HENTAISLAND: Lost Pantsu-sparatutto dinamico in un mondo aperto, trascorrere il vostro tempo su una splendida isola soleggiata, in compagnia di belle ragazze.

Name: Gothic
Summary: War has been waged across the kingdom of Myrtana. Orcish hordes invaded human territory and the king of the land needed a lot of ore to forge enough weapons, should his army stand against this threat. Whoever breaks the law in these darkest of times is sentenced to serve in the giant penal colony of Khorinis, mining the so much needed...

Name: Rome: Total War
Summary: Control and conquer the greatest empire ever known to man.

Name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Vegas 2
Summary: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six® Vegas 2 - the sequel to the award-winning next-generation first-person shooter - returns to Sin City. Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Vegas 2 is your last chance to rescue America's sexiest city from an escalating terrorist siege that will force you into heart-pounding action from beginning to end.

Name: Life is Strange: Before the Storm Remastered
Summary: Life is Strange: Before the Storm è una nuova avventura stand-alone in tre parti ambientata tre anni prima delle vicende del primo gioco. In questa nuova, emozionante storia della serie giocherai nei panni di una Chloe Price sedicenne e ribelle nel momento in cui diventa amica di Rachel Amber.

Name: Disney's Aladdin
Summary: Join Aladdin and his pet monkey, Abu, as they race through the marketplace toward their date with destiny. Now, Aladdin will have the chance to spoil Jafar’s devious plans and win the hand of the beautiful princess Jasmine.

Name: Wildmender
Summary: Un gioco di sopravvivenza e giardinaggio ambientato nel deserto. Comincia da una piccola sorgente e coltiva un rigoglioso giardino. Esplora un vasto mondo dominato dalle dune. Saprai difenderti dalle indomite forze della natura e da misteriose entità corrotte e donare la vita a un mondo in declino?

Name: The Ship: Murder Party
Summary: The Ship is a murder mystery multiplayer.

Name: Ultimate Fishing Simulator 2
Summary: The most comprehensive fishing game of all time! Immerse yourself in the virtual world of fishing and test yourself in the fishing technique of your choice! Feeder, fly fishing, spinning or classic float fishing - the choice is yours!

Name: Unsouled
Summary: Take on the role of the Fallen Prince in Unsouled - a stylish, fast-paced 2D action-RPG. Fight your way through interactive environments and adrenaline-pumping encounters as you unravel the mysteries behind this world filled with the undead.

Name: Lifeline
Summary: Help Taylor make life or death decisions, and face the consequences together.

Name: Blood & Bacon
Summary: This Co-op Shooter , has Day and Night levels, multiple maps, players will take on 25 enemy types and numerous bosses, like Gargantuan Monsters and Minibosses every 10 days as you explore, shoot and run for your life against the onslaught of porcine monstrosities.

Name: Midnight Girl
Summary: Midnight Girl is a 2D point-and-click adventure game. The game takes place in France during the Sixties. The story, mood, and style of the game are inspired by the city of Paris, Belgian comics and heist films from the Sixties.

Name: Fart Simulator 2018
Summary: The Fart Simulator 2018 is a great way to have fun for people of all ages and activities. This game won’t leave you indifferent! Fart all that moves! Be bold and no one will stop you!

Name: SIMULACRA 3
Summary: The town of Stonecreek is haunted. People keep disappearing into thin air, leaving nothing but an eerie symbol behind. With the townsfolk gripped with fear, use a missing victim's phone to unlock the truth in the third entry of the acclaimed horror series, SIMULACRA.

Name: Tower of Fantasy
Summary: Embark together on your fantasy adventure! Set hundreds of years in the future on the distant planet of Aida, the shared open-world RPG, anime-infused sci-fi adventure Tower of Fantasy now is officially available on Steam.

Name: Haunted Gas Station
Summary: After a vehicle accident, a man is forced to check a nearby gas station for help, unaware of its ghastly resident.

Name: Vampire Survivors
Summary: Falcia migliaia di creature della notte e sopravvivi fino all'alba! Vampire Survivors è un gioco casual in stile horror gotico con elementi rogue-lite. Le tue scelte ti permetteranno di diventare sempre più potente e di liberarti rapidamente delle centinaia di nemici che ti si opporranno.

Name: Crystal Raiders VR
Summary: Enter the castles where crystal guardians roam. Choose your weapon to fight, avoid traps and solve puzzles to survive all the way through. Play alone or in co-op up to four players!

Name: Farmer Life Simulator
Summary: Run the farm and grow your own crops and have fun living the life of a farmer , or buy new shops to open bigger businesses in the town .

Name: Battle Chess
Summary: It took 2000 years for someone to make chess better!This is an entertainment that will prove the words of the famous Oriental Philosopher Chef Kung Pao who said - "War is fun!"Amusing chess piece animationsA challenging AI with over 30,000 moves

Name: Potion Tycoon
Summary: Potion Tycoon è un gestionale con un tocco di stregoneria! Costruisci e sviluppa il tuo negozio di magia. Gestisci le risorse, imposta linee di produzione, mescola pozioni e vendile con intelligenza per battere la concorrenza. Benvenuto nel business delle pozioni!

Name: Alchemy Emporium
Summary: Benvenuto, giovane promettente alchimista, in Alchemy Emporium! Gestisci il tuo nuovo emporio e diventa il più grande alchimista di tutti i tempi!

Name: Jet Grind Radio
Summary: Tag, grind, and trick to the beat in SEGA’s hit game Jet Set Radio!

Name: Chased by Darkness
Summary: Chased by Darkness è un survival horror cooperativo da 1 a 4 giocatori. Sei stato chiamato a fermare uno spirito bestiale che ha attaccato le persone in un penitenziario. Esplora la prigione, elimina gli spiriti ossessivi e corri il più velocemente possibile.

Name: Pilot Brothers
Summary: Il caso dell'elefante rubato! Un elefante... Un esemplare raro... A strisce. ...Prigioniero da molti anni di un commerciante di animali di nome Carbofosso. E non riuscendo più a tollerare le percosse, scappò, trovò rifugio nello zoo della nostra città. Qui c'è sicuramente lo zampino di Carbofosso! Andiamo allo zoo!

Name: Shining Force
Summary: The land of Rune, in the kingdom of Guardiana, has been at peace for centuries, until the hordes of Runefaust attack. Now, the evil forces of Runefaust are spotted near the Gate of the Ancients. As a young swordsman of Guardiana, find out what Runefaust is after, stop their ambition, and bring back peace to the land of Rune.

Name: Terra Randoma
Summary: Terra Randoma is a turn-based roguelike RPG in a procedurally generated open world. Travel a world full of curiousity and perilous dungeons. Develop your character however you want with skills, talent stones and randomized items while you discover an ancient secret.

Name: One Piece Odyssey
Summary: Un nuovo RPG ambientato nell'universo del famoso anime di ONE PIECE! Accompagna la ciurma di Cappello di paglia in una fantastica avventura!

Name: Moons of Madness
Summary: Moons of Madness è un gioco cosmic horror narrativo in prima persona in cui l'esplorazione scientifica di Marte incontra gli orrori sovrannaturali di Lovecraft.

Name: Hide and Seek
Summary: This is a plot-oriented 2D scrolling horror game, the protagonist will follow the plot development through the red and white worlds to solve the mystery and find the exit. What we want to present is not just a simple gore, but a sad story.

Name: Ann
Summary: Ann, an art student finds herself trapped in the school when she accidentally broke one of the school's rules. With the help of the school's security guard, help Ann navigate her way out and uncover the secrets of the school before she becomes a permanent resident of the school.

Name: Yuki Onna
Summary: Yuki Onna | 雪女 is a PS1 inspired survival horror game. Some children went missing out of the blue. You receive a letter that says, "Come alone or I'll freeze them to death." Out of desperation, you decide to embark on a daunting rescue mission to an abandoned inn up the piercing cold mountains.

Name: Super Magbot
Summary: Super Magbot è un platform 2D in cui... non puoi saltare. Usa i tuoi poteri magnetici per superare in fretta e con precisione i livelli. Goditi l'atmosfera dei giochi a 16 bit, completa obiettivi e preparati a scalare le classifiche mondiali per ottenere la supremazia.

Name: The Devil Within: Satgat
Summary: Join Kim Rip, a Royal Guard whose humanity is gradually slipping away, on a thrilling 2.5D action-adventure platforming journey in 'The Devil Within: Satgat'. Uncover the mysteries of a desolate realm as you engage in stylish battles against formidable foes.

Name: The Complex: Found Footage
Summary: Experience the liminal world of the backrooms through a VHS camera, immersing into a mysterious story and wandering the dream-like structures... Might there be something following you?

Name: Fears to Fathom: Home Alone
Summary: Fears to Fathom is an episodic psychological horror game where each episode unveils a short story narrated by the ones who survived.

Name: The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion
Summary: The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion® Game of the Year Edition (Edizione dell'Anno) presenta il miglior gioco di ruolo di tutti i tempi. Senza precedenti. Varca le soglie di un mondo fantastico, vibrante, dipinto con opulenza di dettagli, più che in qualunque altro gioco.

Name: Holocure: Save the Fans!
Summary: Play as your favorite Vtubers from Hololive! Fight, explore, and clear your way through armies of fans and save them from their mind-control in this unofficial free fan-game.

Name: Frogun
Summary: Join Renata as she adventures across a world of mystical ruins with the titular FROGUN! Frogun is an old-school platformer with the soul of the PS1/N64 era, in which your frog-shaped grappling hook is a your best friend!

Name: Reality
Summary: In this horror action game, you navigate a school at night to rescue a student, all while a mysterious monster lurks. With a bizarre, complex plot, the game's story has been updated for smoother progression.

Name: Dungeons & Bombs
Summary: Dungeons & Bombs - challenging puzzle game where you need to save your king (or princess?...i am not quite sure) and not to blast yourself up

Name: Bingo Hall
Summary: Bingo Hall is the ultimate bingo party game! Use "Local" mode to host your own Bingo parties with any number of people! OR use "Online" mode to host an online game of up to 50 people! everyone can join using any device with a browser, the perfect game to bring all friends/family together.

Name: Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days
Summary: The ultimate digital Vanguard experience that includes an original story set in the world of overDress! Compete with players worldwide with "Ranked Fight," play solo casually with "CPU Fight," and enjoy the game and experience the world of Vanguard at your own pace via many other fight modes.

Name: Samorost 2
Summary: Samorost 2 narra la storia surreale di uno gnomo spaziale a cui alieni dispettosi hanno appena rapito il cane. Imbarcati in una breve spedizione per salvare il cucciolo, incontra bizzarri personaggi e abbandonati alla musica rilassante di Tomáš "Floex" Dvořák.

Name: Zuma Deluxe
Summary: Deep in the jungle lie hidden temples bursting with traps and trickery, and it's up to you to uncover their treasures. Fire magical balls from your stone frog idol to make matches of three or more and clear the deadly chain before it reaches the golden skull.

Name: Etherlords
Summary: Four races of wizards, adepts of four magical schools, collide in a brutal fight for world domination. Etherlords, an iconic strategy created by Nival, became a bestseller in the world and earned highest grades from critics.Etherlords is an exciting mix of turn-based strategy and fantasy trading card game.

Name: Bionic Commando
Summary: The first true sequel to the classic 1988 Nintendo Entertainment System original, Bionic Commando sees the return of the bionically-enhanced Nathan "R.A.D." Spencer. Time has not been kind to Spencer: Five years after his heroic defeat of the Imperials, he has been betrayed by the government he swore to serve, imprisoned for...

Name: Rain on Your Parade
Summary: Travel the world as a cute cardboard cloud and ruin everybody's day! Unlock new methods of mischief in over 50 levels, each with unique setting and objectives. Make new friends and help them too - it's an adorable schadenfreude game!

Name: Enter the Backrooms
Summary: An indie psychological horror experience about surviving infinity. Navigate an endless expanse of rooms, ascend through various levels, gather items and artifacts, avoid going insane, evade corrupted entities, and see just how deep the realm known as The Backrooms goes.

Name: Midnight Club II
Summary: The world's most notorious drivers meet each night on the streets of LA, Paris, and Tokyo. Choose from a collection of performance-enhanced cars or bikes and compete head-to-head to make a name for yourself. There are no rules. Drive anywhere in the city. Find the fastest route to win.

Name: Animus: Revenant
Summary: You, keeper of a long abandoned refuge, must gather the dying memories of an an ill-fated world. Pick up your war hammer. Bring peace to the condemned, silence to the corrupt, and retribution against the deceitful. Fight, farm, craft, collect, end. (* Keyboard & mouse support available.)

Name: Maniac Mansion
Summary: Quick, Dr. Fred's Kidnapped Sandy and he's about to start the experiment...

Name: FIFA 22
Summary: Powered by Football™, EA SPORTS™ FIFA 22 rende il gioco ancora più reale con aggiornamenti sostanziali al gameplay e un'altra stagione di innovazione in ogni modalità.

Name: Streets of Rage
Summary: What was once a happy, peaceful, productive city, has fallen into the hands of a secret criminal syndicate. Looting, random violence and destruction are rampant. Nobody is safe. Despite repeated refusals by their superiors, three young police officers were determined to tackle the problem head on.

Name: X-COM: UFO Defense
Summary: You are in control of X-COM: an organization formed by the world's governments to fight the ever-increasing alien menace.

Name: Grand Theft Auto IV
Summary: Niko Bellic, Johnny Klebitz e Luis Lopez hanno tutti una cosa in comune: vivono nella peggior città di tutta l'America. Liberty City è una città che venera denaro e status, un paradiso per chi li possiede entrambi, ma un incubo per chi non ha né l'uno né l'altro.

Name: Beijing 2008
Summary: Embrace the competitive spirit of the world's most prestigious sporting event and represent your country as you compete for the highest honor - the Gold. The game delivers a far more entertaining and immersive Olympic experience with superior graphics capturing the fine emotional detail of each event where a fraction of a second means...

Name: Turok 2: Seeds of Evil
Summary: Having defeated the Campaigner, Turok throws the Chronocepter into a waiting volcano to destroy it. Unfortunately the blast awakens an even deadlier force - The Primagen. Once again a Turok is tasked with restoring peace to the land and stopping the Primagen from merging Earth with the nether world.

Name: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Conviction
Summary: Ora giocabile sia su PC che su Mac OSX!

Name: Legacy of Kain: Soul Reaver 2
Summary: In this sequel to the critically acclaimed Legacy of Kain: Soul Reaver, reassume the role of Raziel, and travel back through the currents of time into various eras of Nosgoth's past in your relentless pursuit of Kain.

Name: Space Station 14
Summary: Disasters, enemies, and incompetence conspire to make each shift aboard the station a unique and hellish experience. Sign up today to explore intricate game mechanics and enjoy limitless player interaction! (Nanotrasen Inc. is not responsible for injury, death, or worse).

Name: MineSweeper
Summary: Diventa un esperto nello sminamento! MineSweeper è un puzzle game il cui obiettivo è localizzare mine nascoste in un campo virtuale con l'unica indicazione del numero di mine nelle aree adiacenti.

Name: Borderlands
Summary: Get ready for the mind blowing insanity! Play as one of four trigger-happy mercenaries and take out everything that stands in your way! With its addictive action, frantic first-person shooter combat, massive arsenal of weaponry, RPG elements and four-player co-op, Borderlands is a breakthrough experience that challenges all the...

Name: Dark Sector
Summary: Dark Sector thrusts players into the role of Hayden Tenno, a covert operative sent on a dangerous mission into Lasria, an Eastern European city on the brink of ruin that hides a deadly Cold War secret. In the midst of this mission, Hayden is attacked by an unknown enemy and infected by the Technocyte Virus, a brutal bio-weapon that...

Name: NaGongGan Infinite
Summary: Easy and fast play, Feel the primal action of a first-person 3D shooter Once again! Enjoy the Exciting bgm, strange story and play flow. follow the road. There are monster standing in your way, kill them all. And keep going. Check out the end of the road. What will be your destiny?

Name: Decarnation
Summary: Where do you run to when your demons reside within you? Decarnation is a pixel art adventure/action puzzle game with a horrific story inspired by some of the most influential films and novels in the genre. Dive into a breathtaking thriller where nightmares and dreams intertwine…

Name: Empire: Total War
Summary: Domina i mari, controlla le terre, forgia una nuova nazione e conquista il globo.

Name: Fallout 3
Summary: Vault-Tec engineers have worked around the clock on an interactive reproduction of Wasteland life for you to enjoy from the comfort of your own vault. Included is an expansive world, unique combat, shockingly realistic visuals, tons of player choice, and an incredible cast of dynamic characters.

Name: Climb Fall Human Guys
Summary: Immettere ogni scena, arrampicarsi costantemente al punto più alto della scena, trovare cibo per completare l'energia, e andare alla scena successiva.

Name: Legendary
Summary: All creatures of ancient myth, legend and lore are real  they've just been sealed away for thousands of years inside Pandora's Box, waiting... When a thief named Deckard is hired to steal an ancient artifact, he unwittingly triggers a war between man and myth.

Name: LEGO Indiana Jones: The Original Adventures
Summary: Build, Battle and Brawl your way out of trouble! Play through all three classic Indiana Jones™ movies and relive your favorite Indy adventures in the tongue-in-cheek worlds of LEGO®. Explore and Discover - Battle enemies, solve puzzles, and seek out the world's greatest treasures.

Name: Mafia II
Summary: Vito Scaletta has started to make a name for himself on the streets of Empire Bay as someone who can be trusted to get a job done. Together with his buddy Joe, he is working to prove himself to the Mafia, quickly escalating up the family ladder with crimes of larger reward, status and consequence… the life as a wise guy isn’t quite as...

Name: Somni
Summary: Fend off your paranormal nightmares by investigating events and performing rituals to banish the entity for good

Name: Resident Evil 5
Summary: Questo titolo è la trasposizione della versione Games for Windows - Live rilasciata nel 2009. Se acquisti l'Untold Stories Bundle su Steam, sarà come aggiornare la tua versione a Resident Evil 5 Gold Edition.

Name: AnShi
Summary: Grab your hoverboard and explore the ancient, mysterious world of AnShi as you glide across caves, large deserts and old temple ruins to discover its secrets. Featuring stunning visuals and an original soundtrack, AnShi delivers a unique, breathtaking experience.

Name: The Sims 3
Summary: The Sims 3: Create the perfect world with full customization at your fingertips. Refine personalities and help fulfill destinies.

Name: The Coffin of Andy and Leyley
Summary: Walk-n-talk adventure with light puzzling. Brother and sister practice cannibalism after witnessing a botched satanic ritual.

Name: Garry's Mod
Summary: Garry's Mod is a physics sandbox. There aren't any predefined aims or goals. We give you the tools and leave you to play.

Name: Super Bomberman R Online
Summary: Lancia bombe e raccogli potenziamenti in SUPER BOMBERMAN R ONLINE! Gareggia contro giocatori da tutto il mondo in epiche battaglie per la sopravvivenza da 64 persone!

Name: Dungeon Siege
Summary: 'Dungeon Siege®' combina l'immersività di un gioco di ruolo con l'intensità fuori parametro di un'azione implacabile. 'Dungeon Siege' ti calerà in un mondo fantasy tridimensionale senza interruzioni, imperversato da un intero esercito di esseri malvagi: sarà tuo compito fronteggiarlo. Inizierai l'avventura nei panni di un umile contadino.

Name: 逃脱游戏 谎言游戏
Summary: 当主人公醒来时，就发现自己与几位不认识的男女被关在了一起… 此时，一个奇妙的广播响起 「来，让谎言游戏开始吧！」

Name: Summoners War: Chronicles
Summary: Il re di Rahil è in cerca di evocatori per proteggere il regno dal malefico complotto di Tefo. La vostra storia come membro delle Guardie di Rahil inizia ora! Esplora il vasto mondo con i fedeli mostri in questo nuovo RPG d'azione, un gioco di ruolo d'azione ambientato nel mondo di Summoners War.

Name: Enclave
Summary: Experience incredibly atmospheric and intense medieval combat action! Go ahead and enter a new world, the award-winning world of ENCLAVE!The people of Light and Darkness are divided by a bottomless rift that split the earth many millennia ago.

Name: Silent Hill: Homecoming
Summary: In Silent Hill Homecoming, Alex Shepherd è tornato alla sua città natale, Shepherd's Glen, per investigare sull'improvvisa scomparsa di suo fratello. Da Shepherd's Glen alle nebbiose strade di Silent Hill, Alex si troverà faccia a faccia con gli orrori più oscuri, mentre combatterà per rimanere attaccato alla realtà.

Name: de Blob
Summary: Solo de Blob, eroe birichino e improbabile, è in grado di affrontare con salti, rimbalzi e lanci la potente I.N.K.T. Corporation per innescare la rivoluzione e salvare Chroma City da un futuro senza colori.

Name: World of Goo
Summary: World of Goo is a multiple award winning physics based puzzle / construction game made entirely by two guys.

Name: LostWinds
Summary: Usa gli incredibili poteri di Enril, lo Spirito del vento, per guidare e proteggere Toku, un ragazzino, in un'avventura platform innovativa.

Name: Command & Conquer: Red Alert 3
Summary: The desperate leadership of a doomed Soviet Union travels back in time to change history and restore the glory of Mother Russia. The time travel mission goes awry, creating an alternate timeline where technology has followed an entirely different evolution, a new superpower has been thrust on to the world stage, and World War III is...

Name: Final Fantasy XIII
Summary: Final Fantasy XIII is a fantasy RPG in which a band of brave humans struggle against fate in the utopian sky city of Cocoon and the primeval world of Pulse. Follow stylish heroine Lightning's fast paced battles and high adventure in a mysterious new world.

Name: Muck
Summary: Muck is a survival-roguelike. Collect resources, find items & build a base to survive for as long as you can.

Name: RAGE
Summary: Basato sulla rivoluzionaria tecnologia del motore id Tech® 5 di id Software, RAGE è uno sparatutto in prima persona intenso con combattimenti su veicoli a rotta di collo, un mondo vastissimo da esplorare, e una grafica da lasciare a bocca aperta.

Name: Far Cry 2
Summary: Sei un mercenario, intrappolato in uno stato africano devastato dalla guerra, colpita dalla malaria e costretto a fare accordi con i capi militari di entrambe le fazioni del conflitto per rendere questo paese la tua casa.

Name: Sisters of Silent Liberty
Summary: Game Features -Play smart and work together The Sister will Play With You -4 Player Online Co-op -Play Together -look for Clues, Codes and Hints - AI With Different Style Patterns -Play together with your friends or if you have none Like Me There's Single Player

Name: Saints Row 2
Summary: Saints Row 2 brings true freedom to open-world gaming. Players can play as who they want, how they want, and with whomever they want in this sequel to the much acclaimed and tremendously successful Saints Row.

Name: Tomb Raider: Underworld
Summary: Tomb Raider: Underworld represents a new advancement in exploration-based gameplay. As fearless adventurer Lara Croft explore exotic locations around the world, each designed with an incredible attention to detail resulting in breathtaking high-definition visual fidelity that creates a truly believable world and delivers a new level of...

Name: Left 4 Dead
Summary: Ultima novità da Valve, dai creatori di Counter-Strike, Half-Life e tanti altri titoli: Left 4 Dead è il nuovo gioco per PC e Xbox 360 in cui quattro "Survivor" dovranno sopravvivere a un'epica lotta contro orde di zombi insaziabili e terrificanti "Infected speciali" mutanti.

Name: Dark Deity
Summary: Command legendary heroes to reshape a land fractured by broken oaths, reckless wars, and secret arcane powers. Claim ancient artifacts and powerful weapons to empower your cast of 30 voiced, playable characters as they form bonds and battle their way to become legends.

Name: Hi-Fi RUSH
Summary: Metti alla prova le tue abilità in due modalità di gioco inedite, scopri nuove ricompense e segreti nell'aggiornamento Sfida arcade! Goditi il ritmo mentre Chai e la sua variegata squadra lottano contro una megacorporazione malvagia in un mondo a ritmo.

Name: Brütal Legend
Summary: Brütal Legend is an action-adventure that marries visceral action combat with open-world freedom. Set in a universe somewhere between Lord of the Rings and Spinal Tap, it’s a fresh take on the action/driving genre, which in this case is full of imitation cover bands, demons intent on enslaving humanity and Heavy metal tunes.

Name: We Become What We Behold
Summary: a game about news cycles, vicious cycles, infinite cycles

Name: Bayonetta
Summary: L’acclamatissimo capolavoro d’azione di PlatinumGames è sbarcato finalmente su PC. Immergiti in momenti d’azione frenetici e pieni di stile a 60 fps e a risoluzioni in HD sbloccate. L’esperienza di gioco più intensa: essere cattivi non è mai stato così bello!

Name: Braid
Summary: Braid is a puzzle-platformer, drawn in a painterly style, where you can manipulate the flow of time in strange and unusual ways. From a house in the city, journey to a series of worlds and solve puzzles to rescue an abducted princess.

Name: SPORT1 Live : Duel
Summary: Which Team has won the last Champions League? Who scored the “Wembley Goal”, causing the 3:2 at the World Cup 1966? Which record established France in the UEFA Cup season 1997-1998? Do you have the answer for all questions? Then hurry up and play the ultimate Football Cup quiz SPORT 1 Live : Duel and boast your knowledge of football.

Name: Duke Nukem Forever
Summary: The King arriva con un arsenale di armi d'eccellenza, esplosioni gigantesche e divertimento puro e incontaminato!

Name: SEQUENCE STORM
Summary: Free-to-play intense rhythm, racing, and adventure! Play the story campaign, or hang out in the arcade. Play your way with a huge array of gameplay options. What's your rhythm style? Supports keyboard, gamepad, or arcade-style controllers.

Name: GRID
Summary: GRID è un'esperienza competitiva unica. Offre il meglio delle corse automobilisitche ruota a ruota per tutti, ogni gara è imprevedibile come i rivali e le nemesi che sfiderai per poter conquistare il mondo dei motori. Compra ora -accendi il Cuore e il Motore a Mille.

Name: Castle Crashers
Summary: Spacca, picchia e schiaccia fino a ottenere la vittoria in questa premiata avventura arcade 2D di The Behemoth!

Name: Until We Die
Summary: Until We Die is a side-scrolling strategy game about defending your base where you have to run around as Ivan, assign tasks to people, and fight mutants in the post-apocalyptic subway!

Name: Need for Speed: Undercover
Summary: You never thought it would turn out like this. An all-out chase where you're the hunted. And the hunter. Now you must get behind the wheel and risk everything to infiltrate a ruthless international crime syndicate and take them down.

Name: Dragon Age: Origins
Summary: When history tells the story of the Fifth Blight, what will be said about the hero who turned the tide against the darkspawn? Determine your legacy and fight for Thedas as a noble dwarf, an elf far from home, a mage apprentice, or a customized hero of your own design.

Name: Saligia
Summary: Moses, who does not know that he has committed the sin of "Anger", one of the Seven Deadly Sins in Christianity, will pay for this sin with his mind.

Name: BATTLE CRUSH
Summary: The beginning of an explosive action brawl! BATTLE CRUSH is an action-packed game with simple controls and intense battles. Smash your enemies with spectacular skills in this electrifying arena filled with explosive energy!

Name: TasteMaker: Restaurant Simulator
Summary: TasteMaker is a restaurant tycoon/simulator game. It puts you in charge of making your restaurant the best dining destination in town. Build and decorate, manage staff, keep your facilities clean, serve delicious food, and more.

Name: WALL-E
Summary: Based on the 2008 computer animated film from Pixar Animation Studios, the video game version of WALL-E involves playing as the lonely robot as he navigates a trash-tainted world and begins an unlikely trek across the cosmos.

Name: Everhood
Summary: An UNCONVENTIONAL ADVENTURE RPG that takes place in an inexpressible world filled with amusing musical battles and strange delightful encounters. To put it simply: You are in for a ride.

Name: Call of Duty: World at War
Summary: Call of Duty is back, redefining war like you've never experienced before. Building on the Call of Duty 4®: Modern Warfare engine, Call of Duty: World at War immerses players into the most gritty and chaotic WWII combat ever experienced.

Name: Dead Space
Summary: You are Isaac Clarke, an engineer on the spacecraft USG Ishimura. You're not a warrior. You're not a soldier. You are, however, the last line of defense for the remaining living crew.

Name: A Little to the Left
Summary: Un rompicapo rilassante dove ordinare, impilare e organizzare gli oggetti sistemandoli in modo piacevole. Attento al gatto birichino!

Name: Lego Batman: The Video Game
Summary: Quando tutti i cattivi di Arkham Asylum si alleano e si scatenano, solo il dinamico duo è abbastanza coraggioso per salvare Gotham City. Il divertimento dei LEGO, la teatralità di Batman e questa singolare combinazione fanno di LEGO Batman: Il Videogioco una comica ed entusiasmante avventura.

Name: Brothers in Arms: Hell's Highway
Summary: Brothers in Arms Hell's Highway brings the critically acclaimed squad-based WWII shooter into the next generation of gaming with amazing graphics and sound, new cutting-edge gameplay features and a totally redesigned online component.

Name: BioShock 2
Summary: Ambientato approssimativamente 10 anni dopo gli eventi del primo BioShock, nei saloni di Rapture ricompaiono ancora i peccati del passato. Lungo la costa Atlantica, un mostro ha rapito delle bambine e le ha riportate nelle profondità della città di Rapture.

Name: Balance Roll
Summary: "Balance Roll" è un gioco indie squisito. Anche se il gameplay è semplice, ma in realtà non puoi farlo facilmente. Varie trappole e ostacoli, tutti i tipi di sport che ignorano le leggi della fisica, quattro diversi stili tematici e persino un altro mondo orribile...

Name: All Quite On The Bridge - MAD Cliff
Summary: “M.A.D. Cliff - All Quiet On The Bridge” is a VR exclusive first person fantasy shooter. Filled with impressive special effects and exiting game tracks.

Name: More Than Just Chess
Summary: More Than Just Chess offers you the famous and proven board game classic improved upon by modern elements and mechanics, which reveals a unique playing experience.

Name: Age of Wonders 4
Summary: Governa un regno fantasy creato da te! Esplora magici mondi tutti nuovi nel celeberrimo mix di strategia 4X e combattimento tattico a turni di Age of Wonders. Controlla una fazione che cresce e si evolve mentre espandi il tuo impero a ogni turno!

Name: Naruto: Ultimate Ninja Storm
Summary: NARUTO: Ultimate Ninja STORM consente ai giocatori di combattere all'interno di enormi ambienti 3D. I giocatori possono utilizzare potenti tecniche, si esibiscono in acrobatiche manovre evasive e possono persino correre sulle pareti. NARUTO: Ultimate Ninja STORM è stato rimasterizzato in HD.

Name: Aliens: Colonial Marines
Summary: You & your friends are the deadliest killers in the galaxy – the US Colonial Marines. It’s up to you to not just survive, but wipe out the Xeno infestation.

Name: Rise Eterna
Summary: Scopri la storia di Lua e svela i misteri delle sue origini in questo RPG strategico che ricorda i classici giapponesi dell'era 16-bit.

Name: High on Life
Summary: Il genere umano è minacciato da un cartello alieno che vuole usarlo come droga. Tocca a te salvare e collaborare con pistole parlanti carismatiche, eliminare Garmantuous e la sua banda, e proteggere il mondo!

Name: What A Trash Game
Summary: A littering simulator - spreading awareness about plastic waste in waterways through gamification and reverse psychology.

Name: Baby Coyote
Summary: The Arts And Craft Islands Awaits for your arrival, Join Coyote and General Warthog on a tropical Platforming Adventure across this creative archipelago, to save The Craft Kingdom from the Evil Captain Fat Cat.

Name: Fable: The Lost Chapters
Summary: Ogni persona che aiuti, ogni fiore che calpesti, ogni creatura che uccidi cambierà questo mondo per sempre. Fable: Chi sarai?

Name: Valkyria Chronicles
Summary: The critically acclaimed Valkyria Chronicles is now available on PC in 1080p True HD, including all previously released DLC!

Name: Alan Wake
Summary: A Dark Presence stalks the small town of Bright Falls, pushing Alan Wake to the brink of sanity in his fight to unravel the mystery and save his love.

Name: APB Reloaded
Summary: The world’s first and premier Action MMO Third Person Shooter allows you to choose between two sides of the law. Play as Enforcer or Criminal, customize your gear for the task at hand and hit the streets and play how you want in a city filled with more action this side of a Hollywood blockbuster.

Name: Alpha Protocol
Summary: Nel mondo dello spionaggio, nulla è quel che sembra nell'attesissimo ed emozionante RPG di Obsidian Entertainment, Alpha Protocol™. I giocatori vestiranno i panni di Michael Thorton, un addestratissimo – ma inesperto - agente operativo del governo, istruito specificamente per sventare le minacce alla sicurezza del governo.

Name: Darksiders
Summary: Deceived by the forces of evil into prematurely bringing about the end of the world, War – the first Horseman of the Apocalypse – stands accused of breaking the sacred law by inciting a war between Heaven and Hell. In the slaughter that ensued, the demonic forces defeated the heavenly hosts and laid claim to the Earth.

Name: Luna's Fishing Garden
Summary: Luna's Fishing Garden è un accogliente gioco di pesca e costruzione. Prendi pesci, vendili allo spirito volpe e crea il giardino dei tuoi sogni piantando alberi, mettendo oggetti e animali acquatici e portando animali nell'arcipelago.

Name: Epic Fantasy Battle Simulator
Summary: Welcome to Epic Fantasy Battle Simulator, the most immersive medieval battle simulator to date! Throw tens of thousands of soldiers into battle, enjoy the show, or take control of one of them to prove your valor! The only limit is your imagination! Or maybe your CPU?

Name: Martial Arts: Capoeira
