Summary: Per la prima volta, elementi sportivi e GDR sono stati combinati con le caratteristiche di un gioco di combattimento, offrendo così un realismo senza parti e una giocabilità impegnativa e brutale. Allenati fino a sudare sangue e aumenta abilità come resistenza, velocità e forza di braccia e gambe.

Name: Sunblaze
Summary: Lead Josie into her retired superhero dad's training simulator! But beware, the training room might go rogue, and keep you inside... Sunblaze is a brain-twisting precision platformer with hundreds of challenging, handcrafted levels to keep you dying for hours and hours.

Name: Metallic Child
Summary: “Grab, hurl, and eliminate” Rogue-lite Core-Action!! A large-scale rebellion erupts within the spacecraft “Life Stream.” With the help of you, Rona, an android known as “Metallic Child,” stands up against a fleet of massive robots to stop the plot devised by her own creator, Doctor Irene.

Name: Exoprimal
Summary: Exoprimal è un gioco d'azione a squadre online in cui l'umanità, armata delle ipertecnologiche exocorazze, affronta i più feroci predatori della storia: i dinosauri.​​

Name: Century: Age of Ashes
Summary: Century: Age of Ashes is a free-to-play multiplayer dragon shooter. Master a growing roster of classes and dragons, compete in intense arena battles and rule the skies in fast-paced aerial combats.

Name: One-Armed Cook
Summary: One-armed cook is a chaotic co-op cooking game for up to 4 people. Work as a team or cook on your own, set your own pace, and don't let the stress of a full restaurant catch up to you. The goofy physics-based aspect of the game gives this cooking game a new twist.

Name: Legend Bowl
Summary: Legend Bowl is a throwback to the classic 8-bit and 16-bit football games of the past. Take to the gridiron and fight your way to becoming a football legend! Enjoy sim-style gameplay, realistic weather, detailed stats, season mode, tournament mode, fully customizable rosters, and much much more!

Name: Wonder Boy Returns Remix
Summary: A classic action masterpiece arcade game Wonder Boy has been remade into HD! Food is important for a primitive man! Collect all food before your health gets depleted, defeat all enemies, avoid all obstacles and head over to save Tina!

Name: Bitcoin Trading Master
Summary: This is a simulation of the digital currency trading game,the data is synchronized in real-time from online exchanges (such as: GDAX, BINANCE). You can learn how to trade digital currency in this game. The game currently supports more than 100 kinds of digital currency exchanges.

Name: DC Universe Online
Summary: DC Universe Online is a Free-to-Play, massive multiplayer online action game set in the popular DC Comics universe. Become one of a new breed of Heroes or Villains and wield incredible powers as you go to war with legendary characters such as Batman, Superman, Lex Luthor and The Joker.

Name: Flower
Summary: Prova il premiatissimo Flower, ora disponibile su PC. Flower ti consente di assumere il controllo del vento mentre esplori e ti fai strada in ambienti magnifici e rigogliosi usando i comandi di movimento.

Name: SNIPERPUNK
Summary: Grab your Gun and select a Punk in local or online 1v1 BULLET-HELL ROGUE-LITE gameplay! With each round, players pick their upgrades and create a better build to defeat their opponent. Pick your character wisely to use their skills and abilities to WIN.

Name: BloodRayne: Betrayal - Fresh Bites
Summary: The original video game femme fatale, Rayne, has returned to battle and feed in a brand new hack ‘n slash adventure. Slay ghastly enemies as Rayne, the sexy dhampir with superhuman strength, speed, and agility, recruited by the vampire hunting Brimstone Society for one last mission.

Name: The Gap
Summary: The Gap is a short first-person horror experience taking place in a ghostly abandoned house on a lonely street corner.

Name: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War II
Summary: Con un'enfasi sulla giocabilità veloce RTS, Dawn of War II porta in vita l'universo fantascientifico di Warhammer 40.000, come mai prima d'ora. Prova sulla tua pelle la brutalità della battaglia mentre fai progressi nell'epica campagna della razza a cui hai scelto di appartenere.

Name: The Past Within
Summary: The Past Within è la nuova esperienza cooperativa di Rusty Lake! Gioca insieme a qualcuno di cui ti fidi: uno nel Passato, l'altro nel Futuro. Osservate e comunicate ciò che vedete intorno a voi. Risolvete gli enigmi e scoprite il piano di Albert Vanderboom.

Name: Call of Juarez
Summary: Call of Juarez è uno sparatutto in prima persona ambientato in un'epica avventura western. Il giocatore assumerà alternativamente il ruolo di due distinti antagonisti: uno strisciante e fuggitivo Billy e il suo cacciatore, il reverendo Ray.

Name: The Age of Decadence
Summary: The Age of Decadence is a turn-based, hardcore role-playing game set in a low magic, post-apocalyptic fantasy world. The game features a detailed skill-based character system, multiple skill-based ways to handle quests, choices & consequences, and extensive dialogue trees.

Name: Mount & Blade
Summary: Calradia is a land at war, offering great riches and even greater dangers to adventurers and mercenaries that flock to shed their blood on its soil. With courage and a strong sword, an unknown stranger can make a name as a warrior. Free-form sand-box gameplay.

Name: Mirror's Edge
Summary: In a city where information is heavily monitored, couriers called Runners transport sensitive data. In this seemingly utopian paradise, a crime has been committed, & you are being hunted. You are a Runner called Faith and this innovative first-person action-adventure is your story.

Name: Sunshine Heavy Industries
Summary: Welcome to Sunshine Heavy Industries! As the new spaceship engineer, solve increasingly tricky design puzzles with your own personal style. Manage customer demands, juggle budget and ship performance, and survive the questionable decision making skills of your business partner.

Name: Uncharted Waters Online
Summary: Discover yourself in the “Age of Discovery” where you’ll sail out into the uncharted waters! Discover real historical artifacts and mystical legends! Start a company and make enormous fortunes! Fight in fierce sea battles! Whatever your play style, you can play who you want and how you want in UWO!

Name: Tales of Symphonia
Summary: PER LA PRIMA VOLTA SU STEAM – Basato sulla versione PlayStation®3 del titolo originale per GameCube, questo classico GDR è finalmente disponibile su PC.

Name: Syberia: The World Before
Summary: Parti per una ricerca d’identità attraverso il tempo mettendo insieme i pezzi del puzzle di due vite.

Name: Prisoner of Ice
Summary: As you journey to the seemingly placid surroundings of a Greek courtyard or the secret gardens of Tihuanica, beware - things are not as they seem. This supernatural action adventure is sure to pique your obsession with horror and espionage.

Name: The Quarry
Summary: Al calar del sole sull'ultima notte di campo estivo, nove tutor si ritrovano in un'imprevedibile notte di terrore. L'unica cosa peggiore degli individui grondanti di sangue e delle creature che li perseguitano sono le scelte inimmaginabili che dovrai fare per aiutarli a sopravvivere.

Name: Half Sword
Summary: Half Sword is a physics-based medieval combat simulator featuring historically accurate XV-century arms and armor.

Name: S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Clear Sky
Summary: S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Clear Sky – standalone prequel for the acclaimed S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Shadow of Chernobyl, which tells you story about the Clear Sky group, that want to research the Zone and understand it better.

Name: Warcry: Challenges
Summary: Mix Doom, Super Meat Boy and Trackmania in a blender and get Warcry: Challenges, Skill based Time Trial Fast FPS, with challenging short levels and brutal gunfights. Make use of powers (slow-motion,etc) and above all, compete for the first place and improve your skill in over 180 frantic challenges!

Name: FM
Summary: A mysterious radio announcer describes a recent murder-suicide as the unknown protagonist navigates through an ever-shifting environment.

Name: Belko VR: An Escape Room Experiment
Summary: Exploring the themes in THE BELKO EXPERIMENT, the Belko VR – Escape Room Experiment provokes the question: “What does it take to survive at work?” Players are prompted to solve a series of challenging puzzles in order to escape from their office before a microchip in their head explodes.

Name: The Mortuary Assistant
Summary: Con la sola compagnia dei morti... imbalsama cadaveri, scaccia demoni e salva la tua anima.

Name: Assassin's Creed III Remastered
Summary: The American Colonies, 1775. As a Native American assassin fights to protect his land and people, he will ignite the flames of a young nation’s revolution.

Name: Soul Nomad & the World Eaters
Summary: For the first time ever, Soul Nomad & the World Eaters is coming to Steam! With unique gameplay mechanics, memorable characters, and up-scaled artwork, this is a must-have for Strategy RPG fans and NIS fans alike!

Name: Prince of Persia: The Two Thrones
Summary: Il Principe di Persia, un guerriero provetto, fa ritorno all'Isola del Tempo da Babilonia con il suo amore, Kaileena. Invece della pace che si aspettava, trova la sua patria devastata dalla guerra ed il regno rivolto contro di lui.

Name: Hodl: The God of Crypto
Summary: Hodl: The God of Crypto is an 80s inspired side scroller and arcade racer. After Hodl makes you an offer you can't resist, you have the power to move crypto currency prices as you move through the Crypto Dimension. Can you get to the moon?

Name: Quake Live
Summary: From the legendary series that founded the online shooter genre comes the most exciting, energetic, and fast-paced shooter on the Internet. Play against players around the world in over 100 arenas, and a dozen game modes, in one of the most competitive shooters online today. Welcome to Quake Live.

Name: From Darkness
Summary: From the darkness of the forest, bandits and looters will aim to destroy your way of life and demolish your livelihood. With the help of vagabonds and villagers, build a thriving town, raise an army and defend your home. Each night brings with it more enemies, so be sure to keep up.

Name: Idol Showdown
Summary: Made by hololive fans, for hololive fans. Idol Showdown is the definitive fan-made hololive fighting game experience, powered by rollback netcode. Engage in exciting duels as your favorite hololive talent and prove once and for all who the strongest idol is using the game’s easy-to-learn controls.

Name: Into the Pit
Summary: A fast-paced retro-FPS roguelite! As a member of a family of lore-hunting mystics you are summoned to a cursed village, drawn by rumors of a demonic portal. Dark magics have overwhelmed the village, It's up to you to rescue the survivors, grow your powers, and journey forth INTO THE PIT.

Name: Deep Rock Galactic: Survivor
Summary: Deep Rock Galactic: Survivor is a single player survivor-like auto-shooter. Wield the full arsenal of Deep Rock Galactic, take on hordes of lethal aliens, mine riches, and unlock powerful upgrades. It's one dwarf against all of Planet Hoxxes!

Name: RiMS Racing
Summary: La prima simulazione motociclistica che combina una sfida di guida realistica con elementi ingegneristici e meccanici! Pilota le moto più potenti al mondo e ottimizzane le prestazioni sostituendo parti e analizzando i dati in tempo reale.

Name: Majesty 2: The Fantasy Kingdom Sim
Summary: In the world of Majesty, you are the ruler of the kingdom Ardania. At your service are your loyal and somewhat obnoxious subordinates, who have their own minds about how things should be done. In fact, Majesty is the only game where your heroes decide on their own what should be done and when, leaving you to try to control them through...

Name: iRacing
Summary: We are the world’s premier motorsports racing simulation/game. An iRacing.com membership provides entry into the newest form of competitive motorsport: internet racing. Internet racing is a fun, easy, and inexpensive way for race fans, simracers and gamers alike to enjoy the thrill of the racetrack from the comfort of their home.

Name: Shady Part of Me
Summary: Supera tormenti emotivi in una storia toccante, ricca di sorprese e colpi di scena. Intraprendi un viaggio dall'atmosfera onirica, con una direzione artistica mozzafiato e l'incantevole voce di Hannah Murray (Il Trono di Spade, Skins).

Name: Champions Online
Summary: Grab your cape and defend Millennium City in this comic book-style action MMORPG! Design your hero and costume from thousands of costume pieces, face super-villains like Dr. Destroyer, and create your own unique nemesis.

Name: L.A. Noire
Summary: L.A. Noire is a violent crime thriller that blends breathtaking action with true detective work to deliver an unprecedented interactive experience. Search for clues, chase down suspects and interrogate witnesses as you struggle to find the truth in a city where everyone has something to hide.

Name: Crow Country
Summary: The year is 1990. Edward Crow has disappeared. The owner of 'Crow Country', he has not been seen since he unexpectedly shut down his park two years ago. The silence is broken when a mysterious young woman named Mara Forest ventures into the heart of the abandoned theme park in order to find him.

Name: Asphalt 9: Legends
Summary: Gareggia in spettacolari luoghi reali con auto prestigiose (Ferrari, Porsche, McLaren, ecc.) da collezionare, potenziare e personalizzare. Modalità Giocatore singolo e Multiplayer ricche d'azione per i giocatori abili e temerari. Ci saranno aggiornamenti con nuove auto, posizioni e funzionalità.

Name: Coral Island
Summary: Coral Island is a vibrant and laid-back reimagining of farm sim games. Be who you want and experience enchanting island living at your own pace—live off the land, nurture animals, build relationships with a diverse cast of townsfolk, and make the world around you a more vital and harmonious place.

Name: ArmA 2
Summary: 'ARMA II' vanta i combattimenti e le ambientazioni più realistiche di sempre, frutto di dieci anni di continuo sviluppo del motore di gioco. Riproduce verosimilmente le leggi della balistica, la deviazione dei proiettili, la penetrazione nei diversi materiali e, inoltre, simula il ciclo giorno-notte, contemplando, altresì, il vento e...

Name: Nebuchadnezzar
Summary: Nebuchadnezzar is a classic isometric city builder game inviting players to experience the mysterious history and culture of ancient Mesopotamia. In the campaign, players get to rule over influential historical cities filled with magnificent monuments.

Name: Death to Spies: Moment of Truth
Summary: Gioco d'azione stealth basato sulle attività dello SMERSH, la più misteriosa agenzia di servizi segreti della seconda guerra mondiale.

Name: Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare
Summary: The new action-thriller from the award-winning team at Infinity Ward, the creators of the Call of Duty® series, delivers the most intense and cinematic action experience ever. Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare arms gamers with an arsenal of advanced and powerful modern day firepower and transports them to the most treacherous hotspots...

Name: Dwarf Fortress
Summary: The deepest, most intricate simulation of a world that's ever been created. The legendary Dwarf Fortress is now on Steam. Build a fortress and try to help your dwarves survive, OR adventure as a single hero against a deeply generated world.

Name: Nonogram - Master's Legacy
Summary: Master's Legacy - discover all beauty of Nonogram puzzles (multiple game modes, level sizes), master painting skills in Editor and share works with friends in Workshop. Become The Greatest.

Name: Mass Effect 2
Summary: Recruit. Explore. Control.Two years after Commander Shepard repelled invading Reapers bent on the destruction of organic life, a mysterious new enemy has emerged. On the fringes of known space, something is silently abducting entire human colonies.

Name: Warhaven
Summary: Warhaven is a free-to-play, big team PVP medieval-fantasy warfare game. Choose your soldier, lead your squad into combat, and incarnate as a powerful Immortal to turn the tide of war!

Name: Samurai Warriors 5
Summary: Un nuovo SAMURAI WARRIORS sta per iniziare. Dopo sette anni di attesa, ecco finalmente un nuovo episodio della serie d'azione tattica "SAMURAI WARRIORS"!

Name: Dragonheir: Silent Gods
Summary: Dragonheir: Silent Gods is an open-world high-fantasy strategy RPG that takes players on an epic journey where they can discover a dynamic world with high-quality character models and diverse exploration possibilities that include character customization options and branching storylines.

Name: TELEFORUM
Summary: TELEFORUM è un gioco horror in stile found-footage che esplora il lato sconosciuto dei media. State visitando l'appartamento di una vedova per condurre un'intervista sulla morte del marito. Ma non è questo il motivo principale per cui siete qui. È tutta una questione di nastro, non è vero?

Name: Portal 2
Summary: The "Perpetual Testing Initiative" has been expanded to allow you to design co-op puzzles for you and your friends!

Name: Gray Matter
Summary: After a tragic accident, neurobiologist Dr. David Styles has become a recluse, rarely leaving his home, the Dread Hill House. One day, Samantha Everett, a street magician, appears at Dr. Style's doorstep just as he is seeking a new assistant.

Name: Fireboy & Watergirl: Elements
Summary: Help Fireboy and Watergirl explore the 7 Elemental temples!

Name: Wallace & Gromit's Grand Adventures
Summary: Entra nel colorato mondo di West Wallaby Street nella serie di quattro giochi commedia resi possibili grazie a Aardman Animations, i creatori dei cartoni animati Wallace & Gromit, e Telltale, lo studio vincitore di premi che ha prodotto Sam & Max and Strong Bad's Cool Game for Attractive People.

Name: Shelter Manager
Summary: We live in a troubled world. Viruses, military conflicts - you never know what danger the world will face tomorrow. It's time to get ready now! Lead a bunker network and start developing society after a global disaster.

Name: Touhou Hyouibana: Antinomy of Common Flowers
Summary: 今度の異変は二人で一人？ いまだ煽り続ける都市伝説が新たな異変を引き起こす 今度の異変は二人が一人！？ならば二人で解決するしかない！

Name: Only Climb: Better Together
Summary: Non accontentarti di stare per terra? Imbarcati in un viaggio verso il cielo con gli amici in Only Climb: Better Together! Tocca le nuvole con le tue mani e scopri cosa si nasconde al di là, ma ricorda che non ci sono vie facili…

Name: Robo Instructus
Summary: Robo Instructus is a puzzle game in which players manoeuvre a robot by issuing instructions via a simple programming language. As players progress through the game they unlock new functions to overcome new puzzles, each of which can be solved in multiple ways.

Name: World War II Online: Battleground Europe
Summary: ***20th ANNIVERSARY*** Join the only 24/7 community-driven war game over a single, persistent, and borderless map! The only FPS simulator of 200+ different Air/Land/Sea units from Axis and Allied nations, with UNRESTRICTED MULTIPLAYER SLOTS for larger and longer MMO battles!

Name: Rio: Raised In Oblivion
Summary: C'è stato un contagio in gran parte di Rio de Janeiro e per non diffondersi o il governo ha costruito muri di contenimento, quelli che si trovano non potranno andarsene e dovranno sopravvivere fino a quando non verranno scoperti.

Name: RPG Maker VX
Summary: RPG Maker VX allows you to make the role-playing games you’ve always dreamed of by being one of the easiest game engine software ever developed. With its enhanced auto-tile capabilities, quick event creation, and dungeon generator, you can have a game ready to play faster than ever before!

Name: Crysis Remastered
Summary: Adapt to Survive  An epic story thrusts players into an ever-changing environment, forcing them to adapt their tactics and approach to conquer battlefields ranging from newly frozen jungle to zero-gravity alien environments. Suit up!  A high-tech Nanosuit allows gamers to augment their abilities in real time on the battlefield.

Name: Moo Lander
Summary: Moo Lander è un gioco di azion in piattaforma 2D, in cui prendi il controllo dell'ultima nave spaziale terrestre per involgerti alla ricerca della fonte di infinite quantità di latte. Scopri segreti, risolvi enigmi, sconfiggi i nemici e doma le Mucche potenti!

Name: Journey
Summary: Esplora il mondo antico e misterioso di Journey, scoprine i segreti planando sulle sue rovine e librandoti su distese di sabbia.

Name: Red Ronin
Summary: Red Ronin is a Turn-based but fast paced dash 'n slash game where a bloodthirsty ronin and her companion bot search for revenge.

Name: Born Into Fear
Summary: Born Into Fear is a first-person horror game set in an evacuated neighborhood. You'll have to complete task and avoid enemies to destroy the evil Buffer.

Name: Aspire: Ina's Tale
Summary: Intraprendi un'avventura mistica all'insegna dell'introspezione sullo sfondo dell'affascinante paesaggio della Torre. Scopri chi la popola e svelane le loro storie. Manipola gli spiriti per risolvere gli enigmi e guida Ina lungo il suo cammino verso la libertà.

Name: Star Trek Online
Summary: In Star Trek Online, the Star Trek universe appears for the first time on a truly massive scale. Players take the captain's chair as they command their own starship and crew. Explore strange new worlds, seek out new life and new civilizations, and boldly go where no one has gone before.

Name: Planet of Lana
Summary: Una ragazza e il suo fedele amico intraprendono una missione di salvataggio in un mondo variopinto, popolato da macchine senza cuore e bizzarre creature. Planet of Lana è un puzzle game cinematografico d’avventura, contornato da una saga sci-fi epica che si districa tra intere galassie e secoli.

Name: Gothic 3: Forsaken Gods
Summary: n eroe senza nome diventa una leggenda! Myrtana, un mondo in subbuglio: devastata dagli orchi delle terre oscure del nord, Re Rhobar sta difendendo Vengard, l'antica roccaforte degli umani, con i pochi seguaci rimasti.

Name: Fabulous - Angela's Wedding Disaster
Summary: Crea il tuo abito da sposa in questo gestionale a tema nuziale 👰 🤵!

Name: Trails and Traces: The Tomb of Thomas Tew
Summary: A classic point-and-click adventure game full of puzzles and humor!

Name: Escape Academy
Summary: Escape Academy ti dà il benvenuto. Esercitati per padroneggiare l'arte della fuga, risolvi enigmi, hackera server, incontra il corpo docente e prepara una perfetta tazza di tè. Interamente giocabile in solitaria o in co-op con un amico, in locale oppure online!

Name: Wildfire
Summary: Master the elements in this stealth game where everything burns. Use your elemental powers to start fires, freeze water, and move earth as you outsmart superstitious enemies in this mischievous 2D stealth game.

Name: Scene Investigators
Summary: Scene Investigators is a deductive reasoning game for fans of the "true crime" genre. Step into re-created crime scenes, observe closely for pieces of evidence, analyze possible motives behind the crimes, and uncover what truly happened.

Name: Fabledom
Summary: C’era una volta un villaggio... Fabledom è un rilassante city builder ambientato in un mondo fiabesco. Espanditi, fai affari, stringi alleanze con i tuoi vicini o inimicateli, ma soprattutto trova un principe o una principessa con cui vivere per sempre felici e contenti!

Name: Moons Of Darsalon
Summary: Retro action "save-them-all" platformer including advanced physics combined with an unique retro feel. Complete rescue missions leading your colleagues to the closest base station. Fight enemies using your laser gun, jet pack, destroy terrain and even make new paths with the ground maker.

Name: Remnant II
Summary: In Remnant II, sequel del gioco best-seller Remnant: From the Ashes, gli ultimi sopravvissuti dell'umanità devono affrontare una schiera di nuovi boss sovrumani e creature letali, esplorando mondi terrificanti.

Name: MapleStory
Summary: Unisciti ad altri 260 milioni di giocatori di MapleStory, la più grande avventura MMORPG 2D! Gioca gratis subito!

Name: Night Reverie
Summary: Night Reverie è un gioco Puzzle/Adventure in cui un bambino deve risolvere il mistero che si cela dietro la distorsione della sua casa. Esplora ambienti ricchi di puzzle e vai alla scoperta di strane creature, giungendo alla verità su quel che sembra essere uno strano e bizzarro incubo.

Name: X-Plane 12
Summary: Ultra-Realistic Flight Simulation

Name: Bee Aware!
Summary: Bee Aware! Not just another Bee Game! Help the bees get rid of all the bad, bad industrialists on every continent with the use of bags of biological pest control. Earn these bags by playing eight minigames. Games that will surely fit the needs of every casual gamer!

Name: Sniper Elite V2 Remastered
Summary: Pre-acquista Sniper Elite V2 per ricevere un livello bonus esclusivo oltre a due autentici fucili da cecchino extra! (L' offerta può variare in base al paese)

Name: Plague Breaker
Summary: Plague Breaker is a retro roguelike platformer with heavy RPG elements. Pick your class, create unique characters by multiclassing or create your own class with the class creator, all while exploring a procedurally generated castle filled with undead monsters and corrupted plague doctors.

Name: Euro Truck Simulator
Summary: The original Euro Truck Simulator - the game which has become the classic of the genre and is still relevant today. The first truck simulation game in a European setting, with European long haul trucks! Drive freight from London to Rome to Berlin to Madrid to Prague - and many more cities - in realistic vehicles.

Name: Shadow Man Remastered
Summary: He is coming, stalking criminals in the spirit world and the real world. A possessed man is coming, a voodoo mask in his chest and lines of power in his back. Shadow Man is coming, trailing evil from Liveside to Deadside. To stop an apocalypse. To save your soul.

Name: CABAL Online
Summary: The original revolution of action has arrived on Steam. Put your skills to the test in one of the most renowned action-oriented and diverse MMORPG experiences of all time. Play now for free!

Name: My Friend Peppa Pig
Summary: Inizia un'avventura divertentissima con Peppa Pig. Crea il tuo stile, incontra i tuoi personaggi preferiti e gioca nel mondo di Peppa, proprio come nel cartone!

Name: Economica
Summary: Simulatore di crisi di sovrapproduzione

Name: Art of Murder: FBI Confidential
Summary: Diventa Nicole Bonnet, una giovane agente dell’FBI, e accetta la sfida! Chi e l’omicida? Uno psicopatico o magari un uomo meticoloso e molto intelligente.? Per risolvere il mistero devi cominciare a pensare come il serial killer.

Name: BioShock Remastered
Summary: BioShock is a shooter unlike any you've ever played, loaded with weapons and tactics never seen. You'll have a complete arsenal at your disposal from simple revolvers to grenade launchers and chemical throwers, but you'll also be forced to genetically modify your DNA to create an even more deadly weapon: you.

Name: Angry Video Game Nerd I & II Deluxe
Summary: "The most rewarding game of 2013!" Influenced by retro classics Mega Man and Castlevania, Angry Video Game Nerd Adventures features the AVGN and friends as they blast their way through 10 levels of fun, fast paced 2D action based on the AVGN's adventures in his online series.

Name: Students' Horrible Stories: FIN
Summary: Students' horrible stories FIN is a horror game created with RPG Maker XP. Find out what threatens the innocent students and how to resist them.- Iseru, The Presenter

Name: Running Education
Summary: 2D stage obstacle parkour game. Cross difficult tracks using your reflexes. Each episode break will throw you on another map. Find the right way and take our character home.

Name: King's Bounty: The Legend
Summary: King's Bounty: The Legend è un gioco d'avventura con battaglie tattiche a turni ed elementi tipici dei giochi di ruolo.

Name: Men of War
Summary: Men of War è un pazzesco gioco Real-Time Strategy che si svolge durante l'acme della Seconda Guerra Mondiale, costellato da intense battaglie su territori europei e nordafricani. I giocatori possono assumere il ruolo dei Sovietici, degli alleati o delle forze tedesche per portare a termine 19 missioni.

Name: BAFF
Summary: Minimalist, hardcore and challenging game in the genre of avoid-em up that will test your reflexes, timing and planning! This game is hard as hell!

Name: Kandidatos
Summary: Fight in the biggest political tournament in Brazil.

Name: Koa and the Five Pirates of Mara
Summary: Join Koa and Napopo on a 3D platformer adventure through the islands of Mara! Outwit traps, explore the ocean, maneuver dangerous environments, and have fun in 8 wild worlds on their quest to recover stolen pirate loot.

Name: Life after Death
Summary: Do you remember the scares that chased you in childhood? How did your limbs shake with fear, take your breath away, and you couldn't do anything about it? I invite you to live it all over again!

Name: Fear & Hunger 2: Termina
Summary: F&H 2: Termina is oppressive, relentless and hopeless. A mix of jRPG and Survival Horror. Turn-based combat meets resource management. 3 days to explore the wicked town of Prehevil and find out about its dark secrets. 3 days until the pale and sickly green moon rises at its apex. Termina is upon us!

Name: The Panic Room
Summary: The Panic Room offers an exciting hidden object experience and mystery detective story.

Name: BARRICADEZ
Summary: BARRICADEZ is a side-view tower defense game. Collect materials and items underground, craft or process it, and setup a base to protect a baby's cradle from enemies that appear and attack at night. Arrange a wide variety of traps and blocks to build a unique base in the world, and repel enemies.

Name: Deca
Summary: It is a horror game, developed inside the psychiatric hospital Deca. Our protagonist wakes up disoriented, bloody, and unable to remember what she does there. Everything is dark, but she can see corpses lying on the floor and she hears noises, which leads her to think that she is alone.

Name: The Lightbringer
Summary: Il Portatore di luce è un gioco a piattaforme dalla storia avventurosa. È ambientato in un mondo stupendo pervaso dalla corruzione più abbietta. Guidato dallo spirito di tua sorella, dovrai riuscire dove lei ha fallito. Elimina la corruzione, diventa il Portatore di luce.

Name: Plasmoid
Summary: 24 levels of hell. The goal of the game is to collect crystals of the same color in a row. Aim wisely, collect combos, get bonuses.

Name: Help Me!
Summary: Become a psychiatrist, talk, counsel, and treat your patients. The mini-games and dialogues will change, depending on your choices.. Hurry! Your patients await you in Help Me!

Name: My Friendly Neighborhood
Summary: Sta accadendo qualcosa di spaventoso nell'amatissimo programma di burattini del sabato mattina, The Friendly Neighborhood! Gioca nei panni di Gordon, un tecnico inviato a risolvere questo inquietante dilemma. Respingi i burattini e risolvi gli enigmi in quest'avventura survival horror.

Name: Light Infantry
Summary: Play with Glitch

Name: Mage
Summary: Dungeon exploring Wizard action! Learn spells, defeat bosses and escape the evil clutches of Lord Daos in this 2D metroidvania.

Name: Song of Farca
Summary: Hack into crime scenes, look for evidence, analyze data, interrogate criminals, track suspects and deal with the consequences of your decisions. This is a dark and brutal detective story with a Black Mirror-esque atmosphere of digital dominance and the narrative structure of a US crime procedural.

Name: The Darkness II
Summary: An intense first person shooter that delivers a twisted and gripping narrative of tragedy, modern crime drama, and supernatural horror.

Name: Agatha Christie: Murder on the Orient Express
Summary: Sali a bordo del leggendario Orient Express e immergiti nel più famoso abito da detective in una corsa contro il tempo per smascherare l'assassino.

Name: Wizards and Warlords
Summary: Wizards and Warlords is an indie turn-based strategy game, where you play in a randomly generated fantasy world, contending with rival wizards, warlords, roaming marauders and hidden ancient evils. Create a customized sovereign or choose from one of many predefined templates.

Name: Ludus Mortis
Summary: Dungeon Crawler in prima persona ambientato in una versione Dark Fantasy della Roma Imperiale. Crea e sviluppa il tuo party, esplora catacombe, gestisci la tua scuola di gladiatori e combatti demoni e non morti per liberare Roma. Ispirato dai classici cRPG degli anni '80 e '90.

Name: Rogue State Revolution
Summary: Greetings your Excellency. Time to rebuild, reform and prepare for new challenges in the People's Republic of Basenji. In this thrilling political strategy, you will appoint ministers and lead the country to success. Be careful — you may find yourself replaced in the next election.

Name: FOBIA: St. Dinfna Hotel
Summary: Esplora, risolvi enigmi e sopravvivi in Fobia.

Name: The Chatters Show
Summary: The Chatters Show is designed for Twitch streamers and their chats. Create questions sets and play with your chat to see who is the smartest person.

Name: Young Archaeologist
Summary: Our main character is a young archaeologist, our main task is to get to all the fossils

Name: Florensia
Summary: Florensia è un MMORPG gratuito con una grafica 3D superba che con il suo stile anime ti mostra il suo leggendario mondo sia via terra che in mare. Isole misteriose, il grande oceano, sotterranei, pittoreschi pirati e pericolosissimi mostri non aspettano altro di essere esplorati.

Name: Star Drift Evolution
Summary: Race with style in this minimalistic arcade racer. Throw the weight of the car into twisty corners and feel the slides. Beat AI, friends and ghosts from the leaderboard. Choose your favorite playstyle, ranging from classic top down to arcade chase cams!

Name: Momentum Mod
Summary: Source movement speedrunning at its finest. Momentum Mod centralizes and improves upon various community movement game types from various Source games. Play user-created maps, climb the ranked leaderboards, and become a master of each movement discipline.

Name: Study of Unusual: Forest of Secrets
Summary: In Study of Unusual: Forest of Secrets you are secret agent which went to unusual forest. You need to find out the reason of people disappearing. During the investigation you need to unravel the mystery of the forest, collecting notes and documents of disappeared people and try to stay alive.

Name: Hexen: Beyond Heretic
Summary: Mentre ti battevi contro le forze malvagie di D'Sparil, gli altri Cavalcatori di Serpenti erano occupati a diffondere i semi della distruzione in altre dimensioni. Una di queste dimensioni è il decadente mondo dove Hexen è ambientato.

Name: My Military Life
Summary: 전역은 오는가(My Military Life)는 제작자의 군 생활을 바탕으로 만든 추리·군대 쯔꾸르입니다. 저와 함께 군 생활을 하면서 사라진 분대카드를 찾아 무사히 전역하도록 합시다.

Name: Strobophagia: Rave Horror
Summary: An occult forest rave ⸸ Strange rituals ⸸ Enigmatic organisers ⸸ An ancient evil ⸸ Pure Psychedelic Horror

Name: RIPOUT
Summary: Ripout è un FPS horror cooperativo online in cui i giocatori si faranno strada in navi abbandonate generate proceduralmente piene di mutanti in grado di riconfigurare il proprio corpo alieno.

Name: Nancy Drew: The Haunting of Castle Malloy
Summary: Unveil a Ghostly Legend and Find a Vanished Groom!

Name: Yomawari: Lost in the Dark
Summary: Another chapter of the atmospheric horror series has emerged from the shadows! Eerie sound design and shadowy environments set the stage for gruesome and terrifying ghosts never seen before in the series.

Name: The Gallery
Summary: Un thriller interattivo / dramma sociale. Un curatore artistico è tenuto in ostaggio da un ritrattista che minaccia di detonare una bomba a meno se le sue richieste non siano soddisfatte. 'La galleria' contiene due narrazioni – una si svolge nel 1981 e l’altra nel 2021.

Name: Zombies Beyond Me
Summary: Qui si può mentire. Zombies Beyond Me è un gioco di deduzione, sopravvivenza e azione in terza persona ambientato in un mondo post-apocalittico. La comunicazione e il lavoro di squadra sono essenziali per vincere, sia come traditore che come sopravvissuto.

Name: Mr. Hopp's Playhouse 2
Summary: Una bambina deve trovare i suoi amici, rivelare un oscuro segreto e sfuggire ai suoi giocattoli malvagi.

Name: The Heilwald Loophole
Summary: The Heilwald Klinikum used to be one of the most renowned medical facilities in Germany. That all changed when that curious loophole appeared...

Name: The Frosts: First Ones
Summary: An adventure about searching for a missing hunter and meeting with alien beings! Explore wild nature, climb on a rock, lure out a boar, meet a wolf, survive in a rockfall. Heal a deer and trick a creature! Meet the Unknown and find mystery!

Name: 428: Shibuya Scramble
Summary: A kidnapping on the streets of Shibuya brings together a hot-blooded detective, hard-hitting journalist, former gang leader, the head researcher of a big pharma manufacturer and a part-timer stuck in cat costume for a series of events each more unexpected and outrageous than the last.

Name: Mad Father
Summary: Witness the tale of a most foolish family. A remake of the classic horror exploration game makes its way to Steam.

Name: Half-Life: Decay
Summary: Giudicato "Gioco dell'anno" da più di 50 pubblicazioni, il titolo di debutto Valve abbina azione e avventura a una premiata tecnologia in grado di creare un mondo dal realismo impressionante, dove pensare è la chiave per la sopravvivenza.

Name: Mafia II: Definitive Edition
Summary: Vito Scaletta has started to make a name for himself on the streets of Empire Bay as someone who can be trusted to get a job done. Together with his buddy Joe, he is working to prove himself to the Mafia, quickly escalating up the family ladder with crimes of larger reward, status and consequence… the life as a wise guy isn’t quite as...

Name: Behind The Door
Summary: It's a story about a skeptical detective John who's investigating the abandoned's house massacre where group of teenagers were killed. On early night Detective John arriving to the abandoned house to find out what has happened there but suddenly he realized that he is not alone...

Name: Dofus
Summary: ENTRA IN UN UNIVERSO SCONFINATO. Accedi al Mondo dei Dodici e parti per un'avventura grandiosa in DOFUS, un MMORPG in cui il divertimento va a braccetto con battaglie piene di azione e strategia.

Name: Phobies
Summary: Phobies è uno strategico a base di carte collezionabili in cui i giocatori si danno battaglia nel surreale regno del subconscio, luogo in cui si manifestano le paure dell'animo umano. Ricorri a subdole strategie e sfodera il tuo arsenale di attacchi e abilità per conquistare la vittoria!

Name: Yume Nikki
Summary: This is a game in which you traverse the extremely dark world inside a dream.

Name: Arcana Heart 3 LOVEMAX SIXSTARS!!!!!! XTEND
Summary: New playable character "Minori Amanohara" and new Arcana "Ichor" the Blood joins the battle in "Arcana Heart 3 LOVEMAX SIXSTARS!!!!!!"! More new characters to join in future updates!

Name: Escape the Backrooms
Summary: Escape the Backrooms is a 1-4 player co-op horror exploration game. Traverse through eerie backrooms levels while avoiding entities and other danger to try and escape. Free content updates with new levels and game modes keep the community rewarded.

Name: Battle Box
Summary: Battle Box Is An Early Alpha Game that delivers on an action packed and strategy based game play in a top down play style. All Characters are from a animation I am working on called DEEPEST BLUE these characters were killed in battle and sent to the world of Battle Box.

Name: Lights Out
Summary: Blessed by the light, Soona is the last hope of Jiruho. With might and agility, she has to face the dark forces and traps of the Netherworld to save her people from the apocalypse. She will venture inside the city’s temples to recover the fragments of the sacred mirror.

Name: WW2: Bunker Simulator
Summary: Tra le truppe tedesche d’élite e la spiaggia della Normandia si trova un bunker. Sei stato scelto per difenderlo a tutti i costi. Mangia, dormi, cucina, fruga e spara, ma soprattutto resta vigile perché il nemico intrepido non esiterà a sfruttare le tue debolezze. Benvenuto in WW2: Bunker Simulator!

Name: Despot's Game
Summary: Despot’s Game is rogue-like tactics with turbo-charged battles. Build a team and sacrifice the heck out of them to rush through enemies... and other players!

Name: Ember Knights
Summary: Ember Knights è un gioco d'azione roguelite per 1-4 giocatori in cui interpreti dei cavalieri leggendari, ultimi barlumi di speranza contro il folle stregone Praxis e le sue orde di nemici. Brandisci armi e abilità, sfrutta reliquie potentissime e libera l'universo dalla corruzione di Praxis.

Name: Mortal Kombat XL
Summary: "Assapora la nuova generazione della saga di combattimento numero 1. Mortal Kombat X combina animazioni cinematografiche uniche a un nuovo stile di gioco.

Name: The Cecil: The Journey Begins
Summary: Join John and Sarah as they venture to the eerie and mysterious Cecil Hotel for a romantic getaway. But, their dream vacation turns into a nightmare when they fall asleep, and John wakes up locked in a dark cell to realizes that Sarah is missing, and he must find her before it's too late.

Name: Rogue Warrior
Summary: Rogue Warrior is a character-driven, first-person-shooter, featuring Richard 'Demo Dick' Marcinko's explosive personality in an action-packed single player campaign, and intense multiplayer combat. Playing as Richard 'Demo Dick' Marcinko, you go behind the iron curtain to disrupt a suspected North Korean ballistic missile program.

Name: eXceed 3rd: Jade Penetrate Black Package
Summary: eXceed 3rd reboots the eXceed storyline, taking it in a new direction. In this installment, Rayne Lindwurm, a descendent of the Dragon Clan, fights her way through a tournament to become one of the 7 Cardinal Lords who rule her world, Pandemonium.

Name: Jewel Run
Summary: Introducing Jewel Run, the ultimate multiplayer action game that puts a hilarious spin on burglary! Join the heist as two teams with distinct gameplay styles go head-to-head: Will the cunning thieves outsmart the magical orchard's vigilant guards, or will the guardians protect their treasures?

Name: Evil Maze 2
Summary: This is a retro random strategy ARPG. Rich hidden elements, random props, random magic, random maze It's a different experience for everyone to play games.

Name: Sonic Mania Plus
Summary: Sonic Mania è una nuovissima avventura con Sonic, Tails, e Knuckles. Vi troverai tanti boss unici, avvincenti paesaggi 2D e il fantastico gameplay classico.

Name: Now Testing: 407
Summary: A puzzle-platform game taking place inside of a videogame where you can exploit glitches to solve puzzles and traverse outside of the actual game map.

Name: Bomb Party
Summary: "Bomb Bomb! My Friends" is a 3D multiplayer bombing game where you can design your own level and then throw bombs with your friends to destroy it. Try not to fall and you will become the final winner.

Name: Assassin's Creed II
Summary: An epic story of family, vengeance and conspiracy set in the pristine, yet brutal, backdrop of a Renaissance Italy. New low price!

Name: The Bridge Curse: Road to Salvation
Summary: Fear, anxiety, and laughter are the symbol of youth. Experience the true paranormal haunting with your friends from the first-person perspective and stay alive. The Bridge Curse Road to Salvation is an adaptation of a horror film, includes Taiwanese urban legend and an intriguing backstory.

Name: Infinity Square
Summary: Infinity Square is Casual Puzzle Game. Turn tiles and connect lines to clear the puzzles!

Name: Agatha Christie: Hercule Poirot - The First Cases
Summary: Svela una trama poliziesca incentrata sui misteriosi anni della gioventù dell'investigatore Hercule Poirot.

Name: Delicious - Emily's Hopes and Fears
Summary: L'epico viaggio di un padre per salvare la figlioletta!

Name: Lethal Company
Summary: A co-op horror about scavenging at abandoned moons to sell scrap to the Company.

Name: Beside Myself
Summary: You have to play as the historian-journalist Michael, plunge into the atmosphere of darkness of an abandoned hospital, where you will need to unravel the secrets of the past and try to get out in order to tell the whole world about those terrible events.

Name: Freddy Spaghetti
Summary: Meet Freddy. Freddy is spaghetti. Oh, and conscious. Follow along Freddy's story as you plunge head first into challenges and obstacles.

Name: Football Manager 2024
Summary: Il progresso non si ferma quando insegui la gloria calcistica. Nuovi strumenti ti permettono di inventare una formula per il successo nell'edizione più completa di sempre. Prenota ora per avere uno sconto del 10% e l'accesso avanzato *.

Name: 軒轅劍參外傳 天之痕
Summary: *** This Game is only available in Chinese *** 《轩辕剑参外传 天之痕》是大宇资讯DOMO小组所制作的回合制角色扮演游戏，融合历史、神话、五行等要素，以妙趣横生的战斗系统、别具一格的水墨画风，呈现出一个跌宕起伏、百转千回的隋末传奇故事。

Name: Risen
Summary: L'isola di Faranga ha bisogno di un nuovo eroe, tu!Tuffati in un atmosferico mondo fantasy duro e crudo, in cui ogni azione ha una conseguenza. Nell'epico mondo di Risen, scosso da misteriosi terremoti, terrificanti mostri e tesori inimmaginabili, forgia il tuo destino con la spada, impara l'arte del combattimento col bastone oppure...

Name: Pole of Cold
Summary: Pole of Cold is a sci-fi survival horror game set at a research station somewhere in Antarctica. Explore it and find a way to escape death.

Name: Out of the Park Baseball 24
Summary: Play What The Pros Play! Officially licensed by MLB, the MLB Players Inc., and KBO, Out of the Park Baseball 24 is the newest in the award-winning sports strategy series. A sports fan’s dream come true - and the only game ever to win Metacritic PC Game of the Year Award TWICE.

Name: GTTOD: Get To The Orange Door
Summary: L'obiettivo è nel titolo! Lanciati con la tua arma in un mondo virtuale ispirato al retrofuturismo degli anni '80 mentre corri su muri, scivoli, scavalchi e scatti in ogni livello a velocità supersoniche.

Name: Summum Aeterna
Summary: Summum Aeterna è un gioco Roguelite che combina meccaniche di crawler mondiali mai viste prima nel genere con un sistema di combattimento frenetico e uno stile artistico 2D unico.

Name: Metro: Last Light Redux
Summary: It is the year 2034. Beneath the ruins of post-apocalyptic Moscow, in the tunnels of the Metro, the remnants of mankind are besieged by deadly threats from outside – and within. Mutants stalk the catacombs beneath the desolate surface, and hunt amidst the poisoned skies above.

Name: Fears to Fathom: Norwood Hitchhike
Summary: Holly Gardner, a 19 year old on an interstate drive experiences unusual happenings that leads to an unplanned stay at a motel, little did she know what was transpiring down in Norwood Valley.

Name: Divinity II: Ego Draconis
Summary: Dragons: they have been hunted, they have been slain, but now the hour to strike back has come.

Name: Balls Out
Summary: “Balls Out” is a 4 player co-op action games show shooter. Think Rocket League meets Smash TV. Players run from arena to arena collecting cash and prizes while battling hordes of hungry aliens who advance from all sides.

Name: 狼人杀单机版
Summary: This is a game of character reasoning, the stand-alone version of Werewolf

Name: В ПОДЪЕЗДЕ
Summary: Гыгы

Name: Choo-Choo Charles
Summary: Percorri un'isola open-world a bordo di un vecchio treno, potenzialo nel tempo e usalo per combattere un malvagio treno ragno di nome Charles.

Name: Business Wars - The Card Game
Summary: Business wars is a hardcore mix of strategy battles and business theory card game. Use your unique deck facing the business world situation, discover all possible strategy, and be the TOP 1 CEO in the business world!

Name: Wurm Online
Summary: A sandbox MMORPG that has pushed the boundaries on what it means to be open world and stood the test of time. Dig, mine, shape the world around you and make your lasting mark!

Name: Rage Quit
Summary: Gioco di corridore di trappola in terza persona. Il nostro personaggio sta cercando di completare il suo allenamento fisico. Aiutalo a superare la sua difficile missione o sarà Rage Quit!

Name: Hollow Cocoon
Summary: "Trapped in a cocoon, the silkworm weaves her final dream." Hollow Cocoon is a first-person horror adventure game set in 1980s Japan. Immerse yourself in meticulously recreated environments as you venture into the depths of unspeakable horrors that await you.

Name: Batman: Arkham Asylum
Summary: Sperimenta sulla tua stessa pelle cosa significhi essere Batman, e affronta i più grandi criminali di Gotham City. Esplora ogni centimetro quadrato dell'Arkham Asylum, e muoviti liberamente per la famigerata isola.

Name: The Alien Cube
Summary: Una realtà angosciante sta per essere rivelata, qualcosa che l’umanità non dovrebbe mai scoprire. Dopo un misterioso ritrovamento si verificheranno fenomeni irrazionali e strani avvenimenti ti porteranno a dubitare del mondo che ti circonda.

Name: Gal*Gun: Double Peace
Summary: A rail shooter, with a difference, replacing bullets with pheromone shots, and enemies with giddy love-obsessed school girls. Every love letter and advancing kiss drains your energy! Repel them while upgrading your power ups and take part in outrageously lewd mini-games to find your true love!

Name: The Isle Tide Hotel
Summary: Un padre assente deve salvare la figlia adolescente da un’eccentrica setta prima della loro ultima notte all’Isle Tide Hotel.

Name: Party Bots
Summary: Party Bots is an online party game for up to 100 players. Survive on your platform in a chaotic arena and be the last bot standing!

Name: PAYDAY 3
Summary: PAYDAY 3 è l'attesissimo seguito di uno degli sparatutto cooperativi più famosi di sempre. Fin dalla sua uscita, i giocatori di PAYDAY hanno potuto sperimentare il brivido di un colpo perfettamente pianificato ed eseguito. Questo è ciò che rende PAYDAY un'esperienza FPS cooperativa senza eguali.

Name: Grand Theft Auto IV: The Ballad of Gay Tony
Summary: Niko Bellic, Johnny Klebitz e Luis Lopez hanno tutti una cosa in comune: vivono nella peggior città di tutta l'America. Liberty City è una città che venera denaro e status, un paradiso per chi li possiede entrambi, ma un incubo per chi non ha né l'uno né l'altro.

Name: Tile Runner
Summary: Tile Runner, A 3D parkour game. 10 Levels, with increasing difficulty.

Name: Wakfu
Summary: Accedi al Mondo dei Dodici e parti per un'avventura grandiosa in WAKFU, un MMORPG in cui il divertimento va a braccetto con battaglie piene di azione e strategia. Scala il monte Zinit alla ricerca di Ogrest, lo spaventoso orco fautore del cataclisma che ha distrutto il Mondo, o esplora liberamente l'arcipelago dove si lavora senza sosta...

Name: Hourglass
Summary: In Hourglass, puoi creare un tuo clone temporale per risolvere degli enigmi impegnativi. Vesti i panni di Aywa, una giovane avventuriera che si reca in Egitto per trovare il padre scomparso: un archeologo che non è mai tornato dalla sua ultima spedizione.

Name: Super Auto Pets
Summary: Battle against other players at your own pace in a chill auto battler!

Name: Sword Art Online: Last Recollection
Summary: Last Recollection rappresenta la conclusione della serie di videogiochi dedicata a SWORD ART ONLINE e vanta il maggior numero di personaggi giocabili e scenari secondari di sempre!

Name: Extinction
Summary: Tu sei una delle ultime sentinelle rimaste al mondo, un soldato di nome Avil dotato della capacità di affrontare in battaglia interminabili ondate di Ravenii. Affronta mostri imponenti e i loro sgherri in un vasto territorio, difendi le città e salva i rifugiati strappati alle loro case.

Name: Overlord II
Summary: Overlord II è il prosieguo del gettonato gioco che è stato acclamato dalla critica ed è diventato un culto. Overlord II vede il ritorno degli inquietanti gnomi e del loro Oscuro Padrone. Più grande e più cattivo che mai e stupendamente distruttivo.

Name: The Mansion
Summary: After a series of unfortunate events, you end up having to live in an assortment of hotels and B&B's. With money fast running out and with no luck renting a place, you get a mysterious phone call offering you a room...

Name: HellSinker
Summary: A legendary SHMUP influential to the best makers in the genre, Hellsinker is now available on steam in its most advanced form! Gameplay, story, graphics, and even music all united into one cohesive and highly dimensional Shoot-em-up!

Name: Inunaki Tunnel
Summary: Inunaki tunnel (or Inunaki village) is a famous Japanese horror spot where people have been killed or burnt to death.

Name: Picklock
Summary: Join exciting adventure of escaping from cops. Be tricky and use your skills to complete your missions in green town. If you’re successful, you can enjoy well-deserved vacation at the seaside.

Name: Lair of Torment
Summary: This is an indie horror game with first-person puzzles. Terror and fear have enveloped the city. The maniac has returned. You sneak into his lair to try and stop him before he goes too far...

Name: The Front
Summary: The Front è un gioco di sopravvivenza e costruzione a mondo aperto a tema bellico. Nei panni di un ribelle, verrai trasportato indietro nel tempo per riscrivere la storia del brutale dominio dell'impero.

Name: Yuoni
Summary: Trascinata in una vera e propria storia dell'orrore dove il sole non tramonta mai.

Name: Radio Station
Summary: Radio Station is a single-player first-person game in which you have to get out of the existing situation.

Name: Deepest Sword
Summary: Venture deep into the Cavern of Longing in this short-yet-challenging physics platformer. Plunge your sword deep into the dragon's heart! How deep is your resolve?

Name: Corn Kidz 64
Summary: The unauthorized, kid-friendly version of the classic Stephen King thriller (or maybe not, maybe it's just a game about one-horned goatbabies)

Name: The Escapist
Summary: A fast paced die-a-lot platformer

Name: 20 Minutes Till Dawn
Summary: 20 Minutes Till Dawn is a survival roguelite where endless hordes of creatures lurk from the dark. Craft an array of overpowering builds and eradicate waves of Lovecraftian nightmares. Will you be able to survive the night?

Name: Imomushi
Summary: This is not "The Great Adventure of the Cute Caterpillar."

Name: Simple Fish Adventure
Summary: Simple Fish Adventure is an unusual short physics-based platformer. Jump like a fish, think like a fish, be a fish! Overcome obstacles and suffer. Also includes co-op for up to 4 players.

Name: Silent Hope
Summary: Explore, fight, and produce items to grow stronger as seven distinct heroes in this silent world. Guided by the Princess, you'll delve into the Abyss and learn the mysteries of the King and his now-ruined kingdom. In a world without words, what hope is there for humanity?

Name: Mir Korabley
Summary: Immergiti in emozionanti battaglie navali e raduna un'armata composta da più di 600 navi della prima metà del XX secolo, dai furtivi cacciatorpediniere alle enormi corazzate. Cambia l'aspetto delle tue navi, scegli i potenziamenti che preferisci e scendi in battaglia con altri giocatori!

Name: Kona II: Brume
Summary: Québec del nord, 1970. Una strana nebbia—la Bruma—ha isolato dalla realtà un tranquillo villaggio minerario rurale. Vesti i panni del detective Carl Faubert e svela i misteri che affliggono questa regione mentre lotti per la tua stessa sopravvivenza.

Name: Ikki Unite
Summary: With up to 16 players, this is roguelike action, but united! "You can't riot with just one or two people!"The legendary "bad game" that once had people scoffing is back, and this time it's time to unite! This is roguelike action…but united!

Name: I am Future
Summary: I Am Future is a relaxing survival game about building a cozy rooftop camp amid a flooded post-apocalyptic city. Set up a farm, cook delicious food, dismantle tools for crafting resources, automate chores by recruiting cute robots, and uncover the mystery behind the catastrophe.

Name: Ground Branch
Summary: From one of the developers behind the original Rainbow Six® and Ghost Recon® games, comes a thinking-man's first-person shooter featuring in-depth character and weapon customization. Take your time. Think ahead. Get the job done.

Name: The Forgotten
Summary: The Forgotten is a first-person psychological horror game. Discover a beautiful yet eerie environment with secret locations that will keep you on the edge of your seat with fear. Find your friends if they are still alive and uncover the dark secrets of the forgotten valley before they are gone forever.

Name: Still Life 2
Summary: Chi si cela dietro Mr.X? 'Still Life 2' fa luce sul tanto atteso finale di Still Life e coinvolge l'agente Victoria McPherson in una nuova indagine.Nell'inverno del 2008, Victoria viene mandata nel Maine, dove è stato appena rinvenuto il cadavere di Ellen Dunnigan.

Name: Fallout 4 VR
Summary: Fallout 4, la leggendaria avventura post-apocalittica di Bethesda Game Studios premiata con oltre 200 riconoscimenti, tra cui il premio Gioco dell'Anno DICE e BAFTA, arriva interamente in VR.

Name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Security Breach
Summary: In Five Nights at Freddy’s: Security Breach, vestirai i panni di Gregory, un ragazzino intrappolato durante la notte nel Mega Pizzaplex di Freddy Fazbear. Con l'aiuto di Freddy in persona, Gregory dovrà svelare i segreti del Pizzaplex, scoprire la verità e sopravvivere fino all'alba.

Name: Mineirinho Director's Cut
Summary: A really cool 3d platform game, lots of extreme adventures with our friend Miner, now we have the option Double Miner and the adventure gets a lot cooler. Director's Cut version has unpublished scenes that have never been seen.

Name: BioShock 2 Remastered
Summary: Ambientato approssimativamente 10 anni dopo gli eventi del primo BioShock, nei saloni di Rapture ricompaiono ancora i peccati del passato. Lungo la costa Atlantica, un mostro ha rapito delle bambine e le ha riportate nelle profondità della città di Rapture.

Name: Machinarium
Summary: Machinarium è un pluripremiato gioco indipendente di avventura sviluppato dai realizzatori di Samorost e Botanicula. Aiuta il robot Josef a salvare la sua fidanzata Berta rapita dalla banda delle Capinere!

Name: Endless Dungeon
Summary: ENDLESS™ Dungeon is a Rogue-lite Tactical Action game, set in the award-winning ENDLESS™ Universe. Recruit a team of shipwrecked heroes, plunge into a long-abandoned space station, and protect your crystal against never-ending waves of monsters… or die trying, get reloaded, and try again.

Name: Farlight 84
Summary: Frenetico Battle Royale sparatutto con eroe. Interoperabile e multipiattaforma. Con jetpack flessibili, abilità eroe diversificate, veicoli corazzati, uno speciale sistema di crescita in gioco e resurrezioni molteplici, Farlight 84 offre battaglie più rapide con caos e furia maggiori!

Name: ATOM RPG: Trudograd
Summary: ATOM RPG è un gioco indie post-apocalittico, ispirato ai classici CRPG: Fallout, Wasteland, Deus Ex, Baldur's Gate e molti altri.

Name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine
Summary: In Warhammer® 40,000® Space Marine ® interpreti il capitano Tito, uno Space Marine del Capitolo degli Ultramarine e un esperto veterano temprato da innumerevoli battaglie.

Name: Peggle Nights
Summary: Join the Peggle Masters on a dreamtime adventure of alter egos and peg-tastic action. Stay up late to aim, shoot and clear orange pegs, and bask in Extreme Fever glory under the silver moon.

Name: Arcania: Gothic 4
Summary: War covers the southern islands until it finally reaches the idyllic isle of Feshyr. You take on the role as the new nameless hero after your village has been pillaged and destroyed by paladins of the king. Seeking revenge, you soon realize that this cowardly attack did not just happen on a reckless mercenary`s whim.

Name: Heroes of Annihilated Empires
Summary: Heroes of Annihilated Empires - is a fantasy-based game from GSC Game World in the genre of RTS vs RPG for PC. 4 unique races awaits for the heroes, who want to fight in an Epic scale battles!

Name: Call of Duty 2
Summary: Call of Duty® 2 ricrea l'intensità visiva e il caos della battaglia visti con gli occhi di tre soldati che combattono fianco a fianco sugli epici teatri di scontro della Seconda Guerra Mondiale. Call of Duty 2, sequel del gioco vincitore di oltre 80 riconoscimenti come Gioco dell'anno 2003, offre battaglie ancora più estese, intense e...

Name: Land of War: The Beginning
Summary: Assume duties of a young soldier involved in numerous battles and skirmishes with fast advancing German war machine. Become a scout, an infantryman, and a leader. Go to battle on foot, driving armored vehicles, or flying an airplane. Use weapons not featured in any other game.

Name: Freddi Fish and The Case of the Missing Kelp Seeds
Summary: Help underwater detective Freddi Fish and her finny friend Luther solve the case. Explore underwater caves, deep canyons and colorful reefs, and discover fascinating places like King Crab's Castle and A Sunken Ship Out of Time, in an effort to save the reef.

Name: LOVE
Summary: Love is a reductive platforming game with a retro aesthetic and a focus on a challenging difficulty. It has an custom respawn system, 16 levels, 12 track soundtrack, competitive scoring, and a simple-to-use level creation feature.

Name: The Revenge of Shinobi
Summary: After being reduced to rubble by Joe Musashi, the crime syndicate “Zeed” has made a vengeful return as “Neo Zeed”. Upon re-establishing their mighty crime empire, they assassinated Musashi’s teacher, and kidnapped Naoko, Musashi’s fiancée. Joe Musashi has sworn revenge and set out for the heart of “Neo Zeed”.

Name: From the Darkness
Summary: From the darkness is a psychological horror game with a scary atmosphere, the game takes place in an old Soviet abandoned apartment.

Name: Secret Files 2: Puritas Cordis
Summary: The sequel to the award winning adventure hit Secret Files Tunguska. Famine in Africa, floods in Southeast Asia, economic crisis in Europe, and civil wars in South America, the world is on the brink of disaster.

Name: The Cosmic Wheel Sisterhood
Summary: Immergiti in un'incredibile narrazione nei panni di Fortuna: una strega cartomante condannata all'esilio su un asteroide. Crea i tuoi Tarocchi, riconquista la libertà e plasma il destino della società cosmica delle streghe.

Name: Natural Selection 2
Summary: A fast paced multiplayer shooter that pits aliens against humans in a strategic and action-packed struggle for survival!

Name: Zombie Panic
Summary: Immergiti nell'apocalisse zombie con Zombie Panic! Source: un survival-horror cooperativo in prima persona.

Name: Company of Heroes: Tales of Valor
Summary: Profonda esperienza di gioco sulla Seconda Guerra Mondiale, Company of Heroes rinnova gli strategici presentando il sacrificio dei soldati, ambienti distrutti dalla guerra e campi di battaglia dinamici.

Name: Tallowmere 2: Curse of the Kittens
Summary: Lady Tallowmere's kittens have been acting strange. Still, the dungeon's rituals must be carried out. Despite the unusual circumstances, how many rooms can you clear?

Name: Crash Time II
Summary: Con le auto completamente distruttibili, il gameplay arcade, la grafica eccezionale e gli incredibili effetti slow-motion, CRASH TIME 2 ti mette al volante, pronto a bruciare la gomma.

Name: Max Payne
Summary: Max Payne is a man with nothing to lose in the violent, cold urban night. A fugitive undercover cop framed for murder, hunted by cops and the mob, Max is a man with his back against the wall, fighting a battle he cannot hope to win.

Name: Dreamfall: The Longest Journey
Summary: Dreamfall: The Longest Journey, vincitore di diversi premi E3 come miglior gioco del suo genere, è il sequel di una saga iniziata con il premiato The Longest Journey, considerato uno dei più brillanti giochi di avventura mai realizzati.

Name: America's Army 3
Summary: Download AA3 Today and Become a Member of the elite America's Army Team! America's Army fans and new players alike can now experience America's Army 3, the official U.S. Army game.

Name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2
Summary: Il più anticipato Gioco dell'Anno, sequel del titolo d'azione in prima persona più venduto di tutti i tempi, Modern Warfare 2 porta avanti l'avvincentente azione al cardiopalma, in cui, stavolta, il giocatore è chiamato a fronteggiare una nuova minaccia che mira a portare il mondo sull'orlo del collasso.

Name: Nancy Drew: Message in a Haunted Mansion
Summary: Discover who — or what — is behind the mysterious accidents in a house full of secrets!

Name: Trine
Summary: Three Heroes make their way through dangers untold in a fairytale world of great castles and strange machinery, featuring physics-based puzzles, beautiful sights and online co-op.

Name: Marfusha
Summary: A high-tempo shooting game with simple controls! Upgrade your character with cards and defend the gates from your enemies.

Name: Call Of Juarez: Bound In Blood
Summary: IL VECCHIO WEST, 1864. Pur di salvare la loro famiglia, i fratelli McCall sono disposti a uccidere chiunque cerchi di ostacolarli nella ricerca del leggendario oro di Juarez.

Name: Fish Game
Summary: Fish Game is a detailed and highly “sofishticated” aquarium simulator, lovingly crafted *by* enthusiasts *for* enthusiasts! Featuring fish with personalities and dynamic relationships, water quality modeling, and so much more! Made with support from our friends at Smarter Every Day!

Name: The Void
Summary: Only brought to life by scarce sparks of Color, the bleak, grey Void is a peculiar place. The player gets to explore it, get to know the Sisters, Brothers, and other weird creatures inhabiting it, and learn the ways of Color, harvesting it and drawing sigils that change the world around them.

Name: Sonic the Hedgehog
Summary: Il crudele scienziato Dr. Eggman (alias Dr. Robotnik) ha rapito i poveri animali di South Island e li ha trasformati in robot. Solamente un eroe è in grado di sconfiggere il Dr. Eggman e salvare gli animali dalle sue grinfie malefiche: stiamo parlando del porcospino super-figo dagli aculei blu, Sonic!

Name: Drakensang: The Dark Eye
Summary: Drakensang è un gioco di ruolo in terza persona basato sulle regole di The Dark Eye. Drakensang è il primo gioco per PC, da 10 anni a questa parte, basato sul più famoso sistema di ruolo tedesco. Drakensang sviluppa le regole già applicate nella versione 4.0.

Name: Super Meat Boy
Summary: Il platform infame, duro come il granito, giunge su Steam col personaggio selezionabile Head Crab (esclusiva di Steam)!

Name: Dead Rising 2
Summary: The sequel to the million-plus selling Dead Rising, Dead Rising 2 takes the zombie survival horror to Fortune City, America’s latest and greatest entertainment playground.

Name: Need for Speed: Shift
Summary: Need for Speed™ SHIFT is an award-winning authentic racing game that combines the true driver’s experience with real-world physics, pixel-perfect car models, and a wide range of authentic race tracks. Need for Speed SHIFT takes players in a different direction to create a simulation experience that replicates the true feeling of driving...

Name: Catlateral Damage: Remeowstered
Summary: Il primo simulatore in prima persona di gatti pestiferi e distruttivi!

Name: Dead Space 2
Summary: L'INCUBO RITORNA.

Name: Russian Village Simulator
Summary: This is a simulator of life in the Russian countryside, where the player will be engaged in the garden, picking mushrooms and berries, collect firewood, hunting and fishing, brew moonshine and much, much more.

Name: NightSky
Summary: Nominated as a IGF Seamus McNally Finalist, NightSky is an ambient action-puzzle game that offers a gameplay experience unlike any other—cerebral challenges fill uniquely designed picturesque worlds. The player must maneuver a sphere by using realistic physics to advance; each of these worlds is broken into different areas.

Name: Split/Second
Summary: Split/Second is an intense action racing game set within a reality TV show. Competitors vie to be the first to the finish line in a set rigged to blow. Players don’t just collide with other vehicles to knock them from the track, but can also trigger devastating events that alter the race dynamics.

Name: Discovery: A Seek and Find Adventure
Summary: Tira fuori la tua lente di ingrandimento e il passaporto! È il momento di Discovery!, il gioco di caccia all'oggetto condotto da Jerry Landers e la bellissima Jill Summers. Avvicinati alla ruota e scegli l'avventura di oggi! Spagna, Cina, Australia o una di altre tre favolose mete internazionali?

Name: Mount & Blade: Warband
Summary: In una terra devastata dalle guerre continue, è giunta l'ora di mettere assieme la tua squadra di combattenti temprati e buttarsi nella mischia. Guida i tuoi uomini nella battaglia, espandi il tuo reame, e reclama il premio finale: il trono di Calradia!

Name: Smash Cars
Summary: Set on a beautiful resort island, the fast-paced, bumper car gameplay transforms the relaxing setting into a frenzied raceway.

Name: theHunter Classic
Summary: Il più realistico gioco di caccia online mai prodotto. Provate il brivido della caccia in enormi ambienti realistici usando di tutto, dalle balestre ai magnifici fucili bolt action.

Name: Ys Seven
Summary: Experience the first “modern-era” Ys game, now off the small screen for its worldwide PC debut! Features a full party system, dozens of unique combat skills, and a massive overworld to explore. Uncover the secret of the Five Great Dragons, and help Adol Christin save the day once again!

Name: Saints Row: The Third
Summary: Get ready for the most out-landish gameplay scenarios ever seen as the Third Street Saints take on the Syndicate!

Name: Nancy Drew: Legend of the Crystal Skull
Summary: The Search is on for an Unearthly Artifact in New Orleans!

Name: Master Of Marbles
Summary: Marble game with power ups, time goals and unlockable marbles.

Name: Jorel's Brother and the Most Important Game of the Galaxy
Summary: “Jorel’s Brother and The Most Important Game of the Galaxy” is a point-and-click adventure about an eight-year-old boy who lives with his eccentric family in the shadow of Jorel, his handsome and popular brother. Based on the award-winning Brazilian animation “Jorel’s Brother”.

Name: King's Bounty: Armored Princess
Summary: King's Bounty: Armored Princess è il seguito dell'apprezzato King's Bounty: The Legend.

Name: Fallout: New Vegas
Summary: Welcome to Vegas. New Vegas. Enjoy your stay!

Name: Torchlight
Summary: L'avventura ti attende nel premiato debutto di Runic Games nel mondo dei GdR d'azione! Esplorate le profondità a generazione casuale di questa fiorente cittadina, raccogli bottino e avanza di livello per salvare Torchlight - e forse il mondo.

Name: Skull Island: Rise of Kong
Summary: Intraprendi un’avventura per vendicare la morte dei tuoi genitori per mano del predatore alfa: Gaw. Supera ondate di bestie primitive e sconfiggi i tirapiedi del tuo arcinemico. Attraversa l’isola misteriosa e svela i suoi segreti esplorando paludi, cascate, giungle e caverne piene di skullite.

Name: Finding Nemo
Summary: Based off the 2003 feature film, Disney•Pixar's Finding Nemo, play as Marlin and Nemo in two separate major story lines!

Name: Kindergarten
Summary: Welcome to Kindergarten! Have fun trying to learn and share...and not die. That's important too. In a school that's just not quite right, it's important to be friendly...and take out those that aren't.

Name: S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Call of Pripyat
Summary: S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Call of Pripyat is the direct sequel of the S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Shadow of Chernobyl. As a Major Alexander Degtyarev you should investigate the crash of the governmental helicopters around the Zone and find out, what happened there.

Name: Fall of Porcupine
Summary: Fall of Porcupine is a unique story adventure. The collision of work and daily life – an exciting reflection of an unhealthy healthcare-system. Experience the exciting story of Finley and his friends in a lovingly illustrated world and uncover the darkest secrets of Porcupine and its residents.

Name: Kane & Lynch 2: Dog Days
Summary: Pure adrenaline of non-stop action in Single Player, Online Co-op and Multiplayer. Double the pleasure and mayhem with new multiplayer DLCs! (click for details)

Name: Thief
Summary: Garrett, il Ladro Supremo, esce allo scoperto e si addentra nella Città. I suoi abitanti sono oppressi e spaventati dalla milizia del Barone e tra le strade si sta diffondendo una misteriosa epidemia. Guidato da Orion, il popolo finalmente si ribella e scoppia una sanguinosa rivolta.

Name: Hitman: Absolution
Summary: HITMAN: ABSOLUTION segue l'assassino originale nella sua missione più personale. Tradito dall'Agenzia e ricercato dalla polizia, 47 cerca disperatamente la redenzione in un mondo malato e corrotto.

Name: Call of Duty: Black Ops
Summary: The biggest first-person action series of all time and the follow-up to critically acclaimed Call of Duty®: Modern Warfare 2 returns with Call of Duty®: Black Ops.

Name: Serious Sam 3: BFE
Summary: Serious Sam 3: BFE is a prequel to the original indie fast action FPS and Game of the Year sensation - Serious Sam: The First Encounter!

Name: Deepest Chamber: Resurrection
Summary: Rally your party. Build your deck and boost its power and potential. Slay your enemies and protect your allies. Play your cards right and you might just survive the perilous descent into the depths of Deepest Chamber: Resurrection.

Name: 1vs1: Battle Royale for the throne
Summary: Enjoy the exciting story of the confrontation of the crown princes in they battle for the throne. Complete the test in the ancient temple caves to prove your right to the royal throne!

Name: Tex Murphy: The Pandora Directive
Summary: It's April 2043 and you- as Tex Murphy, the last of the old-style gumshoes- find yourself racing against time in the most dangerous game of your life. What is the truth behind the rumored UFO crash at Roswell, New Mexico? Why did the military suddenly shut down and seal off the Roswell complex?

Name: Sonic & Sega All-Stars Racing
Summary: SONIC AND SEGA ALL-STARS RACE FOR VICTORY IN A HIGH SPEED HIGH SKILL RACETRACK SHOWDOWN! TAKE TO THE TRACK BY CAR, MONSTER TRUCK, BIKE AND EVEN AEROPLANE IN SONIC & SEGA ALL-STARS RACING. Explore stunning new circuits including Sonic Seaside Hill, Curien Mansion and Blizzard Castle as you zip around medieval castle ramparts, hurtle...

Name: LEGO Harry Potter: Years 1-4
Summary: Build the adventure from Privet Drive to the Triwizard Tournament and experience the magic of the first four Harry Potter stories – LEGO style! Explore Hogwarts™ School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, learn spells, brew potions and relive the adventures like never before with tongue-in-cheek humor and creative customization that is unique to...

Name: Simply Puzzles: Codewords
Summary: 100 handcrafted codewords designed to help you relax. Solve the code and reveal the answers.

Name: Rosenkreuzstilette
Summary: Rosenkreuzstilette is a mega-action-platformer game in which you step into the shoes of Spiritia Rosenberg, a virtuous young woman caught on the wrong side of a revolution instigated by her closest friends.

Name: Left 4 Dead 2
Summary: Ambientato durante l'apocalisse dei morti viventi, Left 4 Dead 2 (L4D2) è l'attesissimo sequel di Left 4 Dead, il gioco co-op numero 1 del 2008.Questo sparatutto in prima persona d'azione horror è un gioco co-op che porterà te e i tuoi amici tra le città, paludi e cimiteri del profondo sud degli Stati Uniti, da Savannah a New Orleans,...

Name: Black Mirror II: Reigning Evil
Summary: Enter a dark, captivating world as the massive evil of Black Mirror Castle is reincarnated with over 100 atmospheric locations to explore and 40 different characters to interact with. Will Darren's search lead him to redemption or the hell of insanity?

Name: Metal Gear Rising: Revengeance
Summary: Developed by Kojima Productions and PlatinumGames, METAL GEAR RISING: REVENGEANCE takes the renowned METAL GEAR franchise into exciting new territory with an all-new action experience. The game seamlessly melds pure action and epic story-telling that surrounds Raiden – a child soldier transformed into a half-human, half-cyborg ninja who...

Name: FINAL FANTASY XIV Online
Summary: Parti all'avventura ed esplora insieme ad amici di tutto il mondo in un FINAL FANTASY epico e in costante cambiamento.

Name: Romancing SaGa 3
Summary: L'acclamato GDR sbarca per la prima volta in Occidente! Gioca alla rimasterizzazione HD del leggendario GDR del 1995 con grafica ottimizzata, un nuovo dungeon da esplorare, nuovi scenari e la funzione New Game+.

Name: Martha
Summary: In pursuit of your missing colleague your car breaks down. You enter the only house for miles to use the phone. What follows next can only be described as an intense, action-driven fight for survival. What horrors lay within the house? Only one thing is certain: you need to get out.

Name: Dead Past 8
Summary: Dead Past 8 - Survive zombies and unravel island mysteries in this 2023 open-world horror. By day, explore, craft and harvest. After the sun dips below the horizon face stronger, cunning undead. Team up, adapt, and confront the nightmarish challenge. Can you survive "Dead Past 8"?

Name: Tales Runner
Summary: Tales Runner is a wonderfully bright and cheerful racing game set in a world where your favorite fairy tales come to life! Challenge your friends and take some friendly competition to the next level. Race through your favorite fairy tales from all over the world!

Name: Only Up!
Summary: You are a young teenage Jackie from the ghetto who wants to get out of poverty and embark on a journey of learning about the world and yourself. The world has definitely gone crazy, though it has never been normal, but maybe now is the chance for you. Crisis is a time for action and decisive steps...

Name: Serious Sam: The First Encounter
Summary: Serious Sam is a high-adrenaline single-play and 16-player co-operative arcade-action FPS and Gamespot's Game of the Year 2001!

Name: Two Worlds II
Summary: Check out the new Velvet Edition bundle including both Two Worlds II and Pirates of the Flying Fortress DLC.

Name: Arcanum: Of Steamworks and Magick Obscura
Summary: Imagine a place of wonder, where magick and technology coexist in an uneasy balance, and an adventurer might just as easily wield a flintlock pistol as a flaming sword. Welcome to the land of Arcanum.

Name: MechWarrior Online
Summary: MechWarrior Online™ Solaris 7 is a tactical online shooter set in the BattleTech Universe. Assume the role of an elite MechWarrior, piloting powerful BattleMechs, fighting for supremacy over the Inner Sphere.

Name: Total War: Pharaoh
Summary: Scopri l'antico Egitto nell'epoca della sua massima potenza in Total War: PHARAOH, il nuovo capitolo della pluripremiata serie di videogiochi strategici, e affronta i drammatici eventi che ne minacciano la distruzione.

Name: rFactor 2
Summary: rFactor 2 is a realistic, easily extendable racing simulation that offers the latest in vehicle and race customization, great graphics, outstanding multiplayer and the height of racing realism. It features mixed class road racing with ultra realistic dynamics, an immersive sound environment and stunning graphics.

Name: VCB: Why City 4k
