Summary: KartRider: Drift è il divertentissimo gioco di corse di kart multipiattaforma e free-to-play dove le emozioni dell'arcade e le competizioni senza freni incontrano la personalizzazione di kart e personaggi.

Name: Yes, Your Grace
Summary: These are troubling times, Your Grace. The petitioners’ petty matters exceed our limited resources, to say nothing of the war. A careful balance must be struck. Your throne awaits.

Name: Granny: Chapter Two
Summary: You have to escape Granny and Grandpa...You have five days...

Name: Half-Life: Alyx
Summary: Half-Life: Alyx è il ritorno in VR di Valve alla serie Half-Life. La storia, ambientata tra gli eventi di Half-Life e Half-Life 2, è quella della lotta impossibile contro una feroce razza aliena nota con il nome di Combine.

Name: CreatorCrate
Summary: A fast, chaotic, and totally unique platformer with roguelike elements. Outsmart everything that wants you dead with your grabby robot arm. Rampage through a massive circular space station. Grab, stab, block, throw, and devour your enemies! More than run and shoot: improvise and CREATE!

Name: Tools Up!
Summary: Tools Up! è un elettrizzante gioco cooperativo che mette alla prova la tua attitudine per la ristrutturazione e il lavoro di squadra. Dipingi le pareti, strappa la carta da parati e sposta i divani contro il tempo!

Name: Uventa
Summary: The tragic fate brings you, a simple night guard, to an abandoned school. Plunge into a horrifying story and get to the bottom of the secret that this spectre of the long-gone Soviet era has in store.

Name: King of Retail
Summary: Congratulations on owning your very own store! Design your store layout. Buy and sell goods. Hire and manage your staff, take care of your customers and plan the perfect marketing campaign. Make yours the most popular store in town - but watch out, running a store is not as easy as it sounds!

Name: MOLEK-SYNTEZ
Summary: Use the MOLEK-SYNTEZ to create small molecules with various pharmacological effects from the comfort of your small Romanian apartment.

Name: BatMUD
Summary: BatMUD is a text-based medieval fantasy massively multiplayer online game with an extremely rich set of features - constantly in development since 1990.

Name: Metal Unit
Summary: Metal Unit is a sprawling side-scrolling platformer with roguelite features. Play as Joanna, a soldier on a mission to capture her treasonous sister. Wear the M-Unit 11 suit and battle against monsters and aliens while uncovering the truth about humanity.

Name: CountryBalls Heroes
Summary: CountryBalls Heroes is a game where you get to play as your favorite Countryball. Become a legend by leading massive Countryball armies. Create your forces, build master-planned cities, gather powerful artifacts and prove that your Countryball is the most powerful.

Name: Command: Modern Operations
Summary: Command: Modern Operations is the next generation in cross-domain modern wargaming. It enables you to simulate every military engagement from post World War II to the present day and beyond. The scale is primarily tactical/operational, although strategic scale operations are also possible.

Name: Jamestown+
Summary: "... il feeling con le armi, la musica, il ritmo, è tutto favoloso." - Rock, Paper, Shotgun

Name: Vampire: The Masquerade - Coteries of New York
Summary: Vampire: The Masquerade - Coteries of New York is a narrative experience set in the rich universe of Vampire: The Masquerade 5th Edition. It presents the struggle for power between two vampiric factions - the Camarilla and the Anarchs - bathed in the night lights of the Big Apple.

Name: West of Dead
Summary: Scendi nel mondo cupo e sinistro di Purgatory in questo frenetico sparatutto che combina la fluidità delle due levette e l'uso tattico dei ripari. Mettiti al riparo e sconfiggi i nemici in terreni di caccia sconosciuti a generazione procedurale.

Name: Not For Broadcast
Summary: Take control of the National Nightly News as a radical government comes to power. In this immersive, high-pressure, propaganda sim, you control what the people see and determine what’s Not For Broadcast.

Name: Resolutiion
Summary: Un vecchio assassino accompagna un'IA curiosa nei combattimenti caotici e nei segreti misteriosi di un mondo onirico fatto di umani pazzi e animali sani di mente.

Name: Empires and Tribes
Summary: Empires and Tribes is a unique hybrid of a medieval city builder and a role-playing game. You will undertake the duties of a mayor in the 13th century and manage the expansion of your city, ensure the production of resources and raise a powerful army to protect yourself from rival principalities.

Name: Escape the Ayuwoki
Summary: A ritual gone wrong. A string of kidnappings. An Obsession. You wake up in a very strange room, all you know right now is to leave that place as soon as you possibly can. Just be quiet and everything will be alright.

Name: Impostor Factory
Summary: Un tragicomico thriller giallo fuori di testa con loop temporali, varie vittime e un gatto che non la racconta giusta, dal creatore di To the Moon e Finding Paradise.

Name: One-Eyed Lee and the Dinner Party
Summary: Help Beracus and Lee escape a cursed bunker (or die trying) in this point and click, visual novel hybrid.

Name: Starship Troopers: Terran Command
Summary: Starship Troopers - Terran Command is a thrilling real-time strategy game set in the Starship Troopers movies universe. Take command of the Mobile Infantry and do your part in the war against the Arachnid threat. Ensure that human civilization, not insect, dominates the galaxy now and always!

Name: S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Dead Air
Summary: S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Call of Pripyat is the direct sequel of the S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Shadow of Chernobyl. As a Major Alexander Degtyarev you should investigate the crash of the governmental helicopters around the Zone and find out, what happened there.

Name: Skul: The Hero Slayer
Summary: Guide 'Skul' on his quest to single-handedly take on the Imperial Army and rescue his King from captivity, in an action-packed rogue-lite 2D platformer for the ages.

Name: Dreadlands
Summary: Welcome to Dreadlands! A perilous landscape brimming with potential in the form of Glow. Command one of 3 unique factions in this turn-based tactical RPG and play through their campaigns, be it solo or Co-Op, or battle it out in PvP. So far no one has tamed the Dreadlands. Will you be the first?

Name: Master Of Pottery
Summary: Master of Pottery è una creazione a tema di ceramica + gioco di simulazione. Crea opere uniche ed esegui uno dei tuoi padiglioni.

Name: Paunch
Summary: Duelli online uno contro uno.

Name: Wedding Designer
Summary: Wedding Designer è un simulatore per un'agenzia che organizzerà eventi in luoghi straordinari. Un matrimonio, un compleanno, una discoteca o una festa di Halloween in un luogo originale non è un problema. Scatena la tua creatività, usa l'attrezzatura adeguata, allestisci il posto, usa quello che trovi.

Name: Thief Simulator VR
Summary: Diventa un ladro nella realtà virtuale! Prova l'ebrezza di rubare in ambienti liberamente esplorabili. Utilizza grimaldelli e strumenti di pirateria informatica hi-tech. Nasconditi dalla polizia oppure sali in auto e guida come un pazzo per toglierti dai guai!

Name: Black Book
Summary: “Black Book” is a dark RPG Adventure, based on Slavic myths, in which you play as a young sorceress. Fight evil forces in card-based battles and explore the world, where humans live alongside mythological creatures.

Name: Monster Energy Supercross - The Official Videogame 3
Summary: Vivi la stagione 2019 con i team ufficiali in modalità Carriera! Scopri la nuova esperienza multiplayer e le sue modalità inedite, gareggiando sul compound online con i tuoi amici o scatenando la tua creatività con l'editor di tracciati.

Name: The Survivalists
Summary: Un mondo di soprese, segreti e pericoli ti attende in The Survivalists, un sandbox d'avventura e sopravvivenza ambientato nell'universo di The Escapists. Esplora, costruisci, crea e addestra le scimmie insieme a massimo tre amici in una missione di sopravvivenza. Sarai un vero survivalista?

Name: NARAKA: BLADEPOINT
Summary: NARAKA: BLADEPOINT is a 60-player action Battle Royale offering players insane mobility powered by parkour and grappling hook, a vast arsenal of melee and ranged weapons, and a roaster of characters with powerful abilities—transform yourself into a gigantic Vajra Warrior and crush your enemies!

Name: Ruined King: A League of Legends Story
Summary: Resisti alla Rovina - Raduna un gruppo di campioni di League of Legends, esplora Bilgewater e salpa per le Isole Ombra per scoprire i segreti della letale Nebbia Oscura, in questo coinvolgente GDR a turni.

Name: Sons of the Forest
Summary: Sent to find a missing billionaire on a remote island, you find yourself in a cannibal-infested hellscape. Craft, build, and struggle to survive, alone or with friends, in this terrifying new open-world survival horror simulator.

Name: First Class Trouble
Summary: First Class Trouble is a party game where players must work together and against each other to survive a disaster. The goal is to shut down a deadly A.I. Some players are impostors, secretly playing as human-looking killer robots intent on betraying the other players.

Name: Golf Around!
Summary: Golf Around! È un'avventura multigiocatore di minigolf con campi da golf pazzeschi. Include anche la possibilità di creare facilmente livelli personalizzati in cui giocare!

Name: Weird West
Summary: Sopravvivi e svela i misteri di Weird West attraverso i destini incrociati dei suoi eroi fuori dal comune, in un GDR d'azione dai co-creatori di Dishonored e Prey.

Name: Best Friend Forever
Summary: Ever wanted to raise a pup and somehow navigate the mysteries of human dating at the same time? Meet the colourful cast of Rainbow Bay, date a few cuties, and teach a new dog new tricks - maybe even a flip. With the power of dogs and millennial woes on your side, this isn't a game to miss!

Name: Röki
Summary: Röki è un'avventura mozzafiato nella natura selvaggia e innevata. Nei panni di Tove dovrai esplorare un mondo sconosciuto, fra antiche leggende e creature misteriose. Risolvi enigmi, raccogli insoliti oggetti e rivela una storia tragica e dolorosa, fino a trovare la strada per la redenzione.

Name: Era Of Newborns
Summary: In Era Of Newborns we will survive with newborns. We will cut trees and explore the mines and we will build our own place. In the wild nature we will feed our stomach, we will create armors and we will find Epic equipment in Mysterious Caves. Are You Ready?

Name: Suite 776
Summary: A pure terror with a twisted backstory; jumping straight into the horrors surrounding Suite 776.

Name: Imperiums: Greek Wars
Summary: Imperiums: Greek Wars è una combinazione unica tra gioco strategico a turni 4X e gioco strategico su vasta scala, con in più un tocco mitologico. Esplora il mondo antico guidando il tuo popolo. Sopravvivi, espanditi, conquista... e trionfa!

Name: Fireworks Mania
Summary: FIREWORKS MANIA è un gioco simulativo casual esplosivo in cui giochi con i fuochi d'artificio, crei bellissimi spettacoli pirotecnici o semplicemente fai esplodere cose.

Name: Music Escape
Summary: Music Escape is an action-packed rhythm-combat virtual reality game with ninjas, cyberpunk weapons, and suicidal exploding robots!

Name: Hand Simulator: Survival
Summary: Wild island. Thirst and hunger. Dangerous animals and insects. The perfect place to test your survival skills, especially if you only have empty hands, especially if it is a hand simulator.

Name: Gatewalkers
Summary: Gatewalkers is a cooperative action RPG game with survival elements, where players travel across different worlds in order to save their own. Explore procedurally generated worlds, face hostile inhabitants, face challenges like extreme weather conditions, toxic atmosphere, lack of water and more.

Name: Trepang2
Summary: Trepang2 is a thrilling and graphical First-Person Shooter. Dodge bullets, sneak in the shadows, punch, kick and slide while unleashing your deadly gun skills on the bad guys who took everything from you…

Name: Tainted Grail
Summary: A unique, infinitely replayable, story-driven hybrid between a deck-building Roguelike and an RPG game. Explore the ever-changing maps, fight with deadly enemies, and learn what happened to the cursed island of Avalon.

Name: DreadOut 2
Summary: A third-person horror adventure that draws inspiration from Indonesian urban legend. Play as Linda, a high school student with the ability to sense and see ghosts. This spine-chilling sequel expands on the cult hit original, making DreadOut 2 another terrifying addition to the horror genre.

Name: LEGO Builder's Journey
Summary: LEGO Builder’s Journey è un puzzle game geometrico e suggestivo, che a volte ci chiede di seguire le istruzioni, mentre altre volte... di infrangere le regole.

Name: Fear the Dark Unknown
Summary: L’orologio si è attivato e il gioco per la sopravvivenza non si può più fermare. James e Chloe sono i prescelti e nulla sarà più uguale a prima, dopo aver scoperto l’Oscuro Sconosciuto.

Name: Soulstone Survivors
Summary: Face the Lords of the Void and their endless minions, collect their Soulstones and become a god! In this Action Roguelite, unveil secret spells, craft mighty weapons, unlock multiple characters, discover game-breaking synergies and conquer the power of the void.

Name: Little Witch in the Woods
Summary: Little Witch in the Woods tells the story of Ellie, an apprentice witch. Explore the mystical forest, help the charming residents, and experience the daily life of the witch.

Name: SYNCED
Summary: SYNCED è uno sparatutto cooperativo gratuito ambientato nel futuro, sviluppato da NExT Studios e pubblicato da Level Infinite. Scenderai in campo con la tua squadra o in singolo col nano al tuo servizio. Esplora il mondo ormai collassato in combattimenti PvE e PvP intensi.

Name: SIMULACRA 2
Summary: Un influencer morto. Un detective ossessionato. Tre sospetti. Ricostruisci la verità tramite i messaggi, i video e le attività sui social della vittima in questo seguito dell’acclamatissimo SIMULACRA.

Name: The World is Your Weapon
Summary: Wells, pitfalls, houses, villagers, monsters (!?), anything around you can be a weapon! An action RPG that you've never seen before, you can fight with all the objects you see in the game. There are more than 300 kinds of weapons.Aim to complete the weapon gallery!

Name: Cart Racer
Summary: Get a new gaming experience as a racer in a shopping cart! Play for the brutal and steep Cart Racer. Overcome obstacles in the city, in the sea, in the ancient castle and the snowy mountains!

Name: Lightmatter
Summary: Un rompicapo in prima persona dove le ombre uccidono. Guarda dove metti i piedi o sarai inghiottito dalle tenebre.

Name: Wild Animal Sports Day
Summary: All your favourite Wild Animals are competing for the title of Wild Animal Champion of Champions! Tennis, Hurdles, Darts, Diving, Skiing, Pole-Vault, Trampolining and for the first time in a game Rhythmic Gymnastics! But watch out for King Croc! Wild Animal Sports Day (WASD) is out now!

Name: Lumberjack Simulator
Summary: Siete pronti a mettere alla prova le vostre capacità forestali e di sfruttamento forestale? In questo gioco di simulazione, si naviga in un mondo aperto, i veicoli e gli alberi sono conformi alla fisica del mondo reale.

Name: Paranormal HK
Summary: Paranormal HK is a first person horror game about Urban legends of Hong Kong, China. The story is about a crew of online supernatural channel“Beyond the Invisible” went to Kowloon Walled City to film a short movie for their latest episode and encountered something out of their expectations.

Name: MMORPG Tycoon 2
Summary: MMORPG Tycoon 2 is a single-player world-builder game about creating the greatest MMORPG of all time – yours.

Name: Araha : Curse of Yieun Island
Summary: Araha: Curse of Yieun Island is a survival horror game. You will explore the hospital on an island as 'the Boy' who is looking for his sister. Starting from the abandoned hospital, You will journey through the cursed island covering the Sharman's sanctum, Cemetary in the mountainside and more.

Name: Iron Danger
Summary: Iron Danger è un gioco di combattimenti tattici, in cui potrai sfruttare a tuo vantaggio alcune tecniche di manipolazione temporale davvero uniche. Se cerchi la strategia dei giochi a turni e l'azione di quelli in tempo reale, Iron Danger ti piacerà.

Name: Sayri: The Beginning
Summary: Sayri: The Beginning aims to warm your heart and whisk you away on a colorful journey to a new home, filled with emotion and wonder. Experience a beautiful, living world where friendship is the only recipe for surviving the unknown.

Name: Wide Ocean Big Jacket
Summary: A Camping Story starring: Uncle Brad, Aunt Cloanne, Mord (and Ben)

Name: Shing!
Summary: Mettiti alla prova nel sistema di combattimento da picchiaduro più emozionante e coinvolgente di sempre: diventa un formidabile ninja e fai a fette i demoni con stile!

Name: Kill It With Fire
Summary: Kill It With Fire è un gioco d'azione in prima persona sulla caccia ai ragni e il danno collaterale.

Name: Spacebase Startopia
Summary: Spacebase Startopia affascina con il suo mix originale di simulazione economica e strategia di creazione di un impero accoppiata con classiche schermaglie RTS e una buona dose di umorismo.

Name: The White Door
Summary: Gioca a The White Door e scopri l'universo di Rusty Lake in un nuovo titolo dallo stile unico! Esplora i sogni di Robert Hill ed aiutalo a ritrovare i suoi ricordi perduti. Riuscirai a sopravvivere alla severa routine giornaliera, e a riportare colore nella vita di Robert?

Name: Bartender VR Simulator
Summary: 🍸 Bartender VR Simulator offers you a unique combination of a simulator, bartending course and incredible immersive VR game.

Name: The Walking Dead: Saints & Sinners
Summary: Saints & Sinners is a game unlike any other in The Walking Dead universe. Every challenge you face and decision you make is driven by YOU. Fight the undead, scavenge through the flooded ruins of New Orleans, and face gut-wrenching choices for you and the other survivors. Live The Walking Dead.

Name: Songs of Syx
Summary: Songs of Syx is a fantasy city-builder where you start off as an insignificant colony and build, scheme, and fight your way towards a metropolis and empire. The mechanics are complex and true to life, where small events can spiral into the collapse of kingdoms. Try the unlimited demo first!

Name: some some convenience store
Summary: A game about starting a relationship while working part-time at a convenience store

Name: Panzer Corps 2
Summary: Panzer Corps 2 is the ultimate Second World War strategy game! Enjoy the time-proven gameplay formula which has been appreciated by millions of players over the years, brought to a whole new level of refinement up to the latest technical standards.

Name: Black Skylands
Summary: Build your skyship and explore the open world, fight factions of pirates and monsters, claim your territory by foot or by your flying vessel. You're the captain and the sky is the limit in this skypunk Open World action adventure!

Name: Landlord's Super
Summary: Your quintessential construction simulator is here. Take a dodgy loan, restore a property, move in the locals, attend to their grievances, then celebrate with a pint in this fully-simulated, open-world 1980's Britain.

Name: New Super Lucky's Tale
Summary: Un incantevole gioco a piattaforme per qualsiasi età che segue le avventure di Lucky, un eroe ottimista, pieno di energia e semplicemente adorabile. La sua missione è quella di trovare la sua forza interiore e aiutare sua sorella a salvare il Libro delle Ere da Jinx. Jinx è un nemico misterioso con un losco fine: riplasmare il mondo.

Name: Lurk in the Dark: Prologue
Summary: A town flourished with woodworking and mining, "Babel's Hill Top". A Ruggles family who contributed greatly to the development of this town several centuries ago. The tragedy that happened at the residence of them. In this residence where blood and hatred are ingrained, their nightmare begins.

Name: TASOMACHI: Behind the Twilight
Summary: Yukumo is a young girl traversing the world in her beloved airship. Upon arriving at a certain town, her airship breaks down. She decides to explore the town to search for parts for repair; however, the town has fallen silent, with no trace of its inhabitants...

Name: Prison Princess
Summary: Lead two captured princesses to solve puzzles and escape the Demon King's castle. Your actions alone as a hero will decide their fates, and your own! A ghostly sliver of your former self, can you rescue the princesses? A new escape game experience, with cute girls, puzzles, and 'special' events.

Name: Death and Taxes
Summary: In this 2D, short narrative-based game, you assume the role of the Grim Reaper... on an office job. Your job is to decide which people are going to live or die. The consequences of your choices are yours to bear, while the mystery of your incarnation awaits revelation!

Name: Table Manners
Summary: Scorri a destra per scoprire Table Manners, il nuovissimo simulatore di appuntamenti basato sulla fisica! Stasera hai un appuntamento nel ristorante più bello della città. C'è solo un problema: sei una mano priva di corpo con un talento naturale per i disastri!

Name: Turnip Boy Commits Tax Evasion
Summary: Gioca nei panni di un’adorabile rapa combinaguai. Evadi le tasse, risolvi “plantastici” rompicapi e sconfiggi bestie enormi per smantellare l’amministrazione di un vegetale corrotto!

Name: Secret Government
Summary: A grand strategy game about leading a secret society that has ruled humankind from the shadows for centuries. Rewrite history as you pull the strings of fate and spread your influence across the globe, shaping the world's nations and future to your will from the 17th century to the present day.

Name: King's Bounty II
Summary: La leggenda ritorna! King's Bounty II è l'attesissimo sequel della leggendaria serie di videogame King's Bounty, una delle saghe più uniche del genere GDR a turni.

Name: Grounded
Summary: The world is a vast, beautiful and dangerous place – especially when you have been shrunk to the size of an ant. Can you thrive alongside the hordes of giant insects, fighting to survive the perils of the backyard?

Name: Bendy and the Dark Revival
Summary: Bendy and the Dark Revival® is a first-person survival horror game set in the creepiest cartoon studio to ever exist. Discover the truth. Escape the studio. Above all, fear the Ink Demon…and survive.

Name: Monster Train
Summary: Monster Train is a strategic roguelike deck building game with a twist. Set on a train to hell, you’ll use tactical decision making to defend multiple vertical battlegrounds. With real time competitive multiplayer and endless replayability, Monster Train is always on time.

Name: Deadside
Summary: Deadside is a hardcore multiplayer shooter with survival elements. Post-Apocalypse, PvP, PvE, open world, realistic weapons, craft, base...

Name: Mad Experiments: Escape Room
Summary: Mad Experiments: Escape Room is a multiplayer narrative escape game made for advanced players. Alone or with teammates, you have 60 minutes to explore, solve, and escape!

Name: Shattered Pixel Dungeon
Summary: Pixel Dungeon is an exciting and extremely popular roguelike (more than 2 million mobile installs!). Explore the depths of Pixel Dungeon, collect useful items and fight fierce monsters to find the Amulet of Yendor - the ultimate artefact of this game world!

Name: Cult of the Lamb
Summary: Crea la tua setta in una terra di falsi profeti e avventurati in regioni misteriose per costruire una comunità di seguaci del bosco, diffondere il tuo Verbo e diventare l'unica vera fede.

Name: Wasteland Remastered
Summary: For the first time in over 20 years, we are heralding the return of a much loved piece of gaming history with the classic RPG, Wasteland! Mutants. Again. Even more than there were last time: they seem to materialize out of the very grains of the radioactive desert sand. Venomous yellow eyes.

Name: Evan's Remains
Summary: Un'avventura-puzzle thriller sulla ricerca di un ragazzo geniale sparito.

Name: Endzone: A World Apart
Summary: Endzone is a post-apocalyptic survival city builder, where you start a new civilization with a group of people after a global nuclear disaster. Build them a new home and ensure their survival in a shattered world, threatened by constant radiation, toxic rain, sandstorms and droughts.

Name: Ludus
Summary: Build the best ludus in the world! and survive in ancient Rome.

Name: Help Will Come Tomorrow
Summary: In a uninhabitable Siberian wilderness, in a wake of October Revolution, a group of passengers survives the mysterious catastrophe of Trans-Siberian railway train. They must endure in a harsh ice-clad climate until rescue arrives. Facing many dangers, their own weaknesses and, above all, their own prejudice.

Name: Prop and Seek
Summary: Prop and seek is a hide and seek game which up to 32 players take turns to hide or seek. You can be a prop to hide or be a hunter to find all hidden props.

Name: Wild Terra 2: New Lands
Summary: Play your role in the life-filled medieval world controlled by players. Live on an inhabited territory or conquer New Continents in new seasons! MMORPG full of logically interconnected worked out little things that create a unique immersion and the spirit of adventure!

Name: Kindergarten 2
Summary: Welcome to Kindergarten 2, which takes place on Tuesday! After the events of Monday, you'll find yourself in a new school with new friends...and new ways to get ruthlessly murdered.

Name: Paradise Killer
Summary: Paradise Island, a world outside reality. There’s been a murder that only "investigation freak" Lady Love Dies can solve. Gather evidence and interrogate suspects in this open world adventure. You can accuse anyone, but you’ll have to prove your case in trial to convict. It’s up to you to decide who’s guilty.

Name: Out of the Park Baseball 21
Summary: Officially licensed by MLB, MiLB, and the MLBPA, Out of the Park Baseball 21 is a strategy & sports gaming fan’s dream come true and the only game ever to win Metacritic PC Game of the Year Award TWICE. OOTP 21 - Twenty One Years of Excellence!

Name: Kuukiyomi: Consider It!
Summary: The world, THIS IS JAPAN.

Name: Rogue Lords
Summary: Un roguelike gotico e fantasy in cui impersonerai il diavolo! Guida famigerati geni del male in eventi e combattimenti a turni per seminare terrore e corruzione. Crea sinergie tra i tuoi adepti, usa i loro poteri magici e vendicati di quei miserabili cacciatori di demoni.

Name: The Wild at Heart
Summary: A mysterious hidden realm. Two precocious kids fleeing hardship. Magical creatures and an oddball order of guardians who have lost their way. A stygian evil imprisoned. Welcome to the Deep Woods.

Name: The Big Con
Summary: Hustle your way across ‘90s America as a runaway teen con artist. Choose how to make your scratch as you don disguises, pick pockets, and rip people off in this comedic crime-filled adventure. Experience the totally rad '90s in all its plaid and payphone glory!

Name: Orbital Bullet
Summary: Orbital Bullet is a fast paced 360° action-platformer with rogue-lite elements, where all actions take place in a circular pattern. Fight your way through a variety of procedural planets and use body modifications, crafting and heavy weaponry. Kill. Die. Modify.

Name: When The Past Was Around
Summary: When the Past was Around è un puzzle-adventure punta&clicca sull'amore, l'accettazione, il superamento e la gioia e il dolore che si prova durante i diversi stadi di una relazione.

Name: Rainbow Billy: The Curse of the Leviathan
Summary: Rainbow Billy: The Curse of the Leviathan is a wholesome, non-violent 2.5D Adventure-Puzzle-Platformer with RPG elements, in which you must save whimsical creatures by bringing back color to the world you once knew!

Name: Our Life: Beginnings & Always
Summary: A twenty-dollar bill, four summers, fifteen years, and a one of a kind life. Create an experience that’s all your own in this near-fully customizable visual novel where you grow from childhood to adulthood with the lonely boy next door.

Name: Cloak and Dasher
Summary: Insanely fast, wildly fun! Guide Cloak in their search for riches through a maze of ruins full of deadly traps and weird monsters in this 2D single screen platformer. Fluid gameplay, simple controls and short challenging levels that can be completed in seconds — if you are quick and skilled enough!

Name: Ambition: A Minuet in Power
Summary: 18th century Paris - a city of love, lies and revolution. You are a woman of fashion trying to survive the political turmoil. Date a cast of unforgettable characters. Amass the wealth and respect you deserve. Engage in gossip that can alter the course of history, or lead you to the guillotine.

Name: 30XX
Summary: Salta, spara e fatti strada a suon di fendenti in 30XX, il videogioco platform d'azione roguelite che puoi giocare con un amico! Esplora mondi rigogliosi e in continua evoluzione in cui si mescolano salti precisi e combattimenti febbrili. Distruggi i loro temibili Guardiani.

Name: Ultimate MMA
Summary: Ultimate MMA is a mixed martial art fighting game. Fight in the tournament, unlock new moves, create unique fighters and play with friends.

Name: Hotshot Racing
Summary: Hotshot Racing è un adrenalinico gioco di guida in stile arcade, con drifting, nitidissima grafica retrò e un’incredibile enfasi sulla velocità per un’esperienza di guida esaltante.

Name: Max Gentlemen Sexy Business!
Summary: The premiere Victorian Business Tycoon & Dating Simulator. Your family business has been stolen from you! Forge sexy partnerships in the sheets while crushing rival companies in the streets to become England’s largest monopoly and reclaim your family honor.

Name: Element TD 2
Summary: Element TD 2 vi permetterà di combinare diversi elementi e creare torri uniche. Mostrateci le vostre difese contro mostri sempre più potenti, competete e collaborate con altri per determinare chi è il signore degli elementi!

Name: Magic Twins
Summary: Magic Twins is a cooperative arcade puzzler game in which Abra and Cadabra must use their chromagic powers to defeat hordes of color elementals and stop the Colormageddon.

Name: Maquette
Summary: MAQUETTE è un puzzle game ricorsivo che ti trasporterà in un mondo dove ogni edificio, pianta o oggetto è di dimensioni al contempo minuscole e gigantesche.

Name: Meegah Mem 2
Summary: Meegah Mem 2 (stylized Meegah Mem II) is a parody of Mega Man 2 that improves upon its predecessor, Meegah Mem, with a new engine, new mechanics and more!

Name: TurnTack
Summary: TurnTack is an adaptation of Aztec mythology. In Aztec mythology, the world perishes every 4,000 years. It's been destroyed four times so far, and TurnTack covers the fifth world. One day, the girl with white hair runs away from the Aztec.

Name: Hazel Sky
Summary: Hazel Sky is a heartfelt adventure about a young engineer facing his destiny and his desires. Fix ramshackle flying machines and jump, climb, swing, and slide through a beautiful, mysterious world.

Name: Gordian Quest
Summary: An epic RPG inspired by old-school classics like Ultima and Wizardry, using modern gaming concepts like deckbuilding and turn-based strategic combat. Lead and nurture parties of heroes. Forge bonds and discover new skills among them. Journey forth and unravel the ancient curses set upon your land.

Name: Dandy Ace
Summary: Dandy Ace is an over the top action game that follows this fabulous magician seeking to combine and use his magical cards, fighting and looting his way to defeat the Green-Eyed Illusionist and free himself from a cursed mirror.

Name: Urban Cards
Summary: Urban Cards is a cutthroat capitalist deckbuilder where cash is king. Make money to stay alive, build businesses, hire workaholic employees, and unscrupulous robbers to steal from the competition. Create your unique deck of colorful cards and amass a fortune to win!

Name: A Space for the Unbound
Summary: A slice-of-life adventure game with beautiful pixelart set in the late 90s rural Indonesia that tells a story about overcoming anxiety, depression, and the relationship between a boy and a girl with supernatural powers

Name: THE LONGING
Summary: Un insolito mix di avventura e gioco idle. Nella solitudine più totale, immersi nelle profondità della Terra, il vostro compito è aspettare il risveglio del Re... per 400 giorni.

Name: Amnesia: Rebirth
Summary: Una nuova discesa nell’oscurità dai creatori dell’iconica serie di Amnesia. Un viaggio straziante attraverso la desolazione e l'angoscia, che esplora i limiti della resilienza umana. Disponibile anche in modalità Avventura, per chi vuole godere della storia e dell’avventura senza l’horror.

Name: Relicta
Summary: Relicta è un puzzle game in prima persona basato sulla fisica in cui dovrai combinare in maniera creativa magnetismo e gravità per svelare i segreti della Base Chandra.

Name: Pumpkin Jack
Summary: Pumpkin Jack è un terrificante gioco platform in 3D nel quale vestirai i pumpkin di Jack, il mitico Signore delle zucche! Lanciati in un'avventura agghiacciante attraverso lugubri paesaggi e aiuta il male a trionfare sul bene!

Name: Before We Leave
Summary: Before We Leave è un city builder non violento ambientato in un accogliente angolo dell'universo. Prenditi cura dei tuoi abitanti e dell'ambiente circostante, mentre ricostruisci e riscopri la civiltà. Insediati in nuovi territori e pianeti, cercando di non finire nelle fauci delle balene spaziali.

Name: The Complex
Summary: Dopo un grave attacco con armi biologiche a Londra, due scienziati si ritrovano bloccati in un laboratorio, dove il tempo e l'aria si stanno esaurendo.

Name: Karlson
Summary: What do you get if you combine an FPS, Parkour, Slowmo & ... Milk? KARLSON. The milk-infused man will stop at nothing to locate and drink his favorite beverage.

Name: Going Under
Summary: Going Under è un gioco dungeon crawler satirico - esplora le rovine maledette di una ex startup tecnologica. Stagista non pagato della città distopica di Neo-Cascadia, dovrai farti largo, con l’aiuto di armi rimediate tra la spazzatura dell’ufficio, tra gli insoliti sotterranei della tua compagnia.

Name: Slapshot Rebound
Summary: Slapshot: Rebound is a physics-based multiplayer game where you play an arcade style match of hockey. No shoot button, no puck glue, no RNG. It’s up to you and your team to take control of the puck, pass, shoot, outplay your opponents. Play with your friends or team up with other Slapshot players!

Name: Walking Simulator
Summary: The year is 2020, world war III destroyed the civilized world. You are the last post carrier, tasked to get parcels from point A to B in the most barren and desolate places on earth.

Name: Xuan-Yuan Sword VII
Summary: Xuan-Yuan Sword VII is an ARPG rooted in Chinese history and mythology. Players take on the role of Taishi Zhao, a calm and reliable swordsman who was accidentally involved in a tragic fate. To protect his beloved family, he starts a journey in this chaotic realm to find the truth.

Name: A Monster's Expedition
Summary: An adorable and relaxing open world puzzle adventure for monsters who love to learn about humans!

Name: Clipped
Summary: The simple life of a duck may not be so simple after all.. Something terrible has happened and it is up to YOU to figure out what's wrong, but what lies ahead will be a serious challenge, the tiniest mistakes can be your biggest accidents.

Name: SCP: 5K
Summary: SCP: 5K is a cooperative tactical horror shooter project that puts players in the midst of a story inspired by SCP-5000 by Tanhony. As we work to develop the game and story further, we have released it into Early Access so players can experience the game as it evolves.

Name: A Juggler's Tale
Summary: Guida la marionetta Abby per un travagliato mondo fiabesco, in questa avventura cinematografica. Risolvi enigmi, evita trappole e semina malvagi inseguitori. Riuscirà Abby a riprendere il controllo del suo destino e della sua libertà?

Name: A Summer's End - Hong Kong 1986
Summary: A Summer's End is a visual novel set in 1980s Hong Kong. It tells of a love story between two women. Lush and vibrant visuals, the game features over 400 unique hand-drawn artwork inspired by Asian cinema and 1980s anime.

Name: Hidden Through Time
Summary: Parti per un colorato viaggio disegnato a mano alla scoperta delle varie ere! Dalle uova perdute di dinosauro durante l'Età della pietra fino alla corona di un re nel Medioevo: riuscirai a trovare tutto? Scopri, crea e condividi mondi con i tuoi tesori nascosti in Hidden Through Time!

Name: Speed Limit
Summary: Speed Limit è un viaggio non stop in un gioco arcade dai mille generi che non rallenta mai. Dimenticatevi i giochi moderni: Speed Limit è un gioco d'azione vecchio stile che si fonda su tre fattori chiave: forza, velocità, assuefazione.

Name: Super Mega Baseball 3
Summary: Run up the score in a relaxed slugfest or push the limits of your reflexes in this refined baseball simulator. The third entry in the series features all-new Franchise and Online Leagues modes, major graphical enhancements, and on-field additions including pickoffs and situational player traits.

Name: I Am Dead
Summary: I am Dead è un'incantevole avventura a enigmi che ti porterà a esplorare l'aldilà, dai creatori di Hohokum e di Wilmot's Warehouse.

Name: Curious Expedition 2
Summary: Curious Expedition 2 is a turn-based narrative roguelike set in a reimagined version of the late 19th century that uses procedural gameplay and story elements to create completely unique and epic adventures every time you play.

Name: Book of Travels
Summary: Ready your pack, grab your walking stick and step into a world of mystery and legend. Craft a unique character and immerse yourself in the enchanted lands of Braided Shore. Set your own goals and adventure alone or together with Travellers you meet on the road in this serene TMORPG.

Name: Eldest Souls
Summary: Frenetico e brutalmente avvincente, Eldest Souls è un'esperienza soulslike unica del genere boss rush.In un ultimo atto di vendetta, gli Antichi Dèi hanno scatenato una grande desolazione sulla terra. L'unica speranza dell'umanità è un guerriero solitario e la sua spada in pura ossidiana.

Name: Heroines of Swords & Spells
Summary: An epic and funny jRPG adventure with intricately detailed world and story. Guide a party of wayward heroines through the perils of this fantasy world.

Name: Pro Cycling Manager 2020
Summary: Diventa il manager di una squadra ciclistica e portala in vetta! Dovrai gestire le finanze e il reclutamento, pianificare gli allenamenti, implementare la tua strategia e, in questa nuova edizione, dovrai anche occuparti delle richieste dei ciclisti e del loro morale!

Name: Sea of Stars
Summary: Sea of Stars is a turn-based RPG inspired by the classics. It tells the story of two Children of the Solstice who will combine the powers of the sun and moon to perform Eclipse Magic, the only force capable of fending off the monstrous creations of the evil alchemist known as The Fleshmancer.

Name: Escape First 3
Summary: “Escape First 3" è la terza puntata di un puzzle con una stanza di fuga a più giocatori per la realtà virtuale o per un desktop PC! Comprende 3 diverse stanze di fuga tra cui scegliere e ci si può giocare in modo competitivo, in collaborazione o da soli.

Name: Tiny Bunny
Summary: Tiny Bunny: Prologue is a non-linear horror visual novel. Those, who have heard the voice of the forest, are beyond help.

Name: Mask of Mists
Summary: Mask of Mists è un gioco d'azione-avventura in una visione in prima persona in cui ti immergi nell'esplorazione di un mondo pieno di magia e segreti!

Name: Beyond The Wire
Summary: A tense multiplayer FPS set in the muddy, bloody trenches of WW1. In battles up to 50v50, players will be immersed in cinematic environments that convey the desperate & brutal circumstances of the Great War. Features an authentic arsenal & a unique melee combat system.

Name: The Supper
Summary: The Supper is a short adventure game about the darkest side of the human soul. Ms. Appleton was always a wellspring of kindness, until The Voice started talking to her.

Name: Unbound: Worlds Apart
Summary: Evoca portali per superare mostri feroci, puzzle contorti e diaboliche sfide di platforming. Domina i poteri unici di ogni portale per fermare il crollo della realtà. Esplora mondi rigogliosi, digitalmente disegnati a mano, e svela così una storia profonda e ricca di dettagli e misteri.

Name: Folklore Hunter
Summary: You are a hunter world reknowned for slaying supernatural beasts. Your next contract is to hunt down a wendigo plaguing a section of woods in north america. Gather resources, set traps, prepare your equipment, use your hunters instincts and take down the beast, before it hunts you.

Name: Paper Pirates
Summary: Paper Pirates is a team based social deduction game that uses mobile phones and tablets as its controllers. Take control of your very own pirate ship and issue commands to your fellow shipmates, will they obey or disobey your command?

Name: Paperball
Summary: It's time to get rolling! Navigate tricky passages, pull off crazy stunts and get ready to fall off a lot! Play carefully or risk it all for the fastest time - play any way you want in over 150 all unique stages.

Name: Chinatown Detective Agency
Summary: Chinatown Detective Agency is a cybernoir point and click adventure blending stunning retro design with innovative mechanics. Manage your detective agency and use real world research to solve cases as you unravel a global conspiracy.

Name: I'm on Observation Duty 2: Timothy's Revenge
Summary: Your job is to monitor live surveillance camera footage and spot anomalies in the monitored rooms. Anomalies range from furniture movement to otherworldly intruders. When you spot an anomaly you have to file a report to fix it. You will need sharp eyes and good memory to survive the entire night.

Name: Shadow Empire
Summary: Shadow Empire is a deep turn-based 4X wargame with a unique blend of military focus, procedurally generated content and role-playing features.

Name: Radical Relocation
Summary: Radical Relocation è un assurdo rompicapo basato sulla fisica che trasforma un tranquillo quartiere in una folle corsa a ostacoli! Ti serviranno un’attenta pianificazione e nervi d’acciaio per portare gli oggetti da A a B, tenendoli impilati in equilibrio sul tettuccio del tuo veicolo in movimento!

Name: Vengeful Rites
Summary: Embark on an epic adventure designed exclusively for VR! Use your own hands to cast magic, fire bows and slice through your enemies on your quest to exact vengeance against the evil Dragore. Learn new spells and craft new gear to become the greatest Serafin Warrior of all time! Demo available.

Name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Legacy of the Duelist: Link Evolution
Summary: Rivivi la gloria dei duelli del passato e del presente contro i personaggi di Yu-Gi-Oh! Competi contro altri giocatori online con il tuo deck personalizzato, poi sfidali in Battle Pack Draft e Sealed Play(Gioco Sigillato)!

Name: We Went Back
Summary: We Went Back is a time-looping horror game in which you wake up in an abandoned space station utterly alone. The exit door is locked and you must find a way to escape what lurks within. Find clues, experience dynamically changing environments and confront terror in order to find a way out.

Name: Oneiros
Summary: Will you be able to break the vicious circle? Can you regain control? Experience the surreal adventure filled with many puzzles and psychedelic visions.

Name: Fearmonium
Summary: Fearmonium is a psychedelic metroidvania where suspense intertwines with humour. Beginning the game as an unpleasant memory, you must progress and become a true phobia by breaking through all boundaries to uncover the most hidden corners of Max's mind.

Name: Rogue Legacy 2
Summary: Rogue Legacy 2 is what you'd get if you mashed Rogue Legacy and a sequel together. Every time you die, your children will succeed you, and each child is unique. Your daughter might be a Colourblind Archer, and your son could be a Pacifistic Chef. Either way, one of them is getting conscripted.

Name: Mortal Shell
Summary: Mortal Shell è un action RPG che mette alla prova la tua tenacia e sanità mentale in un mondo in frantumi. I tuoi nemici non hanno pietà: per sopravvivere sono necessari consapevolezza, precisione e istinto superiori. Possiedi guerrieri caduti, trova santuari nascosti e affronta nemici formidabili.

Name: Automobilista 2
Summary: Automobilista 2 once again puts you in the driving seat of an advanced and diverse racing simulator - now with incredible graphical quality, high-profile cars and tracks, advanced dynamic track condition system and VR support.

Name: AFL Evolution 2
Summary: THE EVOLUTION CONTINUES - AFL Evolution 2 is taking AFL gaming to new heights with more features than ever before!

Name: Knock on the Coffin Lid
Summary: Knock on the coffin lid is a familiar and fun roguelike card game. Collect dozens of card decks and complement combinations with the properties of items of equipment. Get to know the features of the main characters and defeat worthy opponents in fights. Deceive bosses or show mercy.

Name: Radio General
Summary: It's WWII. You're a general sitting in a tent. All you have is a map, and a radio. Can you win the battle? Radio General is a unique strategy game where you interact with your units over the radio using speech recognition. Test your mettle and relive famous battles as a WWII general.

Name: Fallen Knight
Summary: Vesti i panni di un cavaliere d'élite e fatti strada combattendo in livelli pieni d'azione con duelli intensi, in questo platform d'azione a scorrimento in stile neoclassico. Salva la città da una organizzazione terroristica, fortemente determinata a rivelare la verità che hai giurato di proteggere.

Name: Receiver 2
Summary: Receiver 2 simulates every internal part of each firearm based on manufacturer schematics and gunsmithing resources. Learn exactly how each sidearm works, including how to load and unload them, clear malfunctions, and operate their safety features.

Name: Billion Road
Summary: Billion Road takes you on a journey to a number of real-life prefectures and cities throughout Japan, and your goal is to be the richest player in the game. Up to 4 players can compete locally and online. Takeover all of Japan and dominate the businesses world like a tycoon!

Name: The Procession to Calvary
Summary: Pilfer from pirates, conspire with cardinals and perform miracles with an incompetent magician. The Procession to Calvary is a Pythonesque adventure game made from Renaissance paintings, and a spiritual successor to the critically acclaimed Four Last Things.

Name: The Convenience Store
Summary: The Convenience Store | 夜勤事件 is a J-horror game about a college girl on a night shift.

Name: Heal
Summary: Guida un vecchio attraverso il mondo oscuro e suggestivo di Heal in questo astratto gioco di punta-e-clicca puzzle-avventura 2D.

Name: XCOM: Chimera Squad
Summary: XCOM: Chimera Squad delivers an all-new story and turn-based tactical combat experience in the XCOM universe.

Name: Ato
Summary: A world of Beauty and Mystery, Emotive Animations, Atmospheric Environments, Visually Driven Story, Metroidvania Exploration and Memorable Sword Duels.

Name: Agent Roswell
Summary: A first and third person action shooter for PC. Set in 1969 USA, you are an Agent working for a secret Government Agency and your task is to investigate and help stop an Alien invasion, your work will also deal with a terrorist organization who want to reveal the truth about the invasion.

Name: Cepheus Protocol
Summary: An unimaginable plague has been released in San Francisco, turning the population into mutated creatures hellbent on spreading the Pangu Virus. Inspired by classic RTS series Company of Heroes and World in Conflict, it is up to you to win back the city before the Pangu Virus spreads globally.

Name: Peaky Blinders: Mastermind
Summary: Peaky Blinders: Mastermind is a puzzle-adventure game, based on the multi-award-winning TV show. Become the Mastermind as you control key characters and pull off perfectly synchronized plans.

Name: F1 2020
Summary: Con F1® 2020 potrai finalmente creare la tua scuderia F1® e gareggiare contro scuderie e piloti ufficiali. Oppure potrai sfidare i tuoi amici nella nuova modalità a schermo condiviso per un’esperienza di guida più rilassata. Corri su 22 circuiti e scegli tra contenuti classici e contemporanei.

Name: Spinch
Summary: Trascendi il regno materiale e assumi la tua vera forma di Spinch, un organismo super agile consumato dal desiderio di salvare la sua prole in questo psichedelico gioco di piattaforme a scorrimento laterale, nato dalla mente di Jesse Jacobs, il pluripremiato disegnatore canadese.

Name: Sumatra: Fate of Yandi
Summary: Lost and alone after a terrible landslide, Yandi must find his way home in this old-school point and click adventure set deep in the Sumatran jungle! Will he make it out alive?

Name: No one lives under the lighthouse
Summary: A slow burn retro horror game, in which you arrive at the old lighthouse on a small island near the coast of the United States. After the previous keeper has gone missing, you need to take over his duties and watch after the light.

Name: Agrou
Summary: Your new favorite Werewolf game! Seat around the fire with friends, play a villager, a werewolf or another type of character and use strategy to win!

Name: Shieldwall
Summary: Shieldwall is a funny third-person tactical battle simulator with strategy elements. It allows you to feel like a squad leader right on the battlefield.

Name: Mini Healer
Summary: Mini Healer is a single player healing simulator/raid manager RPG with ARPG inspired deep character customization and itemization. Play as the healer in MMO inspired boss fights, acquire powerful items, and customize your party to your heart's content.

Name: Mortal Online 2
Summary: Mortal Online 2 is the long awaited sequel to Star Vault’s long running first person sandbox MMORPG. Explore a massive open sandbox world and choose your own path, but be aware, danger lurks around every corner in this full PvP full loot world.

Name: Jessika
Summary: Jessika committed suicide, and it’s up to you to find out why she did what she did by prying into her digital past. What at first seems to be a job like any other quickly develops into a dark drama with twists and turns.

Name: Boxman's Struggle
Summary: What's better than climbing mountain in a cardboard box? Getting deep frustration every time you fall from it.

Name: Poly Bridge 2
Summary: L'acclamato simulatore di costruzione di ponti è tornato ed è il migliore di sempre! Riscopri la tua creatività ingegneristica con ore e ore di rompicapi divertenti!

Name: Cat in the Box
Summary: Cat in the Box is a horror adventure game. Help the poor girl explore the mansion and escape from unknown entities that are pursuing her. Use a variety of tools and your wits to overcome any challenges you face. At times, you'll even have to wake yourself from nightmares to survive.

Name: Zompiercer
Summary: Zompiercer is a first-person shooter in the world of zombie apocalypse, filled with dangerous uniquely mutated zombies craving your flesh. Travel by train, which has become a haven for you, equip living wagons and create new equipment to survive.

Name: Akurra
Summary: Akurra is a block pushing puzzle game similar to classics like Chip's Challenge, Adventure's of Lolo, Sokoban, and Zelda. Solve puzzles, explore caves, and ride sea turtles in order to find keys that unlock new paths and friends to aid you as you explore islands chock-full of secrets!

Name: Almost My Floor
Summary: Almost My Floor - point & click detective in a frightening atmosphere of sinister nightmares. Each step may end up fatal. Solve the mystery of the house #9 residents or go crazy. Labyrinth of endless floors will not let go of their victim without a fight.

Name: Timelie
Summary: Controlla il tempo come un lettore multimediale e collabora con un misterioso gatto per risolvere i puzzle e scoprire i segreti di un mondo bizzarro e surreale. Sgattaiolate, risolvete e scappate… insieme.

Name: Beasts of Bermuda
Summary: Beasts of Bermuda is a multiplayer game hosting large servers in which the player grows up as a dinosaur or other prehistoric creature. The player becomes part of a living, player-created ecosystem. The ultimate objective is to survive on one of the islands within Bermuda.

Name: Golden Light
Summary: Eat weapons, be scared and question your own mind in this Survival-Horror FPS Prop Hunt Roguelike about meat. Now with online COOP and Versus mode. Walls are watching you. Welcome to Meatzone

Name: Lumberjack's Dynasty
Summary: Un originalissimo simulatore di vita in prima persona, con protagonista un boscaiolo intento ad avviare un’attività e a fondare una dinastia.

Name: Weaving Tides
Summary: Dive into a magical woven world on the back of your own carpet dragon! Explore the textile landscape, solve puzzles, challenge quirky creatures and unravel the great mysteries of a long forgotten past in Weaving Tides!

Name: The Ascent
Summary: The Ascent è un GdR sparatutto d'azione, singolo o co-op, ambientato in un mondo cyberpunk. Stai assistendo al crollo del gruppo The Ascent, egemone incontrollato. Saprai sopravvivere senza?

Name: Scarlet Nexus
Summary: Scegli se giocare nei panni di Yuito o Kasane, due psionici con il potere della psicocinesi, ognuno con la propria storia e la propria missione. Completa le loro storie per svelare i misteri di un futuro "brainpunk" tra tecnologia e abilità psichiche.

Name: Royal Crown
Summary: You are now summoned to ROYAL CROWN - a fantasy Battle Royale to see who is most fit to survive! Survive and adventure through a beautiful fairytale themed fantasy battlefield!

Name: Arboria
Summary: Inizia il tuo viaggio in questo GdR roguelite dark fantasy. Vesti i panni di un guerriero Yotun, discendi nelle mutevoli profondità di Durnan e svela i misteri della tua tribù. Affronta i nemici con una vasta gamma di Armi simbiotiche e sfrutta le mutazioni per diventare sempre più potente.

Name: Novena Diabolos
Summary: Novena diabolos is an Ocult mystery adventure game. The main character, Park Joon-sung, has to find a single human woman who doesn't know who she is and get out of town safely.

Name: Of Bird And Cage
Summary: Of Bird and Cage is a unique metal album presented through a two-hour-long story-driven game. Play music in a brand-new way. Featuring famous artists like Ron "Bumblefoot" Thal (ex-Guns N' Roses), Rob van der Loo (Epica), Ruud Jolie (Within Temptation), and many others!

Name: Fatal Core
Summary: Fatal Core is a 100% free, community-driven Trading Card Game. Assume the role of one of 6 Lead Characters and battle in a dystopian future full of strange magic and alien technology! Fatal Core features many unusual mechanics, including simultaneous play, open hands, player market, and more.

Name: Cassette Beasts
Summary: Colleziona mostri fantastici in cui trasformarti durante le battaglie a turni di questo gioco di ruolo open-world. Combina due forme di mostro con il sistema Fusione di Cassette Beasts per crearne di nuove, uniche e potenti!

Name: The Dungeon Of Naheulbeuk: The Amulet Of Chaos
Summary: Step into the wacky heroic fantasy universe of the Dungeon of Naheulbeuk. Lead a team of unlikely and clumsy heroes in an epic and challenging tactical RPG. Live an adventure filled with humor, surprises and silly encounters.

Name: Library Of Ruina
Summary: "May you find your book in this place." Combat between the guests and the librarians breaks out as if it were on a stage. Defeated guests turn into books, and the Library grows onward. And eventually, get your hands on… The one singular, perfect book.

Name: Helltaker
Summary: Helltaker is a short game about sharply dressed demon girls.

Name: Labyrinthine
Summary: Uncover the dark secrets of an overgrown maze with friends online as you try to escape the horrors within. Together, you will need to solve puzzles, find items and run from the bloodthirsty denizens of the maze as you try and get out alive...

Name: Green Project
Summary: Post apocalyptic survival farming, green the world to survive !

Name: Rise of Humanity
Summary: Combatti i bot nemici, pianifica la tua strategia per completare le missioni e raccogli, potenzia e unisci potenti carte per salvare l'umanità in questo gioco tattico a turni!

Name: Watch Me Stream My Mental Breakdown
Summary: Story card game about playing games all day and proving your father wrong. Build your stream, keep your mental health above zero, and work your way up to a minimum wage!

Name: Peglin
Summary: Peglin is a Pachinko Roguelike - Fight enemies by collecting special orbs and popping pegs to deal damage. Acquire special relics that radically change the game and ensure no two runs are the same. Aim carefully to survive in this unique turn-based RPG!

Name: Wingspan
Summary: Wingspan è un rilassante e premiato gioco di strategia sugli uccelli per 1-5 giocatori. Ogni uccello giocato accresce la catena di combinazioni disponibili in uno dei propri tre habitat. L'obiettivo è scoprire e attirare i migliori uccelli nella propria rete di riserve naturali.

Name: BALSA Model Flight Simulator
Summary: Balsa is a detailed Model Flight Simulator with a powerful editor where you can design, build, fly and battle with model aircraft. Developed by the creator of Kerbal Space Program, Balsa is a virtual flight experience like no other.

Name: TOHU
Summary: Scopri un'originale avventura ambientata in un mondo popolato da strambi e affascinanti pesci pianeta. Esplora magnifici scenari, risolvi intricati enigmi e svela il mistero di una bambina e del suo alter-ego meccanico, Cubus.

Name: UnMetal
Summary: UnMetal è un gioco stealth/action 2D (con un po' di umorismo) in cui l'obiettivo è fuggire da una base militare nemica.

Name: Delores: A Thimbleweed Park Mini-Adventure
Summary: Delores is back home and working as a photographer for the Nickel News. Thimbleweed Park hasn’t changed at all in the year she’s been away… or has it? Sample Ron Gilbert’s new adventure game engine in this free prototype that uses “found art” from the award-winning Thimbleweed Park.

Name: Soda Dungeon 2
Summary: Lo spensierato dungeon crawler preferito di tutti ritorna con Soda Dungeon 2. Include una nuova avventura, un'intera città da migliorare, creazioni, nuove classi, dimensioni alternative e tanto altro. Troverai tutto ciò che hai amato del gioco originale insieme a tutte le aggiunte che desideravi!

Name: Dark Nights with Poe and Munro
Summary: Guide local radio hosts Poe and Munro through six TV-like episodes of supernatural strangeness and sizzling on-screen chemistry. From the creators of The Infectious Madness of Doctor Dekker and The Shapeshifting Detective.

Name: Island Saver
Summary: Un gruppo di fantastiche isole hanno bisogno del tuo aiuto! Sono affiorati terribili rifiuti di plastica e devi risolvere la situazione con il tuo fidato Distruggi spazzatura! Ma fa' attenzione ai rifiutinsetti. Adorano il disordine e vogliono mandare tutto all'aria.

Name: Umurangi Generation
Summary: Umurangi Generation is a first person photography game in the shitty future. Set in Tauranga Aotearoa off the back of an impending crisis you are a courier for the Tauranga Express. Throughout the game you will unlock a variety of lenses and equipment.

Name: Space Scavenger
Summary: Design, build and command unique spaceships through mysterious alien infested galaxies while scavenging for spaceship parts in a desperate attempt at finding what you once called home.

Name: Hotel Sowls
Summary: Hotel Sowls is a mysterious adventure game with unique and appealing 2D graphics. As an pharmacologist, you managed to get a valuable and mysterious stone after a hard journey and you decided to take a break at the Hotel Sowls. But the next morning, someone in the hotel stole the stone!

Name: Infinity Strash: Dragon Quest - The Adventure of Dai
Summary: I ricordi dell'eroe sono nelle tue mani! Scopri la storia del leggendario anime DRAGON QUEST The Adventure of Dai in un elettrizzante GdR d'azione che mescola una splendida grafica con delle illustrazioni che vengono dall'anime e dal manga.

Name: Industria
Summary: INDUSTRIA è un classico sparatutto in prima persona che ti catapulterà in un universo parallelo di poco antecedente alla fine della Guerra Fredda. Nella fredda ambientazione steampunk dovrai cercare un tuo collega di lavoro scomparso e decifrare un oscuro passato e verranno sollevate grandi questioni morali.

Name: Mafia: Definitive Edition
Summary: Corre l'anno 1930. Dopo uno sfortunato incontro con la mafia, Tommy Angelo, tassista, si ritrova coinvolto suo malgrado nel mondo della criminalità organizzata. Entrare in combutta con la famiglia Salieri può sembrare un rischio troppo grande, ma il crimine paga, e tanto. La sua scalata ai ranghi lo porterà a guadagni sempre maggiori...

Name: POLYGON
Summary: POLYGON è uno sparatutto a squadre multiplayer dinamico in prima persona. Devi combattere su mappe su larga scala usando varie armi con un massimo di 32 giocatori. Gestisci correttamente il tuo arsenale e le tue abilità, devi condurre la tua squadra alla vittoria!

Name: The House of Da Vinci 2
Summary: Diventa l'apprendista del famoso Leonardo Da Vinci. Risolvi puzzle meccanici 3D realizzati a mano e scopri segreti nascosti. Visita i più affascinanti luoghi del Rinascimento italiano. Viaggia nel tempo per influenzare l'ambiente circostante.

Name: Lake
Summary: È il 1986. Meredith Weiss decide di prendersi una pausa dalla vita in città e diventa il nuovo postino della sua città natale. Come passerà queste due settimane nella splendida Providence Oaks, incorniciata da un incantevole lago? Come interagirà con i suoi bizzarri abitanti? Sarai tu a deciderlo.

Name: Decay: The Mare
Summary: Sam è un tossicodipendente che finisce in un istituto chiamato “Raggiungere i sogni”, sperando di liberarsi del suo problema con la droga e sistemare la sua vita miserabile. Tuttavia, la prima notte, qualcosa va terribilmente storto e rimane bloccato in un incubo senza fine...

Name: KingSim
Summary: Become the King in a story-driven 8-bit style game, where choice matters. And try not to die instantly...

Name: Draft Day Sports: Pro Basketball 2021
Summary: Draft Day Sports: Pro Basketball 2021 puts you in the role of general manager of your favorite basketball team. Every decision can be made by you from drafting, trading, signing free agents all the way to making each substitution to lead your team to championship glory and becoming a dynasty.

Name: Metro Exodus: Enhanced Edition
Summary: Fuggi dalle rovine della metropolitana di Mosca e intraprendi un viaggio epico per attraversare un intero continente nelle terre selvagge della Russia post-apocalittica. Esplora gli enormi livelli non lineari, perditi in un'esperienza sandbox survival immersiva e segui un'emozionante storia che dura un anno intero nella più gran

Name: Space Otter Charlie
Summary: Salta, fluttua e lanciati attraverso lo spazio più... lontrano in questo puzzle a piattaforme a gravità zero!

Name: Steel Assault
Summary: America post-apocalittica: attacca, frusta e passa da una zipline all’altra in questo gioco d'azione in stile retrò! Gioca nei panni di Taro Takahashi, un soldato della resistenza in cerca di vendetta contro il dittatore che domina le ceneri di ciò che è rimasto.

Name: Voidtrain
Summary: Become a crew member of an interdimensional express! Discover a new mysterious world inhabited by amazing creatures, dangers and surprises. Upgrade your train, gather new materials and build better weapons! Available in single player, or in online multiplayer with up to 4 people.

Name: Just Die Already
Summary: Just Die Already è un caotico gioco sandbox per anziani, ideato dai creatori di Goat Simulator. Come sopravviverai in un mondo che ti urla in faccia "Just Die Already"?

Name: 8Doors: Arum's Afterlife Adventure
Summary: 8Doors is a story-driven Metroidvania-style action platformer heavily influenced by Korean folktales. Play as ‘Arum’, a brave girl that has entered the realm of the afterlife in search of her father’s soul and guide her through the '8 Doors of Purgatory' to solve the mysteries that lie deep within.

Name: Gold Hunter
Summary: You have always dreamed of going on a search for gold or moving big machines. Then you can now show what is in you and grow beyond you. In this game, we bring you closer to the search for gold. Get ready for a unique experience you will never forget.

Name: Fishy
Summary: Fishy is a 3D platormer. you play as a fish very far from home . traveling trough 5 worlds such as a jungle oasis to under water to the frozen tundra to inside a volcano to lastly to outer...

Name: Metal: Hellsinger
Summary: Massacra a tempo di metal e vendetta in un viaggio attraverso gli otto Inferni. Fagli temere il ritmo. Metal: Hellsinger è un FPS ritmico pieno di demoni, armi toste e musica heavy metal.

Name: Stray
Summary: Solo, sperduto e lontano dalla sua famiglia, un gatto randagio deve venire a capo di un antico mistero per fuggire da una cybercittà e ritrovare la via di casa.

Name: Goodbye Volcano High
Summary: Goodbye Volcano High è un'avventura narrativa cinematica che parla d'amore, di cambiamento, e della fine di un'era. Aiuta Fang a orientarsi nel suo ultimo anno di liceo e a mettere a posto le cose prima che sia troppo tardi.

Name: Demon Turf
Summary: The 3D platformer with attitude! Join Beebz in her ambitious goal of taking over the Demon Turfs and becoming the Demon Queen herself! Jump, spin and punch your way across the turfs with unique mechanics like momentum-driven combat and self-placed checkpoints. Time to face the Demon King head on!

Name: Goosebumps: Dead of Night
Summary: In Goosebumps Dead of Night, il mondo di grande successo di Piccoli Brividi è stato ripensato come avventura in prima persona per PC all’insegna della paura e della sopravvivenza. Fatevi strada furtivamente in tre capitoli con grafica 3D e mostri IA terrificanti.

Name: Timberman VS
Summary: Timberman, Il titolo amato da milioni di giocatori in tutto il mondo, ritorna con un'ascia nuova di zecca! Timberman VS è disponibile su PC e console per un divertimento multipiattaforma! Gioca con i tuoi amici e dimostra di essere un taglialegna di fama mondiale!

Name: Cartel Tycoon
Summary: Cartel Tycoon è un gioco gestionale e narrativo ispirato al narcotraffico degli anni '80. Espanditi, conquista e respingi i cartelli rivali evitando le attenzioni delle autorità. Ottieni la lealtà dei cittadini e tenta di scongiurare il fatale destino che attende tutti i grandi signori della droga.

Name: Shadows of Doubt
Summary: Un coinvolgente gioco stealth poliziesco sandbox ambientato in una città noir fantascientifica completamente simulata, caratterizzata da crimine e corruzione. Pensa come un investigatore privato e accetta lavori per guadagnare denaro mentre dai la caccia a un serial killer.

Name: Carto
Summary: Carto is a charming adventure game wrapped around a unique, world-altering puzzle mechanic. Use this power to explore mysterious lands, help a quirky cast of characters, and guide Carto on her journey back to her family.

Name: In Sound Mind
Summary: In Sound Mind is an imaginative first-person psychological horror with frenetic puzzles, unique boss fights, and original music by The Living Tombstone. Journey within the inner workings of the one place you can’t seem to escape—your own mind.

Name: Fights in Tight Spaces
Summary: A stylish blend of deck-building, turn-based tactics, and thrilling animated fight sequences in classic action-movie settings. Learn to balance your hand, momentum, and positioning to overcome the odds to defeat your adversaries. Build your deck, control the space and live to fight another day.

Name: Skeleton Crew
Summary: Kick, throw and thrash your way to victory in this gothic multiplayer platform brawler. Explore dungeons, unlock new characters, kick butts.

Name: Gori: Cuddly Carnage
Summary: Want to slice creepy toys? Want to dice mutated unicorns? Want to play as a murder-kitty on a death-dealing hoverboard? Great news! Gori: Cuddly Carnage is the game you’ve been waiting for!

Name: Penumbra: Overture
Summary: Penumbra: Overture is a first person survival horror game, emphasizing on survival and problem solving instead of mindless violence and gore.

Name: Ancient Cities
Summary: Ancient Cities is a survival and strategy city builder game, based on ancient times.

Name: Flynn: Son of Crimson
Summary: Help Flynn and his mythical companion Dex save Rosantica before the evil from The Scourge claims his home. In Flynn: Son of Crimson, you’ll go on a journey of discovery and conflict as you learn to master the power of Crimson Energy.

Name: The Slormancer
Summary: Combatti contro orde di nemici guidati dallo Slormante, un antico stregone malvagio, in questo action-RPG tanto assurdo quanto epico! Troverai tantissimi bottini luccicanti e oggetti collezionabili, innumerevoli ore di contenuti, dinamiche di gioco frenetiche e una pixel art a regola d'arte.

Name: The Outlast Trials
Summary: Red Barrels invites you to experience mind-numbing terror, this time with friends. Whether you go through the trials alone or in teams, if you survive long enough and complete the therapy, Murkoff will happily let you leave… but will you be the same?

Name: Morbid: The Seven Acolytes
Summary: Morbid: The Seven Acolytes è un RPG d'azione dallo stile horror punk ricco di orrori lovecraftiani e sangue cronenbergiano; la più macabra interpretazione del genere souls-like mai vista finora!

Name: Phasmophobia
Summary: Phasmophobia is a 4 player online co-op psychological horror. Paranormal activity is on the rise and it’s up to you and your team to use all the ghost hunting equipment at your disposal in order to gather as much evidence as you can.

Name: Ynglet
Summary: In Ynglet salterai tra le bolle che fluttuano nel cielo, come se fossi un delfino spaziale, mentre la colonna sonora reattiva e dinamica creata dal software musicale personalizzato (e complicatissimo) di Ynglet ti assorbirà completamente.

Name: Lost in Random
Summary: Sfida la sorte in Lost in Random™, un'avventura ispirata alle fiabe gotiche in cui il destino di ogni cittadino è determinato dal lancio di un dado.

Name: Hadean Tactics
Summary: Hadean Tactics is a roguelike deckbuilding game fused with autobattler elements to create a unique strategy experience. Use your cards to influence the actions of your units and help your Hero defeat the Six Wings of Hell!

Name: Rival Stars Horse Racing
Summary: Accudisci e allena i tuoi cavalli, alleva il campione perfetto, gestisci una casa colonica e competi per la vittoria in Rival Stars Horse Racing!

Name: Hammerting
Summary: Gestisci una colonia mineraria di Nani nelle inesplorate montagne di Mara. Mentre una guerra imperversa nel Mondo degli umani, dovrai creare, esplorare e combattere per fornire ai tuoi alleati le migliori armi ed equipaggiamenti per aiutarli nella guerra contro il male.

Name: Travellers Rest
Summary: You are an innkeeper, on a journey to transform a run-down inn into a bustling social space. Brew your own beer, run a farm, explore the world, and build relationships with your customers to create your own fantasy tavern!

Name: Holomento
Summary: Holomento is an indie permadeath RPG focusing on the dangerous quest of passing through the mysterious Eventide Hollow – and rebuilding it step by step.

Name: Tinkertown
Summary: Gather your friends and come to Tinkertown - A refreshing new Multiplayer Sandbox Experience! Explore magical places filled with loot, danger, and creativity.

Name: The Fabled Woods
Summary: Welcome to The Fabled Woods, a dark and mysterious narrative short story. Despite the picturesque beauty, ugly and terrible secrets lurk among the shifting boughs, darkness that no amount of dappled sunlight can erase. Take the first step, and experience an unforgettable journey.

Name: HROT
Summary: HROT is a single-player retro FPS set in a small socialist country neighboring Soviet Union (Czechoslovakia) after an unspecified disaster in 1986. Those times were dark and terrifying and so is the game.

Name: Lines X
Summary: Beautiful & relaxing Numberlink puzzles.

Name: Ultimate Zombie Defense
Summary: Team up or face it alone in this top down zombie slaying defense adventure! Featuring up to 4 player online co-op, cleanse the infected wave by wave and upgrade your base with traps & defenses to build the Ultimate Zombie Defense. Can YOU stop them?

Name: CONSCRIPT
Summary: During the First World War, a lone French soldier must navigate twisted trenches, scavenge for limited supplies and solve complex puzzles - all whilst fighting for survival in the midst of mankind’s most brutal and horrifying conflict. CONSCRIPT is a new take on classic survival horror.

Name: Left on Read
Summary: It’s March of 2020; you were just sent home from college because of the coronavirus, you have a few small regrets, mainly not telling someone how you really feel.

Name: Our Secret Below
Summary: A story-driven escape room thriller about a woman who has been abducted and begins to experience surreal events the deeper things go. Uncover your captor's past and discover why you are intertwined.

Name: Alan Sharp
Summary: Alan Sharp is a Detective, Mystery/Horror video game driven by immersive storyline and character development, focused on exploration, survival, puzzles, and open-world investigation.

Name: The Catch: Carp & Coarse Fishing
Summary: Take on the hunt of a lifetime as you target and pursue monster-sized fish around the world. You’re set, waiting…. The line tightens, your alarm screams, the fish is on and the battle commences!

Name: Core Defense
Summary: Un gioco di difesa della torre in stile Rogue con un pizzico di deck-building. Scegli una ricompensa, migliora la tua strategia, sopravvivi all'ondata successiva, ripeti. Rigiocabile, difficile e avvincente. Vorrai affrontare l'ondata successiva e giocare un altro giro.

Name: Office lovers
Summary: It's a romance game where you can experience the thrill of an office romance where you have to keep your relationship secret. What will happen when you're alone with him in the conference room?

Name: Going Medieval
Summary: Stake your claim in this colony building sim and survive a turbulent Medieval age. Construct a multi-storey fortress in a land reclaimed by wilderness, defend against raids, and keep your villagers happy as their lives are shaped by the world around them.

Name: Scrutinized
Summary: Work to expose the numerous criminal degenerates that plague your quiet town. Use citizen-issued reports, police records, social media accounts, text conversations, and more to determine who’s an actual threat and who’s harmless, all while avoiding the killers trying to infiltrate your home.

Name: Temple Of Snek
Summary: A snaky tile-based puzzle dungeon adventure. Defend the temple, monch the infidels, and grow and grow and grow...

Name: Eternal Hope
Summary: Eternal Hope è un platform rompicapo che segue la storia di Ti'bi, un ragazzo che deve intraprendere un viaggio pieno di amore e speranza per trovare l'anima della sua amata.

Name: Shieldmaiden
Summary: The end of the world just started and everyone is gone. The machines took over and your only goal is to look for your missing sister in a retro wave atmosphere. Fight and find your way into the danger with your shield in this vibrant pixel art world.

Name: Wobbly Life
Summary: Wobbly Life is a lively open world physics based sandbox. Play with your friends in Online and local co-op, discover a variety of minigames and objectives to earn cash to spend in the world!

Name: Lords & Villeins
Summary: Grow dynasties of medieval families and see them evolve and interact as you build their homes, in this lighthearted pixel art city-building strategy simulation. Expand your production chain and influence the daily lives of your villagers to craft a unique story of your settlement.

Name: Warhammer 40,000: Darktide
Summary: Riconquista la città di Tertium dalle orde di nemici assetati di sangue in questo brutale e intenso sparatutto d'azione. Warhammer 40.000: Darktide è la nuova esperienza co-op dai premiati creatori della serie Vermintide. Quando Tertium cadrà, i reietti saliranno al potere.

Name: As Dusk Falls
Summary: Esplora la vita di due famiglie i cui destini si intrecciano nell'arco di trent'anni in un originale dramma interattivo di INTERIOR/NIGHT. A partire da una rapina fallita nel 1998, le vite dei personaggi dipendono dalle tue scelte.

Name: The Uncertain: Light At The End
Summary: The Uncertain è un gioco di avventura ambientato in una Terra del futuro, dopo l'apocalisse. Esplora questo mondo misterioso e prendi decisioni in grado di cambiare il corso della storia del tuo personaggio.

Name: Sky Haven
Summary: Sky Haven is an airport tycoon/simulation game. Plan and construct. Manage schedule. Research. Improve logistics. Say your word in the airport development. Then watch how hundreds of passengers flow through your airport. That simple!

Name: Sherwood Extreme
Summary: Flip, swing, and slow-motion dive as Robin Hood: master of parkour and archery! Snipe wacky foes and bullet-time your way through the kingdom. Speedrun through thousands of level variants and chase leaderboard glory, solo or with friends.

Name: Before I Forget
Summary: A woman alone in a house. A mystery and a love story. Explore the present to uncover the past, in a short story of love and loss and a life well-lived. A narrative exploration game that examines a world where memories are constantly fading and jumbled.

Name: Ruinarch
Summary: Ruinarch is an evil overlord simulator with a focus on story generation. Take control of the narrative by spreading rumors, unleashing monsters, and creating chaos on an epic scale!

Name: Tales of the Black Forest
Summary: In a world filled with yōkai, a surging dark power has overshadowed a Japanese town. A group of 2 developers have produced a Japanese pixel adventure game to tell a tale that dates back to the Heisei era...In the name of dreams and passion.

Name: Roots of Pacha
Summary: Be a part of a thriving stone age community. Discover “ideas,” domesticate crops, befriend animals, and contribute to the growth of your village. Play with friends in co-op or explore the early days of civilization in single-player.

Name: What Happened
Summary: What Happened is a nightmarish first-person exploration of anxiety and depression from the perspective of American high school student, Stiles.

Name: SMASH LEGENDS
Summary: SMASH LEGENDS è un emozionante gioco di combattimenti 3 contro 3 in tempo reale. Combatti gratuitamente nelle arene del mondo di Library con alcune incredibili LEGGENDE, ogni volta che vuoi. Unisciti al divertimento e sfida i giocatori di più piattaforme, come Steam e dispositivi iOS e Android.

Name: There Is No Game: Wrong Dimension
Summary: Non c'è nessun gioco. Quindi non piantare tutto cliccando ovunque. Non vuoi essere cacciato via dal tuo mondo dei videogiochi, vero? Certo che no!

Name: PowerWash Simulator
