Per qualche ragione, Wolfenstein 3D e Spear of Destiny sono stati i pionieri del genere sparatutto in prima persona e hanno condotto i loro leggendari creatori, id Software, alla fama mondiale e hanno fatto...

Name: Quiplash 2 InterLASHional
Summary: Il gioco di società che ti consente di dire tutto quello che vuoi è ora internazionale! Tutto il divertentissimo contenuto di Quiplash 2, ora in francese, italiano, tedesco e spagnolo! Con 100 NUOVI suggerimenti in ciascuna lingua!

Name: League of Maidens
Summary: League of Maidens® è un gioco di ruolo d'azione online GRATUITO con bellissime donne con pistole e super poteri dello studio indipendente Maiden Gaming. Caratteristiche: missioni, battaglie, personalizzazione, posa e condivisione di personaggi, pose, scene e foto 4K.

Name: Nosferatu: The Wrath of Malachi
Summary: It is a misty evening in the year of our lord 1912. The Pattersons, a poor but proud aristocratic family of the British nobility, and some of their closest friends, arrive at the castle Malachi residence of a wealthy Romanian Count.

Name: ASCENDANTS Rising
Summary: ASCENDANTS Rising is a CO-OP Action RPG that lets you create your own unique playstyle and team to explore an ever-changing Multiverse teeming with deadly enemies, formidable Boss fights, and amazing loot.

Name: Daikatana
Summary: Nel 2455, Kage Mishima si è servito dei poteri magici della Daikatana, la spada più potente mai forgiata, per alterare il flusso temporale e autoproclamarsi dittatore supremo. Il tuo nome è Hiro Miyamoto, e sei una delle poche persone sulla terra a sapere cos’è successo.

Name: PROTEST
Summary: Long adventure of two girls in love! Cute anime girls struggle with discrimination. Only you can help save their pure love! Exciting RPG with nice anime graphics!

Name: Glitchpunk
Summary: Ispirato ai classici giochi d’azione top-down, Glitchpunk offre un futuro distopico di risse, sparatorie e corse sfrenate. In un mondo spietato di bande, sette e multinazionali, il lavoro per i cacciatori di taglie androidi non manca mai. Carica le armi e accendi il motore!

Name: Frincess&Cnight
Summary: Frincess&Cnight is a single-screen puzzle-platformer game about struggle and love between Frog princess and Cat knight.

Name: Gothic 3
Summary: n eroe senza nome diventa una leggenda! Myrtana, un mondo in subbuglio: devastata dagli orchi delle terre oscure del nord, Re Rhobar sta difendendo Vengard, l'antica roccaforte degli umani, con i pochi seguaci rimasti.

Name: Football Betting
Summary: This game is to let everyone understand the basic process of football betting, and at the same time warn everyone of the risk about gambling through this game.

Name: ibb & obb
Summary: ibb & obb è un gioco cooperativo ambientato in un mondo di puzzles in cui la forza di gravità esiste in 2 direzioni. Puoi vincere solo giocando in stretta cooperazione. Gioca con un amico seduti sullo stesso divano per un divertimento a stretto contatto o incontra un amico online.

Name: Faraday Protocol
Summary: Faraday Protocol è un puzzle game in prima persona, con trama, che metterà alla prova la tua curiosità e la tua percezione.

Name: Atelier Sophie: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Book DX
Summary: Il 17° episodio della serie Atelier. L'alchimista in erba di Kirchen Bell, Sophie, incontra il misterioso libro Plachta e inizia una splendida avventura per realizzare i suoi sogni.

Name: Thief II: The Metal Age
Summary: The ultimate thief is back! Tread softly as you make your way through 15 new complex, non-linear levels full of loot to steal and guards to outsmart. Improved enemy AI, new gadgets and a riveting story will draw you into the world of Thief™ II: The Metal Age, a place of powerful new technologies, fanatical religions and corruption.

Name: Conquest of Elysium 5
Summary: Conquest of Elysium 5 is a quick turn based fantasy strategy game with a touch of rogue-like. The game is full of depth, details and monsters. There are also a huge number of factions, each with its own unique gameplay and magic rituals.

Name: Warm Snow
Summary: 'Warm Snow' is a Rogue-like action game with a background set in a dark fantasy world, where the eerie 'Warm Snow' holds sway. You will play as the Warrior 'Bi-an' on a crusade against the Five Great Clans, in order to save a world teetering on the brink of destruction.

Name: Half-Life: Blue Shift
Summary: Giudicato "Gioco dell'anno" da più di 50 pubblicazioni, il titolo di debutto Valve abbina azione e avventura a una premiata tecnologia in grado di creare un mondo dal realismo impressionante, dove pensare è la chiave per la sopravvivenza.

Name: Ukrainian Ninja
Summary: Ukrainian Ninja is a multiplayer platformer game for Windows. The Ninja shoots and slashes, using weapons sold by the trader to clear each world.

Name: Myst IV: Revelation
Summary: In Myst IV: Revelation, the next chapter in the greatest adventure saga of all time, you'll travel through environments pulsing with life to unearth a treacherous scheme involving two of Myst's most sinister villains.

Name: Yacht Mechanic Simulator
Summary: Fonda il tuo impero di yacht! Trovane di usati, ripara gli scafi, metti a punto i motori, aggiungi parti nuove. Crea e installa interni di classe. Mettiti al timone dei tuoi yacht e sentili accarezzare la superficie dell'acqua. Vendili, ottieni profitti e diventa milionario!

Name: Deceit 2
Summary: Nove sconosciuti in trappola, due dei quali nascondono un segreto mostruoso. Supera in astuzia e in velocità i demoni interdimensionali, senza perdere la tua sanità mentale. La fuga richiede collaborazione, ma di chi ti puoi fidare?

Name: Puzzle Pirates
Summary: Every activity in Puzzle Pirates is a uniquely fun puzzle: be it sailing, gunning, or hauling treasure, your own puzzling skill determines your success!

Name: RaceRoom Racing Experience
Summary: RaceRoom is the premier free-to-play racing simulation on PC and home to official race series like DTM, WTCR, the WTCC and ADAC GT Masters. Enter RaceRoom and enter the world of a professional race car driver.

Name: Nancy Drew: Danger by Design
Summary: Go Undercover in Paris and Unravel a Case in Style!

Name: Sockventure
Summary: In this challenging 2D platformer game, play as a Superhero and help the Kid to find all the missing socks inside the cursed washing machine, Sockventure has stunning colorful graphics, hand-crafted levels, tight controls and fun ever-changing gameplay.

Name: -A-
Summary: This story is about a girl, humanity's last hope, and an agent, who just had enough. Together, they are the last thing standing between humankind and extinction.

Name: LOR - League of Runners
Summary: You will fight for the title of best runner in a beautiful fantasy world. You will need to pick up the scope to activate the portal and enter it. The main task - to pass as quickly as possible given the track.

Name: Arthur's Birthday
Summary: Arthur's Birthday is adapted from the original storybook into an interactive animated adventure! Interact with the pictures and discover hidden scenes. Many surprising encounters await with your favorite Arthur storybook characters!

Name: Tale of Immortal
Summary: Tale of Immortal is an open-world sandbox based on Chinese mythology and cultivation. You will grow to become immortal, conquer the beasts from the Classic of Mountains and Season, make your choices carefully and grasp your own destiny.

Name: Wer weiß denn sowas?
Summary: Con il gioco ufficiale basato sullo show televisivo, puoi mettere alla prova le tue conoscenze. Gioca con Elton, Bernhard Hoëcker, o con fino a tre amici. 30 show completi con oltre 390 domande da più di 100 categorie ti aspettano. Spesso ti chiederai: “Chi sa cose del genere?”

Name: Legion War
Summary: "Legion War" is a 4X strategy game in a fantasy setting. You can build and expand your territory, explore unknown lands, and search for mysterious treasure, cultivate your own heroes and troops while exterminating your opponent's, and challenge the god who rules the world behind the scenes.

Name: Quake
Summary: Scatena la tua furia attraverso 32 livelli giocatore singolo e 6 livelli deathmatch di puro terrore con sonoro e luci completamente coinvolgenti. Preparati ad affrontare Orchi cannibali, Divoratori demoniaci e Abomini indistruttibili sfruttando artigli letali, crudeli Sparafulmini e mostruosi Razzi e Lancia Granate.

Name: Live In Color
Summary: Use your wand to reveal your world in virtual reality, make it come to life & make it your own … Come see a beautiful fantasy world and play like a kid again!

Name: Outlast
Summary: Hell is an experiment you can't survive in Outlast, a first-person survival horror game developed by veterans of some of the biggest game franchises in history. As investigative journalist Miles Upshur, explore Mount Massive Asylum and try to survive long enough to discover its terrible secret... if you dare.

Name: Ark: Survival Ascended
Summary: Sei naufragato nudo, affamato e congelato su un'isola misteriosa, dovrai cacciare, raccogliere, creare oggetti, coltivare e costruire ripari per sopravvivere. Usa abilità e ingegno per uccidere, addomesticare e cavalcare Dinosauri e creature primitive che vivono su ARK. Alleati con centinaia di giocatori oppure gioca localmente!

Name: G String
Summary: Slip into the Standard Issue Biosuit as Myo Hyori, a gifted Korean teenage girl who must face the perils of the future. Survive many hazards, explore a seemingly endless metropolis and beyond as the world around you implodes and history marches towards its inevitable conclusion.

Name: Trash Horror Collection
Summary: Welcome to a true 80's trash horror experience. This collection has 10 short horror games that you can freely choose which one you want to play.

Name: Oliver
Summary: Crash Test Oliver Speedrun Challenge: If you beat the best time of our game creator Philipp, you will get a free key for the full version of Oliver Crash Test (scroll down for instructions).

Name: Chasing the wind
Summary: Chasing the wind is a casual level game and parkour game, accompanied by laid-back music, constantly flight forward. Faced with various obstacles, you need to consider the way to pass the game skillfully or flexibly. Of course, smooth levels are the fun of this game.

Name: Inside the Labs
Summary: Inside the Labs is a 1-4 player online co-op survival horror game. News of possible failed human experiments within an abandoned lab has piqued your curiosity. Explore the labs, collect evidence, identify the mutation, and survive it.

Name: The Trench
Summary: As captain of the Pandora sub, you must explore the Trench and retrieve data from the Neptune wreckage. But beware - the trench is home to unimaginable horrors that will test your courage. Can you survive the terrors of the deep and complete your mission, or will you become the next victim?

Name: Edna & Harvey: Harvey's New Eyes
Summary: Dai creatori dei pluripremiati “The Whispered World” e “Deponia” arriva il nuovo straordinario gioco Edna & Harvey: Harvey's New Eyes.

Name: Brotato
Summary: Brotato è un arena shooter in stile roguelite in cui vesti i panni di una patata. Impugna fino a 6 armi per sconfiggere le orde aliene. Scegli gli attributi e gli oggetti che preferisci per creare combinazioni uniche e sopravvivere fino all'arrivo dei rinforzi.

Name: Zoo Cleaner
Summary: Questo gioco ti permetterà di immergerti a capofitto nel lavoro di un addetto alle pulizie di uno zoo a una velocità vertiginosa. Devi pulire tutte le acque reflue di questo zoo e la cosa più importante è non cadere nelle grinfie degli animali!

Name: Balatro
Summary: Il roguelike a tema poker. Balatro è un gioco di costruzione di mazzi in cui formi mani di poker illegali, scopri jolly che stravolgono la partita e attivi combo adrenaliniche e stravaganti, provando una soddisfazione ipnotica.

Name: Loverowind
Summary: Loverowind is a very short experience about the wind of spring.

Name: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time HD
Summary: Tra le sabbie bruciate dell'antica Persia, si trova una leggenda diffusa in lingua antica. Parla di un tempo generato dal sangue e comandato dall' inganno. Scelto dalla forza oscura di un magico pugnale, un giovane Principe è indotto a scatenare un male mortale su un bellissimo regno.

Name: Saints Row: The Third Remastered
Summary: Get ready for the most out-landish gameplay scenarios ever seen as the Third Street Saints take on the Syndicate!

Name: Wartales
Summary: Wartales is an open world RPG in which you lead a group of mercenaries in their search for wealth across a massive medieval universe. Explore the world, recruit companions, collect bounties and unravel the secrets of the tombs of the ancients!

Name: The Last Haven
Summary: Il mondo dopo una guerra nucleare. Gestire l'insediamento, apprendere la tecnologia, prendere decisioni, produrre armi, munizioni, organizzare la difesa, fare irruzione per rifornimenti in altre aree, non lasciare che i residenti muoiano, sopravvivere all'inverno nucleare.

Name: Blacktail
Summary: Forgia la leggenda di Baba Yaga, una ragazza accusata di stregoneria e cacciata da casa. Vivi le origini del mito slavo in questa combinazione unica di intensi combattimenti con l'arco e storia dai toni cupi ambientata in un vibrante mondo fiabesco.

Name: Rosenkreuzstilette Freudenstachel
Summary: Step into the shoes of Freudia Neuwahl, a cool and collected young woman on a mission to save her best friend from an Imperial witch hunt. "Rosenkreuzstilette Freudenstachel" is the sequel to "Rosenkreuzstilette", a level-based 2D side scrolling action game for PC.

Name: Kitaria Fables
Summary: Armati di spada, arco e libro degli incantesimi e affronta la crescente oscurità che minaccia il mondo. Saccheggia le segrete alla ricerca di reliquie e risorse, prenditi cura della tua fattoria per raccogliere provviste e collabora coi tuoi vicini nel villaggio per creare nuovi equipaggiamenti.

Name: Tomb Raider: Anniversary
Summary: Adventurer Lara Croft has been hired to recover the pieces of an ancient artifact known as the Scion. With her fearless acrobatic style she runs, jumps, swims and climbs her way towards the truth of its origin and powers - leaving only a trail of empty tombs and gun-cartridges in her wake.

Name: Defense Zone 3 Ultra HD
Summary: Il seguito del popolare gioco di strategia, con nuove armi, paesaggi e opzioni!

Name: Adventure Game
Summary: A VR adventure game: explore dungeons, fight monsters, and solve puzzles to uncover the mysteries of a strange island

Name: Earthworm Jim 2
Summary: From Evil the Cat’s’Circus of the Scars’ to the planet of Meat, join Jim on a madcap chase across the galaxy. Saving cows, thwarting lawyers and outsmarting Psy-Crow are all in a day’s work for Jim. Are you up to the challenge? Can you handle the awesome new weapons? Excellent! Then stop reading this. Try it now!

Name: Euro Truck Simulator 2
Summary: Travel across Europe as king of the road, a trucker who delivers important cargo across impressive distances! With dozens of cities to explore, your endurance, skill and speed will all be pushed to their limits.

Name: 996的真实老板篇
Summary: 这是一个模拟经营的文字小游戏，主要模拟国内IT公司，如何充分利用员工加班经营到高分的一个过程，内容源自现在比较有争议的996加班制问题，因为我算是见证网络游戏行业发展的人，结合10几年的经历对现在的状况是有一套自己的理解，1个月前突发奇想觉得可以做一个模拟这种加班利弊的小游戏，来表达自己的看法，于是就动手了，到今天才刚出炉，这部是老板篇，主要模拟经营游戏开发过程中如何把控员工情绪，提高工作效率，追求最大利益的一个过程，看看最终你会是一个什么结果。

Name: Wrestledunk Sports
Summary: Wrestledunk è una collezione coloratissima ed esplosiva di sport ultra competitivi in multiplayer! Sfida online o in locale fino a 8 giocatori. Che cosa stai aspettando?!

Name: Panzer Knights
Summary: Panzer Knights is a single-player, story-driven tank shooter where you, a German Tank Commander, lead your platoon of tanks across Europe circa WWII. Experience battles spanning the entire war as you strategize, battle, and best your enemies!

Name: Insurgency
Summary: Take to the streets for intense close quarters combat, where a team's survival depends upon securing crucial strongholds and destroying enemy supply in this multiplayer and cooperative Source Engine based experience.

Name: Bear Party: Adventure
Summary: Have you ever wanted to bunnyhop at ludicrous speed all the while gibbing cartoon bears? Play through this fast-paced single-player adventure and find out!

Name: Harvester
Summary: A strange and twisted world...Harvester! The most violent adventure game of all time comes to Steam!

Name: Puzzle & Chess
Summary: Puzzle & Chess is a relaxing and minimalist game that mixes puzzle challenges with chess moves. Click on pieces, solve the puzzles with a pleasant and relaxing environment. You don't need to know how to play chess to have fun. No score, no timer and no pressure.

Name: Wayfinder
Summary: Diventa un Wayfinder e sblocca i suoi poteri mentre scegli il tuo percorso, il tuo stile di gioco e respingi una forza ostile che ha sopraffatto il tuo mondo. Controlla il Caos mentre dai forma e personalizzi infinite avventure per te e i tuoi amici perché i Wayfinder sono più forti insieme.

Name: Trapped
Summary: Welcome to Estate de’ Sukari. Home to Aki, a young lady who happens to live inside of the manor. She awakens one fateful evening to a horrific dream of her death. as she considers the possibility of sleep, a loud shriek fills the air leaving her with a question: Should she investigate or should she go back to bed?

Name: This War of Mine: Final Cut
Summary: In This War Of Mine non giochi nel ruolo di un soldato d'élite, ma piuttosto in quello di un gruppo di civili che cerca di sopravvivere in una città sotto assedio, lottando con la carenza di cibo e medicine e costantemente in pericolo a causa di cecchini e rovistatori ostili.

Name: Crimson Snow
Summary: Christmas is a joyful time, but this time something dark is hiding behind the holiday decorations. Your actions will determine whether you and your girlfriend survive Christmas night.

Name: Citizens: On Mars
Summary: Experience the ultimate turn-based colony building game in Citizens: On Mars! As the leader of a fledgling Martian settlement, your mission is to develop a thriving colony amidst the harsh and unforgiving environment of the Red Planet.

Name: V Rising
Summary: Awaken as a vampire. Hunt for blood in nearby settlements to regain your strength and evade the scorching sun to survive. Raise your castle and thrive in an ever-changing open world full of mystery. Gain allies online and conquer the land of the living.

Name: Bengan Yes
Summary: Bengan Yes is an action-packed arena fighting game designed for livestreaming. Choose to either let your viewers brawl it out or simulate a clash between thousands of bots. Everyone has an equal chance of winning with both the arena and stats of players being randomized.

Name: 60 Seconds! Reatomized
Summary: 60 secondi! Questa è l'avventura atomica di sopravvivenza con elementi di commedia nera. Fai le provviste e salva la tua famiglia prima che esplode la bomba. L'esperienza nel proprio rifugio. Intraprendere decisioni difficili, emanano alimentari e caccia mutanti scarafaggi. Sopravvivere. Oppure no.

Name: Christmas Night
Summary: Christmas Night is a story-themed horror game about Christmas and its beliefs. Will we be rewarded for being a good girl this Christmas or will we be punished for being a spoiled person?

Name: Pajama Sam In: No Need to Hide When It's Dark Outside
Summary: There's no reason to be afraid of the dark. Fed up with his fear of the dark, Sam transforms himself into Pajama Sam - world's youngest superhero and resolves to confront Darkness! With help from King the mine car, Otto the boat, and a host of fascinating characters.

Name: NBA 2K23
Summary: Raccogli la sfida in NBA 2K23. Sfodera il tuo talento in MyCAREER. Metti insieme le All-Star con le leggende del passato in MyTEAM. Costruisci la tua eredità in MyGM o porta la NBA verso una nuova direzione in modalità MyLEAGUE. Guida le squadre NBA o WNBA nella modalità PLAY NOW e vivi l’esperienza di un gameplay super realistico.

Name: mr.President Prologue
Summary: This country needs a hero. This country needs a mr.President.

Name: Wer weiß denn sowas? - Das 2. Spiel
Summary: È l’ora del secondo round, che promette il miglior intrattenimento per te e i tuoi amici. Gioca in squadra con Elton, o combatti con Bernhard Hoëcker. dovrai dare tutto in WER WEISS DENN SOWAS? Ti aspettano 30 nuovi episodi con domande divertenti e video di risposta.

Name: Kingdom Rush HD
Summary: Get ready for an epic journey to defend your kingdom against hordes of orcs, trolls, evil wizards and other nasty fiends using a vast arsenal of towers and spells at your command!Fight on forests, mountains and wastelands, customizing your defensive strategy with different tower upgrades and specializations!

Name: Otter Of My Life
Summary: Meet your significant otter~

Name: Metal Slug 2
Summary: “METAL SLUG 2”, the 2nd entry in SNK’s emblematic 2D run & gun action shooting game returns to the battlefield on the Steam gaming platform!

Name: Forza Motorsport
Summary: Elabora nuovi assetti nell'inedita modalità carriera. Gareggia con i tuoi amici in eventi multigiocatore regolamentati. Competi con più di 500 auto su piste famose in tutto il mondo con IA all'avanguardia, fisica avanzata e strategia pneumatici e carburante.

Name: Metal Slug
Summary: “METAL SLUG ”, il primo titolo della leggendaria serie di giochi di sparatorie 2D della SNK, il gioco da cui tutto ha avuto inizio, ritorna su Steam!

Name: Birth
Summary: Birth è un rompicapo incentrato sull'ideazione di una creatura fatta d'ossa e organi raccolti in città, che ti aiuterà a colmare il tuo senso di solitudine. Risolvi enigmi basati sulla fisica e svela i segreti custoditi in musei, pasticcerie, librerie e altri luoghi disegnati amorevolmente a mano.

Name: Forewarned
Summary: FOREWARNED is a 1-4 player co-op survival horror. Gear up and delve deep into ancient Egyptian ruins with your team of fellow archaeologists. Investigate the phenomena around you, collect treasure, discover lore, and survive the evil that lurks within.

Name: Tomb Raider: Legend
Summary: Segui Lara Croft in un'avventura che la porterà a viaggiare intorno al mondo e ad esplorare località esotiche alla ricerca di uno dei manufatti più importanti della storia, qualcosa che riporterà in vita delle figure indesiderate del misterioso passato di Lara.

Name: ETERNAL BLOOD
Summary: ETERNAL BLOOD is a high-adrenaline arcade-action FPS. Face legions of demons, harvest their souls and become a God of Destruction.

Name: Opus: Echo of Starsong
Summary: Echo of Starsong is a Narrative puzzle adventure game. Eda, a girl who can hear mysterious sound waves known as starsong, crosses paths with a young man in search of their source. Together, they venture out to the heart of space to unravel an ancient myth.

Name: Trailer Shop Simulator
Summary: Being on the run from the mafia for more than 10 years, you managed to hide for a while in a cozy sunny town. Develop, buy weapons, engage in all available types of business to eventually protect yourself from a large criminal organization.

Name: Safecracker: The Ultimate Puzzle Adventure
Summary: As an expert safecracker, you are hired by the wealthy family of a recently deceased to search his mansion for his last will and testament. Duncan W. Adams was an avid safe collector and an 'eccentric,' to say the least. Adams has hidden the deed to his vast fortunes in one of 35 safes.

Name: Assassin's Creed: Director's Cut Edition
Summary: Assassin's Creed™ è il gioco di nuova generazione sviluppato da Ubisoft Montreal che ridefinisce il genere azione. Mentre altri giochi si proclamano di nuova generazione per via di grafiche e fisica impressionanti, Assassin's Creed unisce tecnologia, design, temi ed emozioni in un mondo dove tu puoi generare il caos e diventare un...

Name: Formula XD
Summary: Take on the role of racing team manager - hiring drivers, negotiating contracts with sponsors and engine suppliers, making the big decisions necessary to keep your team above water. You'll issue orders to your drivers out onto the track, and be responsible for guiding them to victory or defeat.

Name: Pathologic Classic HD
Summary: Pathologic 2 is a groundbreaking open-world horror RPG. Resist the plague. Make medicine. Heal people. Perform an autopsy. Trade to get what you need. Fight and kill if necessary. Survive. Struggle with an outbreak in a secluded rural town that is rapidly turning into hell.

Name: BattleQuiz
Summary: Battle Quiz is a classical multiplechoice trivia quiz game. Many characters to choose from, large question base, and a lots of great fun!

Name: Ghost Watchers
Summary: "Ghost Watchers" – questo è un horror online cooperativo. Devi esplorare e catturare i fantasmi nelle case abbandonate

Name: Chants of Sennaar
Summary: La leggenda narra che un giorno un viandante riunirà le genti della Torre, che non sono più in grado di comunicare tra loro. Osserva, ascolta e decifra le lingue antiche in un universo affascinante ispirato al mito di Babele.

Name: FlatOut 2
Summary: CON UNA GUIDA COSÌ SPERICOLATA, GLI INCIDENTI NON SONO UN CASO! Ma forse farai meglio a provocarne un po'. A velocità tanto elevate, più danni fai meglio è. Le più recenti auto turbo e i piloti più pazzi stanno solo aspettando di mettere alla prova la tua forza distruttiva. Se sei un guidatore responsabile, questo gioco non fa per te.

Name: Pumping Simulator 2
Summary: A gas station management game, start by selling a car to raise funds and invest in an abandoned plot of land. Build, expand, and upgrade your gas station, diversify services, customize and manage time efficiently during peak hours. And maybe you will become rich

Name: Moonstone Island
Summary: Moonstone Island is a creature-collecting life-sim set in an open world with 100 islands to explore. Make friends, brew potions, collect Spirits, and test your strength in card-based encounters to complete your Alchemy training!

Name: Mutropolis
Summary: MUTROPOLIS è un'avventura sci-fi ambientata su una Terra desolata. Vestite i panni di Dijon (eroe, nerd, investigatore) alla ricerca della leggendaria città perduta. Cercate solo di non farvi obliterare da un nemico senza tempo. Giocatori avvisati...

Name: TrackMania 2: Stadium
Summary: [p]Dopo aver conquistato milioni di giocatori in TrackMania Nations Forever, il celebre scenario ”Stadium” ritorna in TrackMania² Stadium e, grazie alla piattaforma ManiaPlanet, si arricchisce di una nuova serie di servizi, una grafica migliorata e un editor di tracciati ancora più potente.

Name: The Good Life
Summary: Enjoy everyday life while solving a murder mystery in Rainy Woods - known as the "happiest town in the world" - in this all-new "Debt Repayment RPG"!

Name: Hack Time
Summary: Once again, your mission is to penetrate a strange organization’s infrastructure to discover their secrets. Your employer needs help discovering who is out to get her and she only trusts you to take on this perilous mission. Hack Time uses old-school prompts (like DOS and UNIX) to access virtual programs and systems.

Name: UGLY
Summary: Svela oscuri segreti nascosti in questo avvincente platform a enigmi e scopri la storia di un nobile che affronta i traumi del suo passato. Risolvi stanze impegnative sfruttando un'innovativa meccanica a specchio e sconfiggi imponenti boss mentre cerchi di mettere insieme la terribile verità.

Name: Swords and Sandals Classic Collection
Summary: "Gladiator ... gladiator ... gladiator ... Swords and Sandals, Gladiatorrrrr!"If this refrain means anything to you, then you grew up playing the legendary Swords and Sandals turn based combat game series. These games have been played over half a billion times, and for good reason.

Name: Nefertari: Journey to Eternity
Summary: For the first time ever, step inside Nefertari's tomb and immerse yourself in the story of its art, history, construction, and mythology through interactive elements.

Name: UNDAWN
Summary: Explore, adapt, and survive in Undawn, a free-to-play open-world survival RPG for mobile and PC developed by LightSpeed Studios and published by Level Infinite. Embark on an adventure with other survivors four years after a worldwide disaster where hordes of infected roam a shattered world.

Name: Bramble: The Mountain King
Summary: Bramble The Mountain King è un'avventura cupa ambientata in un mondo ispirato alle oscure fiabe nordiche. Esplora la splendida ma insidiosa terra di Bramble nel tentativo di salvare tua sorella. Attraversa magnifici paesaggi e sopravvivi a incontri letali con le tante creature inquietanti di Bramble

Name: Song Beater: Quite My Tempo!
Summary: VR rhythm game on steroids. Beat challenging songs with your bare fists in Fit Boxing, wield variety of weapons (blades, tonfas, phasers, staff, saw) in Free Style or dominate the playfield in Real 360 mode. Global and friends leaderboards, calories burnt statistics. Custom songs and videos support.

Name: EWorlds
Summary: Make your way through limitless adventures in this multiplayer 3D platform game!. Explore, jump, compete, fight other players and have fun your own way, with friends or by yourself, lots of levels with unique designs and challenges are waiting for you!.

Name: Dead Rising
Summary: Sei Frank West, un intransigente fotoreporter determinato a svelare il mistero che si cela dietro al centro commerciale di Willamette. Brulica di zombi. Hai 72 ore. Salme di fine stagione!

Name: Breakwaters
Summary: Adventure through an ever-changing oceanic world that evolves the way you interact with water. Swim, sail, and fly to find new islands with unique resources to build, craft, and survive. Join friends online and build a home to defend, or defeat massive Titans bringing calm to the waves.

Name: Musical Range
Summary: Musical Range is a VR rhythm game where you use firearms to play along to your favorite music! Shoot to the rhythm!

Name: The Longest Journey
Summary: The Longest Journey is an amazing graphical adventure, where the player controls the protagonist, April Ryan, on her journey between parallel universes.

Name: Shantae and the Pirate's Curse
Summary: Embark on an all-new adventure with Shantae, the hair-whipping belly dancing genie. After losing her magic, Shantae teams up with the nefarious pirate Risky Boots in order to save Sequin Land from a curse.

Name: Elite: Dangerous
Summary: Controlla la tua navicella in una galassia spietata. Elite Dangerous è il multigiocatore massivo spaziale definitivo epico.

Name: Condemned: Criminal Origins
Summary: What twists the mind of an ordinary human into a serial killer?

Name: Nuclear Option
Summary: Fly near-future aircraft with immersive physics on intense battlefields, facing land, air and sea threats. Wage war against AI or other players with an array of potent weapons. Wield tactical and strategic nuclear weapons, capable of annihilating anything in their path.

Name: Monster Girl Fantasy
Summary: Monster Girl Fantasy is an RPG that thrusts you deep into a fantasy world filled with exotic creatures and seductive monster girls. Are you able to gain the trust of monster girls and stop demons from taking them as slaves?

Name: Cthulhu
Summary: Go back to the 80's with a delorean! Collect points to upgrade your trophy and try not to crash. The game might sound simple but it's harder than it looks.

Name: Final Fantasy IX
Summary: FINAL FANTASY IX, il celebre RPG uscito in Giappone nel 2000 e che ha venduto fino ad oggi oltre 5 milioni di copie, è finalmente disponibile su STEAM! Rivivi tutte le avventure di Gidan e i suoi amici sul tuo PC!

Name: Peaks of Yore
Summary: Travel around The Great Gales to climb challenging peaks in this physics-based climbing adventure set in 1887. Meet like-minded mountaineers, unlock helpful climbing gear, and become a pioneer of mountaineering.

Name: The Lancaster Leak: Crisis at Call Center
Summary: YOU CONTROL THE FOUND FOOTAGE. Another tape has been leaked, this time a cover-up of a tragic mass casualty event.

Name: Watermelon Game
Summary: A Casual Physics Puzzel game, where you have to combine matching Fruits to get Points and increase your Highscore.

Name: Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic II - The Sith Lords
Summary: 5 years after the events of the award winning original, the Sith are on the verge of crushing the Old Republic. As a lone Jedi, will you follow the light side or succumb to the dark?

Name: HighFleet
Summary: Battle for survival in the skies of a mysterious future Earth in this unique action-strategy game mixing arcade combat, exploration, management and diplomacy. As giant flying ships wage spectacular aerial warfare, a prophecy tells of one who will save the world – could it be you?

Name: System Shock 2
Summary: "Remember, it is my will that guided you here. It is my will that gave you your cybernetic implants, the only beauty in that meat you call a body. If you value that meat... you will do as I tell you." The cult classic sci-fi horror FPS-RPG has returned.

Name: Construction Simulator
Summary: Construction Simulator è tornato: più vasto ed entusiasmante che mai! Prendi il controllo di oltre 80 macchinari, alcuni del tutto inediti per questa serie, e inizia a costruire in completa libertà su due mappe immense, da solo o con gli amici!

Name: Amok Runner
Summary: One day, a noble woman turns our protagonist's (the doctor) life upside down by visiting his clinic, in a town where the amok madness is rampant. The doctor leaves all his personal effects and career aside and begins to follow this woman's footsteps while fighting against the deadly amok syndrome.

Name: The Last Survey
Summary: A Hand-Drawn Visual Novel Essay Game

Name: Room 13
Summary: You have just checked in to your motel room, 'Room 13'...unlucky you. A sudden knock on your room door, awakens you from your deep sleep and turns out to become your unluckiest nightmare.

Name: Jagged Alliance 2
Summary: Il piccolo stato di Arulco è stato occupato da uno spietato dittatore: solo tu puoi aiutare i suoi abitanti a liberarsene! Jagged Alliance 2 Gold Pack ti avvolge in un complesso universo di giochi di ruolo nel quale potrai interagire con oltre 150 personaggi, assoldare il tuo gruppo di soldati e creare mercenari personalizzati per...

Name: Fear Therapy
Summary: Fear Therapy, è un gioco horror psicologico multiplayer (1-4) e single player. Prova a completare le missioni e lascia la casa dell'orrore prima che sia troppo tardi! Satana si arrabbia sempre di più e niente lo trattiene.

Name: Strategic Command: American Civil War
Summary: For the first time in the series’ history, Strategic Command will be taking you to the 19th century battlefields of the American Civil War. You will control the armies, research, production and diplomatic policy of either the Union or the Confederacy during a time of innovation and dramatic battles.

Name: Room 54
Summary: Room 54 è un videogioco horror survival in prima persona, focalizzato sull'investigazione, esplorazione e gli elementi stealth/action. La storia di Daniel e sua moglie Desirè in un apparente tranquilla cittadina di montagna piena di segreti.

Name: It Will Find You
Summary: It Will Find You is a first person narrative driven horror experience, with a focus on environmental interaction and progressive narrative through game-play. It Will Find You aims to provide an immersive experience where a dark, twisting narrative evolves in tandem with your decisions.

Name: Nancy Drew: The White Wolf of Icicle Creek
Summary: Follow a Trail to Hidden Secrets and Sabotage!

Name: Monster Harvest
Summary: Un'avventura in una fattoria fuori dal comune! Sviluppa la tua fattoria, costruisci e personalizza la tua casa, crea i tuoi mobili, prepara deliziose confetture e muta le tue coltivazioni per creare dei compagni leali e forti da schierare in battaglia!

Name: Metal
Summary: Knowledge can be the most powerful tool or the deadliest weapon. To survive you must balance destruction and creation.

Name: Escape From Mystwood Mansion
Summary: In this first-person puzzle escape room game, you are trapped in the mysterious Mystwood mansion. Explore the mansion and find hidden compartments while solving puzzles and deciphering codes to find a way out. Will you escape or linger to uncover the mansion's final secret?

Name: Mad Max
Summary: Sei Mad Max un sopravvissuto, eroe suo malgrado. Max non desidera altro che lasciarsi la follia alle spalle e trovare conforto per la sua anima tormentata.

Name: Inkbound
Summary: A turn-based tactical action roguelike from the creators of Monster Train. Play solo or co-op, level up, create broken builds, and save the Atheneum.

Name: Romancing SaGa 2
Summary: Siediti sul trono dell'impero di Varennes e controlla diverse generazioni di sovrani in una valorosa battaglia contro i Seven Heroes.

Name: Democracy 2
Summary: On Tuesday, November 6th Americans will vote to shape the future of their country. Why wait? Start shaping your country's future now in Democracy 2.

Name: Fashion Police Squad
Summary: Even at this moment, our fashionable city is under assault. Baggy pants, dull suits, sightings of socks with sandals. A message needs to be sent, and it needs to be sent in style... Time to serve some good ol' Fashion Justice!

Name: Escape from Monkey Island
Summary: Fourth in the legendary Monkey Island series of graphic adventures!

Name: Amanda the Adventurer
Summary: Unisciti ad Amanda e al suo amico Wooly in una serie di avventure in cui esplorano e imparano a conoscere il nostro meraviglioso mondo! Con diversi NUOVI episodi di gioco, risate e apprendimento, il divertimento è assicurato! Ma ricorda di fare tutto quello che dice Amanda o potrebbe arrabbiarsi.

Name: RAIDBORN
Summary: RAIDBORN is a straightforward first-person fantasy action RPG featuring procedurally generated dungeons and quests. Plunder a treasure-strewn world, upgrade your gear, level up your skills, and hurl yourself into intense combat.

Name: ZanZarah: The Hidden Portal
Summary: Le leggende parlano di una lunga e perduta profezia… di un scintillante eroe e di pericolose avventure… di poteri sinistri, strani mondi e sciami di fate… ma non parlano di un ragazza dal cuore grande invece dalla spada grande!

Name: Crazy Taxi
Summary: Ehi ehi, salta su e divertiti con Craaaaazy Taxi! Sfreccia tra le strade intasate dal traffico, attraversa le aree di parcheggio multilivello e fiòndati verso compensi fuori di testa, realizzando Crazy Combo, in una frenetica gara per le corse dai prezzi più elevati.

Name: World of Warships: Legends
Summary: Combatti in epiche battaglie navali gratuite al timone di una delle 350 e più navi storiche, nell'esaltante equilibrio tra strategia e combattimento in tempo reale di World of Warships. Dota la tua flotta di bandiere, mimetiche, potenziamenti, Capitani talentuosi e molto altro!

Name: Grow: Song of the Evertree
Summary: Fai crescere i tuoi mondi e coltiva una relazione naturale e profonda con tutto ciò che li abita. Osserva come le tue azioni possono migliorare il mondo e riportare in vita l'Evertree in questo entusiasmante gioco sandbox ricco di elementi gestionali e d'avventura in cui creare dei mondi fantastici.

Name: Drones
Summary: Blast your way through hordes of enemies in the progressive wave mode to defeat the overseer, or test your skills with the endless survival mode to become the greatest warrior on the leaderboard.

Name: Comedy Night
Summary: Hai il talento di affrontare altri comici in un contest show dal vivo? Scopri in che modo le tue risorse possono affrontare il pubblico crudele che ti può eliminare o l'implacabile conversazione di altri performer.

Name: The Callisto Protocol
Summary: Fuggi dagli orrori di Callisto per sopravvivere e svelare gli oscuri segreti della luna morte di Giove.

Name: Eggcelerate! to the North Pole
Summary: Deliver Easter eggs on the North Pole and drift around snow banks without dropping an egg. The time-trial challenges are snow joke in this eggspansion.

Name: Simple Game
Summary: It is a simple game. Help Chibisi make a pie. Simply collect five apples and the victory is yours. But you must not think if there is something hidden there...

Name: Homebody
Summary: Homebody è un puzzle game di sopravvivenza horror su un gruppo di amici tormentati dai ricordi del passato e braccati da un killer implacabile. O vai avanti o morirai nel tentativo di farlo.

Name: REPLIKATOR
Summary: In this shooter with roguelike elements, you play as one of the galactic mercenaries, explore a mysterious scientific complex and uncover the secret of the REPLIKATOR project.

Name: Disgaea 1 Complete
Summary: The hotheaded Laharl seeks to be the next big Overlord in the Netherworld...and will destroy anyone that gets in his way! With his devious vassal Etna and the angel trainee Flonne as his unlikely allies, he must battle his way to supremacy and retake the throne in this over-the-top RPG adventure!

Name: The Adventures of Mr. Poop
Summary: The Adventures of Mr. Poop is an addictive platformer with an incredibly intricate plot, a lot of levels in which you have to overcome many interesting and difficult challenges. What is the price of survival?

Name: Animalia Survival
Summary: Vivi come una delle sorprendenti creature della Savana, scegli se essere un carnivoro o un erbivoro, predatore o preda. In questo Multiplayer Open World potrai muoverti come un magnifico Leone, un maestoso Elefante, oppure un’agile gazzella, ma ricorda una cosa: devi sopravvivere a ogni costo!

Name: Wonder Boy in Monster World
Summary: Monsters have taken over the land, and every day the citizens fear for their lives, hoping that a hero will step forth and bring peace to the embattled country.

Name: Chrono Trigger
Summary: Questo gioco di ruolo classico torna con tantissime novità! Viaggia nel passato più remoto, nel futuro lontano, fino a raggiungere la fine dei tempi. Questa epica avventura in cui dovrai salvare un intero pianeta farà storia ancora una volta.

Name: Ecco the Dolphin
Summary: La vita era un’avventura continua per il giovane delfino Ecco. L’oceano non aveva confini con le sue grandi onde da cavalcare! A tutta velocità, Ecco tagliava le onde spiccando salti incredibili! Finché un giorno, tutto cambiò. Un improvviso mulinello di aria e acqua si abbatté sulla casa di Ecco, lasciandolo solo.

Name: Automation
Summary: PLC Ladder Logic programming simulator.

Name: Scramble
Summary: Scramble is a resource management game in which you compete against other companies for the colonization of the New World.

Name: PC Futbol Stars
Summary: Scegli la tua nazionale preferita e partecipa a mega tornei contro utenti connessi da PC o da dispositivi mobili! Gioca subito gratuitamente alla nostra lega di calcio fatta di tappi!Il tuo obiettivo è quello di far crescere il tuo calciatore e vincere ogni partita nei diversi tornei ed eventi.

Name: Putt-Putt Travels Through Time
Summary: Mr. Firebird's time machine has gone haywire and Putt-Putt's® best pal Pep, is lost somewhere in time.

Name: INSIDE
Summary: Solo e spaventato, un ragazzo si ritrova suo malgrado al centro di un progetto oscuro.

Name: ZooKeeper Simulator
Summary: In ZooKeeper Simulator, there are two teams: Zookeeper vs Animals. Zookeeper must maintain the park by carrying out missions while animals must prevent them utilizing violence and pure brutality.

Name: Bloons TD 5
Summary: Five-star tower defense with unrivaled depth and replayability. The Bloons are back in full HD glory and this time they mean business! Build awesome towers, choose your favorite upgrades, hire cool new Special Agents, and pop every last invading Bloon in the best ever version of the most popular tower defense series in history.

Name: Minesweeper Classy
Summary: A modern and stylish take on a classic logic puzzle game. Play the classic minesweeper levels, beat unique level layouts and challenges, or create and share your own level designs.

Name: Funtime with Buffy
Summary: Things are not going so well since you've been left alone in the house. Your friendly plushie toy, Buffy, is not so friendly anymore. Otherwise he's haunting you all along.

Name: Last Stop
Summary: Last Stop è un'avventura per giocatore singolo ambientata nella Londra dei giorni nostri, nella quale controllerai tre personaggi diversi i cui mondi si scontrano nel mezzo di una crisi sovrannaturale.

Name: This is a Ghost
Summary: This is a Ghost is a supernatural investigation game. You are a member of a secret society that hunts or sets free scary entities from our world. Gather evidence, identify the entity and send it back to the afterlife. Playable in Solo and co-op : 1 to 4 players.

Name: Madden NFL 23
Summary: Entra nei libri di storia. Controlla l'impatto delle tue decisioni in modi inediti. Diventa protagonista in Franchise con aggiornamenti alla free agency e alle dinamiche commerciali, fatti un nome in Face of the Franchise: The League e assembla la rosa più forte di Madden Ultimate Team™.

Name: Conrad Stevenson's Paranormal P.I.
Summary: I made this first-person single player ghost hunting simulation game, trying to take an authentic approach at investigating ghosts. Use essential paranormal tools to help your community alleviate their concerns and put their minds at ease.

Name: Bunhouse
Summary: Bunhouse is a cute, simple, bunny-filled game focused on growing plants and managing a greenhouse with fellow buns. Take care of your leafy plant buddies by balancing the amount of water and light they get. Play with friends and upgrade your greenhouse for wholesome, relaxing fun.

Name: Savage Halloween
Summary: In Savage Halloween the world is taken over by monsters from the afterlife who were trapped in the Earth after a Halloween party, and now they have decided to make their new home here.

Name: Cossacks: European Wars
Summary: This game is devoted to the key events of the XVII–XVIII centuries.

Name: Seed of Life
Summary: Seed of Life è un'epica avventura sulla persistenza della vita. Tu sei Cora, l'ultima sopravvissuta di Lumia, un pianeta morente. L'unica speranza per salvare il tuo mondo è attivare il Seme della Vita e ridare impulso al sole. Sarai la luce che conquista l'oscurità?

Name: Ticket To Ride
Summary: NON COLLEGARE SOLO LE CITTÀ! Parti con i tuoi amici e con la tua famiglia per (ri)scoprire Ticket to Ride, il gioco da tavolo. In questa avventura sui binari, dovrai collegare le tue città e raggiungere le destinazioni prima degli altri.

Name: BAPBAP
Summary: Join BAPBAP, the wildest Free-To-Play Battle Royale featuring a fresh line-up of characters packed with unique abilities. Round up your squad and fight your way to be the last team standing.

Name: Original War
Summary: An American geological expedition, under a UN mandate, assesses the natural resources in a distant part of Siberia, deep in the trackless steppes of Eastern Russia. But instead of oil, they discover a deposit of a hitherto unknown mineral.

Name: Metal Slug X
Summary: “METAL SLUG X”, one of the most highly praised titles in the series among Metal Slug fans for its refined balance and game volume, heads out to the Steam gaming platform!

Name: Flight Of Nova
Summary: Flight Of Nova is a flight simulation in which you take control of spacecrafts on the full-scale planet NVA-31. You will fly on different types of machines during transport and research missions in an environment with realistic aerodynamics and orbital physics.

Name: Princess Maker 2 Refine
Summary: Princess Maker 2 Refine is a life simulation game which you play as a father of a girl, who had descended from the star. You have 8 years to raise your daughter from age 10 to 18 – your daughter will grow into her adulthood through various experiences.

Name: Half-Life 2: Episode Two
Summary: 1998. HALF-LIFE sconvolge il mondo dei giochi con la sua combinazione di azione martellante e trama completa e coinvolgente. Il titolo di debutto di Valve vince più di 50 premi come miglior gioco dell'anno, viene nominato "Miglior gioco per PC di sempre" da PC Gamer e lancia una serie che conta più di otto milioni di copie vendute in...

Name: You Must
Summary: In the social network, the main character plays the quest "Hide and Seek", but this time the organizers decided to move the quest to the real world. They indicate the coordinates of the place where the quest item was hidden, the one who finds it first will receive a cash prize.

Name: Finders Reapers
Summary: Finders Reapers is an inventive third-person shooter.Experience items raining from the sky, collect them, sell them and discover a whole new concept where cash is ammo.Take on missions, fight it out online or battle against bots in custom skirmish mode.It’s time to prove you’re the best.

Name: Lost in Blindness
Summary: Have you ever wondered if you could play a video game, without even looking at the screen? What if you played this unique sound-based adventure game, without even seeing anything!

Name: Hans
Summary: Hans is a physics-driven, parkour adventure. Ascend to the sky with our lonely watermelon hero. Navigate treacherous platforms, defy physics by slowing down time, try not to fall and chase the dream of reuniting with humanity. No saves. Bounce, fail, adapt, and bounce again.

Name: Die After Sunset
Summary: Die After Sunset is a 3rd person action rogue-lite shooter with a unique mechanic featuring light and darkness. Battle for Earth and travel through time as you defeat hordes of enemies and complete random quests to create the best build possible. Can you solve the mystery behind the Murkor invasion?

Name: Cricket 22
Summary: Cricket 22 offre The Ashes, Big Bash, The Hundred e una moltitudine di gare amate dai fan! Nuove meccaniche, commentatori e una coinvolgente modalità carriera narrativa ti offriranno l’esperienza di cricket più profonda di sempre.

Name: Yet Another Zombie Survivors
Summary: The Horde is coming but you're ready to fight it! Assemble your team and decide upon their enhancements to find the most efficient synergies against thousands of the undead. Survive. Then evolve. Then break all the limits in this deceivingly simple but addictive reverse bullet hell.

Name: Lights, Camera, Reaction!
Summary: LCR is the ultimate party game to break out during family gatherings and friendly get-togethers! Play in both VR and non-VR game modes, including a single player reaction mode, a local multiplayer mode, and an online smartphone-based multiplayer mode. Enjoy countless hours of hilarious fun!

Name: 로스팅 리포트:대학생 수면제 사망사건
Summary: 제한된 공간, 제한된 단서, 명쾌한 추리! 10개의 질문을 통해 진실을 밝혀내는 추리게임.

Name: Ethyrial: Echoes of Yore
Summary: Ethyrial: Echoes Of Yore is inspired by the old-school MMORPG, set on the lands of Irumesa, uncover secrets, explore new lands, craft your own spells and armour, the freedom is yours!

Name: Retro
Summary: Retro is an arcade-style mini game collection with an arcade, story mode and a "corrupted" arcade! Play though the mini games in arcade mode, battle the virus in story mode or try for a new high score with much more challenging games in the corrupted arcade!

Name: No More Room in Hell
Summary: The chances of you surviving this all out war of society and the undead are slim to none. Already, there are millions of the walking dead shambling about, searching for food to eat. There's no known cure. One bite can possibly end it all for you. However, you aren't alone in this nightmare.

Name: Home Sweet Home
Summary: Home Sweet Home is a first-person horror adventure game based on Thai myths and beliefs. The core gameplay focuses on storytelling and stealth to avoid perilous spirits hunting you. Moreover, few puzzles are added into the game, making gameplay more various.

Name: Epic Palace: Knossos
Summary: Immerse yourself in the epic world of the Bronze Age! Rule over the first European civilization and build the famous Palace of Knossos. Be smart in diplomacy and trade, use your gained reputation and equip your throne room with unique frescoes from all over the world.

Name: Beacon Pines
Summary: Beacon Pines is a cute and creepy adventure game within a magical storybook. You play as both the reader of the book and its main character, Luka. Explore the town to find word charms. Use your charms to change the course of fate!

Name: Convenience Store
Summary: "Convenience Store" is a classic convenience store operating simulation game. The original version was released in 2005 and re-launched on Steam in 2019.

Name: Recoil
Summary: This is a 2D shooting game. As the score increases, the difficulty becomes more and more difficult. Different enemies will have different attack methods. If you want to survive longer, keep moving and shoot.

Name: Chicken Invaders 3
Summary: Chickens. For centuries we have oppressed them, grilling, roasting, stewing, and stuffing them in buns. The time has come for us to pay. Intergalactic chickens are invading Earth, seeking revenge for the oppression of their earthly brethren!

Name: Train Sim World 4
Summary: Viaggia a una velocità immensa ed esprimi una creatività senza paragoni con Train Sim World 4! Alimenta la tua passione ferroviaria e vivi l'emozione di guidare su una vasta serie di percorsi e treni iconici. Dal Centro di addestramento ai passi di montagna, dai inizio al tuo viaggio.

Name: Torchlight: Infinite
Summary: The fate of Ember Technology is in your hands. With abounding hero build possibilities, dive into an epic journey with endless loot, adrenaline-pumping fights & new seasonal contents.

Name: Wasteland 2: Director's Cut
Summary: From the producer of the original Fallout comes Wasteland 2. With over 80 hours of gameplay, deck out your Ranger squad with devastating weaponry, test the limits of your strategy skills, and bring justice to the Wasteland! The choices are yours…but so are the consequences.

Name: Freddi Fish 3: The Case of the Stolen Conch Shell
Summary: The Great Conch Shell has been stolen and it's up to Freddi Fish and Luther to catch the culprit!

Name: Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas - The Definitive Edition
Summary: Five years ago Carl Johnson escaped from the pressures of life in Los Santos, San Andreas... a city tearing itself apart with gang trouble, drugs and corruption. Where filmstars and millionaires do their best to avoid the dealers and gangbangers. Now, it's the early 90s. Carl's got to go home.

Name: Star Trek: 25th Anniversary
Summary: Beam aboard the USS Enterprise to join Captain Kirk and his intrepid crew in this classic adventure game. Eight original missions, each styled as episodes of an imagined fourth season of Star Trek: the Original Series, featuring the voice talents of the original actors!

Name: Danganronpa 2: Goodbye Despair
Summary: Jabberwock Island: Tu e i tuoi compagni di classe eravate pronti a divertirvi sotto il sole quando Monokuma è ritornato per ricominciare il suo gioco mortale! Intrappolato in una situazione "uccidi-o-muori", la tua sola speranza sta nel risolvere i misteri dell'isola.

Name: Counter-Strike: Condition Zero - Deleted Scenes
Summary: Counter-Strike: Condition Zero offre un'ampia campagna Tour of Duty, un numero quasi infinito di modalità di scontro, aggiornamenti e nuovi contenuti per la premiata giocabilità multigiocatore di Counter-Strike, e più di 12 missioni bonus per giocatore singolo. Un'offerta incredibile di contenuti multigiocatore e per giocatore singolo.

Name: The Karaoke
Summary: The Karaoke | ヒトカラ is a Japanese horror game about a high school girl at a Karaoke.

Name: Mecha Knights: Nightmare
Summary: Mecha action shooter, plunging the player into an apocalyptic war. Engage in epic battles with endless hordes of monsters in your powerful customizable mechs.

Name: Gas Station Simulator
Summary: Buy an abandoned gas station and restore it to its full glory. Renovate, upgrade and expand upon the offered services to keep up with your clients demands.

Name: The Exorcist: Legion VR (Deluxe Edition)
Summary: The Exorcist: Legion VR Deluxe Edition is a complete collection of all FIVE chapters of the acclaimed VR experience based on The Exorcist franchise. Investigate and exorcise sinister demonic entities as you make your way to a final confrontation with your darkest, most hidden fears. HTC Vive, Oculus Rift/S and Valve Index.

Name: Kakele Online: MMORPG
Summary: Kakele Online is a 2D MMORPG! It is a top-down multiplayer open world nostalgic and classic 2D pixel real time role playing game. Play on Mobile and PC! NO pay to win! NO ads! Play for FREE!

Name: SNK vs. Capcom: The Match of the Millennium
Summary: Back in 1999, SNK and CAPCOM brought their best fighters together for a fighting game extravaganza! The dream collaboration that can fit in your hands can now be enjoyed on Steam!

Name: Mortal Kombat 1
Summary: Scopri un universo di Mortal Kombat™del tutto rivoluzionato, creato dal Dio del fuoco Liu Kang. Mortal Kombat™ 1 inaugura una nuova era per l’iconico franchise: un nuovo sistema di kombattimento, nuove modalità e Fatality inedite!

Name: Dead of Night
Summary: Dead of Night is a 2D flipscreen adventure game inspired by such 8-bit classics as Spike in Transylvania, Bride of Frankenstein, Werewolves of London and the Dizzy series.

Name: Super 3-D Noah's Ark
Summary: Fast paced, first person adventure aboard Noah's ark!

Name: Deus Ex: Invisible War
Summary: Approximately 20 years after the events depicted in Deus Ex, The World is only beginning to recover from a Catastrophic worldwide depression. In the Chaotic period of recovery, several religious and political factions see an opportunity to re-shape a worldwide government to their agendas, understanding that the right moves now could...

Name: Swarm the City
Summary: In Swarm the City, sei Karr the Great, un oscuro signore degli zombie. Devi trovare i punti deboli tra le città umane. Fai evolvere il tuo esercito di zombie. Scegliete la strategia migliore e infiltratevi nelle città fino a quando non saranno completamente disfunzionali.

Name: Eador: Genesis
Summary: Eador: Genesis is an indie turn-based strategy game created by Alexey Bokulev. It has inspired the development of Eador: Masters of the Broken World.Take the role of a mighty Master and shape the destiny of Eador, on land and within the astral plane itself.

Name: Sheltered 2
Summary: Un brutale gioco di sopravvivenza e gestione delle risorse ambientato in un desolato mondo post-apocalittico. Mantieni in vita la tua fazione di sopravvissuti, gestisci il tuo rifugio e raccogli risorse. Crea alleanze e intrattieni relazioni con le altre fazioni o conquistale con la forza.

Name: Frio- Lost in old town
Summary: A horror adventure game with a various actions.

Name: Parkan II
Summary: Parkan II is an original concept game that will allow you to feel as a pilot of a spacecraft lost somewhere in the universe. Become a pirate or mercenary, get money to buy the most powerful cruiser and show them all who is to be the new master of the galaxy. Unforgettable adventures in the Parkan II universe await you!

Name: A Tiny Sticker Tale
Summary: A Tiny Sticker Tale is a cozy miniature adventure about changing the world, using the power of stickers!

Name: Assassin's Creed: Rogue Remastered
Summary: Assassin’s Creed Rogue è in assoluto il capitolo più oscuro dell’intero franchise di Assassin’s Creed. Nei panni di Shay, vivrai una lenta ma profonda trasformazione da Assassino a cacciatore di Assassini.

Name: The Tenants
Summary: Diventa un proprietario immobiliare e costruisci il tuo impero residenziale! Affitterete il vostro appartamento a un paio di «fuorisede» o a una nonnina con una legione di gatti? Come gestirete gli inquilini quando i vicini non possono più sopportarli e chiamano regolarmente la polizia?

Name: Deadly Night
Summary: Carol is down on her luck, hitchhiking across the country. She arrives at a small roadside motel but there's something strange about the owner. As the secrets unravel, she finds herself entangled in a long, DEADLY NIGHT! Can she escape from hellish nightmare or will she die trying?

Name: Lawn Mowing Simulator
Summary: Vivi una dettagliatissima esperienza di giardinaggio nella grande campagna britannica di Lawn Mowing Simulator, l'unico simulatore che ti permette di manovrare un vasto assortimento di tagliaerba realmente esistenti di produttori prestigiosi come Toro, SCAG e STIGA, mentre gestisci i tuoi affari.

Name: Sonic Origins
Summary: Rivivi le classiche avventure di Sonic The Hedgehog, Sonic The Hedgehog 2, Sonic 3 & Knuckles e Sonic CD in questa nuova versione rimasterizzata. Preordina e ricevi il pacchetto Start Dash con contenuti bonus

Name: Distance
Summary: Distance is an atmospheric racing platformer. Fusing futuristic arcade racing with parkour, survive a deadly, mysterious, neon-drenched city by jumping, rotating, and flying.

Name: Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain
Summary: Portando il franchise di METAL GEAR in una nuova era, grazie all'innovativa tecnologia del Fox Engine, METAL GEAR SOLID V: The Phantom Pain offrirà una fantastica esperienza di gioco, dove sarà possibile completare le missioni con la massima libertà tattica in uno scenario liberamente esplorabile.

Name: 新仙剑奇侠传 单机版 (Sword and Fairy)
Summary: *** This game is only available in Chinese language ***

Name: Dark Souls II
Summary: Sviluppato da FROM SOFTWARE, DARK SOULS™ II è l'attesissimo seguito della rivelazione del 2011, Dark Souls™. La sua particolare esperienza di gioco azione-GDR ha catturato l'immaginazione dei giocatori di tutto il mondo grazie a sfide incredibili e intense emozioni.

Name: Quadrant
Summary: The year is 1979. A secret, final lunar mission has retrieved hundreds of moon rocks for study at Aether Research Facility. Overtaken by curiosity, researchers delve deeper and deeper into the unknown. Only to find a sinister and unperceivable

Name: SATURNALIA
Summary: Un'avventura horror di sopravvivenza: gioca nei panni di un gruppo di personaggi, esplora un villaggio isolato dove si tiene un antico rituale. Le sue strade labirintiche cambieranno ogni volta che perderai tutti i personaggi.

Name: HOTEL GREENWOOD
Summary: Hotel Greenwood is a psychological horror and thriller game played with a first-person camera. Explore this mysterious hotel with its intense and dark atmosphere, solve the events and witness the story behind the disaster that happened in the past.

Name: I Frog-ot
Summary: A short horror- I mean, cute game :) Help a normal, innocent frog get back to his super awesome wizard self!! :O

Name: Bullet Witch
Summary: Un esercito di demoni ha quasi spazzato via il genere umano. L'ultimo baluardo dell'umanità è una donna vestita di nero che possiede poteri magici e una lunga pistola simile alla scopa di una strega. Abbatti orde di mostri e ravviva la fiamma della speranza nei cuori dei membri della resistenza!

Name: Park Beyond
Summary: Park Beyond è un gioco di simulazione dove potrai creare e gestire i parchi a tema dei tuoi sogni! Che tu preferisca concentrarti sulle finanze e sull'esperienza dei visitatori o costruire parchi belli e divertenti, il gioco ti offrirà l'esperienza che cerchi!

Name: Castles
Summary: Real-time battles in a turn-based strategyThe ability to design your own fortress

Name: SuchArt: Genius Artist Simulator
Summary: A unique artist sim game with realistic paint mixing, physics and numerous painting tools. Upgrade and customize your studio, complete tasks, sell and expose art, buy instruments and get famous!

Name: VR Fitness
Summary: Enjoy moving your body with VR! Beat the enemies coming one after another with your flying slash! Use your whole body from top to bottom to let out a flashy action! When you finished playing, the calories used will be displayed. Have an enjoyable fitness with this game!

Name: The Bus
Summary: The Bus è il simulatore di guida di autobus urbani di nuova generazione ambientata nella capitale della Germania, Berlino, su una scala realistica 1:1. Trasporta i passeggeri su diverse linee in tutta la città con vari autobus. Gestisci la tua flotta e collabora con altri conducenti online.

Name: The Chant
Summary: Un'avventura dinamica horror in terza persona per giocatore singolo, ambientata in un'isola remota durante un ritiro spirituale. Per sopravvivere dovrai costruire, combattere e sfuggire agli orrori psichedelici scatenati da un rituale andato storto, che evoca una dimensione di terrore cosmico.

Name: Transformice
Summary: Transformice is an MMO platformer about dozens of mice running to bring back the cheese! Will the almighty Shaman help you or just ruin everything? Millions of levels, hectic physics, skill trees, and more importantly... hats!

Name: Goodbye Deponia
Summary: Ancora più caos, più distruzione, più Rufus. Ben tre Rufus scateneranno ogni tipo di pandemonio nella commedia avventurosa point&click a lungo attesa, Goodbye Deponia!

Name: Tomb Raider Chronicles
Summary: Lara Croft è dispersa in Egitto - probabilmente morta. I suoi amici più vicini si incontrano alla Croft Estate in un grigio e piovoso giorno per la cerimonia funebre is suo onore. Dopo la cerimonia, gli amici siedono tranquilli nella casa di Lara e ricordano le sue avvenutre, alcune delle quali sono rimaste un segreto.

Name: KeyWe
Summary: KeyWe è un adorabile gioco cooperativo di rompicapi postali che ha per protagonisti due piccoli uccellini kiwi impiegati in un bizzarro ufficio postale. Dovranno saltare, svolazzare e dare colpi di coda in scenari interattivi pieni di leve, campanelli e pulsanti per recapitare i messaggi in tempo.

Name: Scoot Kaboom and the Tomb of Doom
Summary: Scoot Kaboom and the Tomb of Doom is a fiendishly fun action platformer that all takes place on one enormous screen. Run, dive and dodge through the twisting maze, evading spikes, saws, fireballs, portals and even more and escape the Tomb of Doom!

Name: Nibiru
Summary: Nibiru is a rough adventure for 2 to 4 players, solo and co-op, the scenes comes on undiscovered planet full of danger and challenges. In open world, get resources and explore locations in search of rescue. If you kept your life, you must find out the reason for the radio silence and survive...

Name: Dream Cycle
Summary: Intrappolata in una dimensione alternativa, l'apprendista Morgan Carter dovrà affrontare un'epica missione per salvare sia le Dreamlands che la sua stessa anima. Usa furtività, incantesimi e armi per sconfiggere i nemici e purificare la corruzione in questa avventura in continua espansione.

Name: Mago
Summary: Mago è un gioco a piattaforme in 2D, in cui i giocatori interpretano uno stregone che dovrà correre, saltare e usare la sua fidata bacchetta magica per attraversare un vasto regno, dove ogni cosa può succedere (e succederà).

Name: Welcome to Kowloon
Summary: This is an indie horror from the first person, in which you find yourself in an area called Kowloon in search of cheap housing. The inhabitants of this place only at first glance seem to be ordinary people, but if we dig deeper, we will see their real faces.

Name: Treasure Hunting
Summary: [Treasure Hunting] is a single player game that have 30 stages.You have to open the treasure box to clear the stage,and the game will be clear after beat all the stages.Rather than just moving the character player have to solve puzzleand cleverly using the gimmicks and traps to clear the stage.

Name: Frog Space
Summary: Frog Space is a game about the adventures of frog 'Froxy' that avoids obstacles such as animals, vehicles, and terrain. Since only the skills and senses of the player are the only ways to clear this game, it requires a high level of concentration, equanimity, and a challenging spirit.

Name: Death in the Water 2
Summary: Schiva e fatti strada tra terrificanti creature marine controllate dalla Morte, un feroce Kraken che controlla la mente e perseguita ogni tua mossa. Trova tesori nascosti per sbloccare armi e potenziamenti. Ogni immersione rivela un nuovo incubo.

Name: The Classrooms
Summary: The Classrooms is a procedural, liminal-space, found-footage, survival horror game. Explore The Classrooms and discover the various anomalies it contains; from malicious entities, to harmless oddities. And remember, it's different every time you play, so your found footage is uniquely yours.

Name: The Binding of Isaac: Rebirth
Summary: Now 20% More Evil with the Free Halloween update!

Name: Nothing & Nowhere
Summary: While taking a walk on a foggy beach, reclusive writer Cora encounters a young runaway. Curious, Cora offers her a place to stay... and a quiet, pensive story about overcoming the past unfolds.

Name: Education
Summary: Having done some terrible things in his youth at school, his memories call Bart Blake back to that place, in his nightmares.

Name: Salamander County Public Television
Summary: Become a professional thing-doer! Complete wacky assignments for Salamander County's local TV station, and solve the mystery of why nearly everyone in the county suddenly disappeared.

Name: Ninjahtic
Summary: Ninjahtic is an action/adventure platformer with elements of puzzle-solving and stealth. While it's progression is linear, the open-ended nature of every level requires exploration of an abandoned civilization located atop floating islands.

Name: Hotline Miami 2: Wrong Number
Summary: Hotline Miami 2: Wrong Number is the brutal conclusion to the Hotline Miami saga, set against a backdrop of escalating violence and retribution over spilled blood in the original game.

Name: Ghostrunner II
Summary: Scopri Ghostrunner 2, lo slasher in prima persona ambientato in un futuro cyberpunk. Diventa il cyber-ninja definitivo e affronta epiche battaglie con boss, abilità migliorate, una storia interattiva, nuove modalità e una intensa colonna sonora synthwave.

Name: Wizard Hunter 2348
Summary: The epic struggle of bureaucracy versus magic hangs in the balance, and only your effective use of a variety of ambush tactics can save the day. With no more than a small tank armed to the teeth, take on dozens of wizards and several demons at once.

Name: TrackMania United Forever
Summary: TrackMania è il più divertente gioco di guida di sempre. Milioni di giocatori ci giocano nelle modalità giocatore singolo o multigiocatore. TrackMania United Forever è l'edizione definitiva di Trackmania grazie alle numerose aggiunte ed innovazioni che ha da offrire.

Name: The Fermi Paradox
Summary: The Fermi Paradox is a choice-driven sci-fi narrative strategy game in which your decisions in one corner of the galaxy can upend entire civilizations in another. Guide species through millennia and help them explore the vastness of space, make contact and, perhaps, create harmony.

Name: 12 HOURS
Summary: The protagonist was in a very nightmarish and realistic lucid dream, he needed to find a way to wake up, avoiding the creepy creature that was chasing him. Find a way to wake up, each time the level is generated randomly.

Name: Forever Skies
Summary: Forever Skies è un gioco survival in prima persona. Torna sulla Terra distrutta da un disastro ecologico, vola con un'astronave hi-tech, ampliala, ricostruiscila e riparala. Recupera risorse, sopravvivi, affronta i pericoli sulla superficie ed elabora un virus per curare una misteriosa malattia.

Name: A Blind Legend
Summary: A Blind Legend is the first-ever action-adventure game without video – where ears replace eyes! Discover the original, innovative sensory experience of binaural 3D sound.

Name: Touhou Artificial Dream in Arcadia
Summary: Explore Gensokyo from an outsider's perspective in this old-school Touhou DRPG!

Name: RUNNING WITH RIFLES
Summary: RUNNING WITH RIFLES è uno sparatutto tattico con visuale dall'alto, con elementi open-world e GDR. In RWR fai parte di un esercito come un semplice soldato, proprio come le altre migliaia di uomini intorno a te.

Name: HORGIHUGH
Summary: HORGIHUGH is a horizontal side-scrolling shoot 'em up from Japanese developer PiXEL featuring vibrant retro graphics, intense boss battles, a unique power-up system, and an adorable roster of anthropomorphic characters.

Name: Demonheart: Hunters
Summary: Embrace or resist the demonic influence around you. Romance your companions in this RPG with an emphasis on conversation choices and character interactions.

Name: Putt-Putt Joins The Circus
Summary: Mr. B.J. Sweeney needs you and Putt-Putt® to help his five main acts get ready for the show.

Name: Grand Theft Auto: Vice City - The Definitive Edition
Summary: Welcome to Vice City. Welcome to the 1980s. From the decade of big hair, excess and pastel suits comes a story of one man's rise to the top of the criminal pile.

Name: BEARS, VODKA, BALALAIKA! 🐻
Summary: The year is 1941. You play as russian soldier in times of nazis occupation.

Name: عالم أريب
Summary: عالم أريب هي لعبة جماعية على الإنترنت من نوع ألعاب تقمص الشخصيات MMORPG.شارك أصدقاءك الآن في عالم مليء بالإثارة والغموض وساعد عالم أريب في النهوض من جديد!

Name: Cursed Letters
Summary: A retro-looking Stealth Horror game. Where you take the role of Robert a man who just received a letter from his missing brother.

Name: Madden NFL 22
Summary: Prenota Madden NFL 22 e ricevi:Oggetto potenziamento Brady o Mahomes Carta strategia Passaggi d'élite in Madden Ultimate Team20 punti staff di FranchiseScelta di 1 su 32 stelle della NFLCon Madden NFL 22 vivi le emozioni del campo.

Name: WARZONE-X
Summary: Multiplayer inspired by science fiction and the cyberpunk world of classic movies from the 70s and 80s an FPS with classic game modes.

Name: Farmer's Life
Summary: La vita di un contadino è piena di puzza, sudiciume e duro lavoro. Il Kashmir è un vecchio scapolo, un contadino e un alcolizzato ... Aiutalo a sopravvivere il più a lungo possibile nel bel mezzo dell'Europa orientale.

Name: WARNO
Summary: Realistic, immersive, breathtaking. WARNO is the ultimate World War III battle simulator from the masters of strategy, Eugen Systems. A Cold War turns decisively hot as you command hundreds of units on a beautiful and brutal battlefield. Outsmart, outfight, and lead your forces to total victory.

Name: Forex Trading Master: Simulator
Summary: This is a simulation of foreign currencies trading game, the data is synchronized in real-time from Bank’s Website and API provider and The game currently supports more than 30 kinds of foreign currency exchanges.

Name: Tomb Raider: The Last Revelation
Summary: Secondo una leggenda Egizia, Horus, il figlio della luce, sconfisse il malvagio dio Set e lo ha imprigionato in una tomba segreta. Cinquemila anni dopo, Lara Croft ha scoperto la tomba perduta e inavvertitamente ha liberato il malvagio Set, compiendo l'antica profezia del suo ritorno per portare l'umanità nell'ombra!

Name: Ghost Master
Summary: Tetri fantasmi, spettri ululanti e astuti mostriciattoli sono al tuo servizio per aiutarti a liberare spaventosi spiriti sulla città di Gravenville e terrorizzare i cittadini. Nel mondo di Ghost Master, gli spettri sono dalla tua parte mentre risolvi rompicapo e sveli misteri in una sfida continua che combina il meglio dei giochi di...

Name: Dinkum
Summary: G’Day! Get ready to start a new fair Dinkum life and build your new home out in the bush. Explore tropical eucalyptus forests, scorching deserts and cool billabongs on an Island inspired by the wild Australian outback. Take care of giant wombats, play with friends and get ready for a ripper time!

Name: Grand Theft Auto 2
Summary: Grand Theft Auto is back. The cars are faster. The streets are busier. The bad guys are nastier. The police are angrier. And now, the FBI and the Army are getting involved... Seven ruthless gangs are involved in a ruthless power struggle and it is up to you to make a name for yourself. Respect is earned, not given.

Name: Unicorn Tails
Summary: Explore Unicorn Tails, a game filled with wonder, whimsy, and mystery where you can create your own unicorn, interact with unicorns and other creatures, solve puzzles, explore deep lore, and live in a fantasy world.

Name: Trouble Witches Origin - Episode1 Daughters of Amalgam -
Summary: That witches come back undergone a power-up further! New character is entered! All 6stages Arcade version of all re-adjust the resolution of the base in 1280x720! "Magic Circle system" is easy-to-use adjustment! Full voice all by the story undergoes new writing.

Name: Only Up: With Friends
Summary: Only Up: With Friends is a multiplayer parkour game where speed is essential. Race against your friends to the top by climbing a variety of dynamic obstacles. One mistake and its back to the start...

Name: Fears to Fathom: Carson House
Summary: Noah Baker, an 18 year old highschooler experiences unsettling occurrences while house-sitting for a media personality, little did he know what was about to unfold that night.

Name: ANOTHER DERBY!
Summary: Take a bat and challenge trials to rescue your sister who was sucked into a different space portal.

Name: Flashback
Summary: FLASHBACK™, the hit action-adventure game with over 2.2 million units sold, is back!

Name: Townsmen VR
Summary: Townsmen VR uses the exciting possibilities of virtual reality to further enhance the classic city building game with entirely new gameplay experiences and interactive mechanics.

Name: Garou: Mark of the Wolves
Summary: “GAROU: MARK OF THE WOLVES”, the latest entry in the legendary "FATAL FURY" Series which still continues to fascinate players around the world to this day, returns for a new fight on Steam!

Name: Metal Slug 3
Summary: “METAL SLUG 3”, the masterpiece in SNK’s emblematic 2D run & gun action shooting game series, still continues to fascinate millions of fans worldwide to this day for its intricate dot-pixel graphics, and simple and intuitive game controls!

Name: Dead Space
Summary: You are Isaac Clarke, an engineer on the spacecraft USG Ishimura. You're not a warrior. You're not a soldier. You are, however, the last line of defense for the remaining living crew.

Name: .fall
Summary: ".fall" is an action game that jumps blocks so as not to fall down. Anyone can play with simple operation and enjoy it. Try for the highest score in the world.

Name: Tandem: A Tale of Shadows
Summary: Tandem : A Tale of Shadows ridefinisce il genere dei puzzle platform con un gameplay unico e un'estetica eccezionale. Aiuta Emma e l'orsacchiotto Fenton a risolvere il mistero della scomparsa del famoso mago Thomas Kane.

Name: Unknown
Summary: Darkness. Nothing. There’s no memory of what has become. All you have is a flashlight to navigate the horrors ahead of you. Use your wits to solve the puzzles and escape the levels of the dreaded facility. You don’t seem to be alone though…

Name: Everslaught
Summary: Traverse an ancient city with randomly generated dungeons, discover rare loot, upgrade your gear, level up your skills and engage in visceral combat with completely unrestricted VR movement and combat.

Name: Wings of Vi
Summary: Wings of Vi is a challenging 2D platformer in which the player controls the angel Vi, tasked with defeating the Demon Lord Jeh’oul after he is freed from captivity. While inspired by masochistic retro platformers, Wings of Vi aims to cut out arbitrary difficulty in favor of skill based gameplay.

Name: Tetragon
Summary: Tetragon è un misterioso universo pieno di enigmi, labirinti magici e sfide! Dovrai muovere i piani della realtà usando la gravità fluttuante del mondo. Testa la tua mente e guida un coraggioso taglialegna attraverso vari mondi alla ricerca del figlio perduto!

Name: Arx Fatalis
Summary: Questo acclamato GDR in soggettiva di Arkane Studios porta il giocatore in un incredibile viaggio nel fantastico mondo di Arx. Arx è in subbuglio, portato a un passo dalla distruzione da una violenta guerra. Il sole è scomparso dal cielo e il mondo è vittima dell’oscurità eterna, costringendo la gente a vivere nelle miniere.

Name: 象棋
Summary: The most popular Chinese board game.

Name: Bio Prototype
Summary: A wave of irrational experimentation rushes toward you. Hurry up and mutate! evolution! Become scarier monsters than them! Use flesh and blood to bloom a way of survival! 24 characters, more than 80 kinds of organs, and endless build combinations！

Name: GAME.exe
Summary: You bought a PC that belonged to a suicidal developer, do you dare to run "Game.exe"?

Name: EverQuest
Summary: Welcome to EverQuest ® - the online game that started it all! No other MMO matches EverQuest's sheer content, now with 25 expansions and countless updates. EverQuest is free-to-play.

Name: Love Is All Around
Summary: The player becomes Gu Yi, uses the first-person perspective to immerse himself in meeting six beauties, and embarks on a joyful and sweet love journey with them. Six girls that are charming, innocent, intelligent, wild, sexy, glamorous, who will go to the end with you is up to you to decide.

Name: Galactic Mining Corp
Summary: Galactic Mining Corp is a unique rogue-lite, action game with crafting and base building mechanics. Head into uncharted space and discover a universe of locations to exploit for riches! Use your profits to expand your HQ, hire a crazy work force, obtain new drill components and upgrade everything.

Name: RWBY: Arrowfell
Summary: Immergiti in una nuova avventura esplosiva di RWBY! Controlla Ruby, Weiss, Blake e Yang e utilizza armi e Simulacri unici per combattere un’oscura minaccia in una storia canonica ambientata nel volume 7! Include il cast di doppiaggio originale e una nuova canzone di Casey Lee e Jeff Williams!

Name: Knights and Merchants: The Peasants Rebellion
Summary: KNIGHTS and MERCHANTS recreates the era of the Middle Ages. Apart from the purely fictitious geography of our world, all game elements and scenes are based on the Anglo-Saxon period, 1200 A.D. And we haven't used imaginary elements like fabled creatures, either. The player takes on the role of an ordinary captain in the Palace Guard.
